translation.cs: Každé nouzové očkování má svoji veřejnou testovací fázi, kdy se postupně přichází na to, jak bude vypadat očkovací schéma a taky dochází k vylepšování samotných vakcín, na základě výsledků.
translation.en: Every emergency vaccination has a public testing phase, where the vaccination schedule is gradually worked out and the vaccines themselves are improved based on the results.
translation.source: Každé nouzové očkování má svoji veřejnou testovací fázi, kdy se postupně přichází na to, jak bude vypadat očkovací schéma a taky dochází k vylepšování samotných vakcín, na základě výsledků.
translation.medium: Every emergency vaccination has a public trial phase, in which the vaccination schedule and the vaccines themselves are improved based on the results.
translation.reference: Every emergency vaccination has a public testing phase, where the vaccination schedule is gradually worked out and the vaccines themselves are improved based on the results.

translation.cs: Třeba z izraele se už ve velkém valí studie o účincích 4 dávky.
translation.en: For example, studies on the effects of the 4th dose are already pouring in from Israel.
translation.source: Třeba z izraele se už ve velkém valí studie o účincích 4 dávky.
translation.medium: Studies on the effects of the fourth dose are already pouring in from Israel.
translation.reference: For example, studies on the effects of the 4th dose are already pouring in from Israel.

translation.cs: A podle těchto studii se u většiny pacientů dochází až k pětinásobnému zvýšení protilátek, což už má vámi zmíněný dlouhodobý efekt.
translation.en: And according to these studies, most patients experience up to a fivefold increase in antibodies, which has the long-term effect you mentioned.
translation.source: A podle těchto studii se u většiny pacientů dochází až k pětinásobnému zvýšení protilátek, což už má vámi zmíněný dlouhodobý efekt.
translation.medium: According to these studies, antibodies increase up to five times in most patients, which has the long-term effect you mentioned.
translation.reference: And according to these studies, most patients experience up to a fivefold increase in antibodies, which has the long-term effect you mentioned.

translation.cs: Prostě jako každý jiný očkování bude mít po čase svoje očkovací schéma, jen je na to zatím moc brzo.
translation.en: Just like any other vaccination, there will be a vaccination schedule over time, it's just too early to tell.
translation.source: Prostě jako každý jiný očkování bude mít po čase svoje očkovací schéma, jen je na to zatím moc brzo.
translation.medium: Basically, like any other vaccine, it will have its own vaccination schedule, but it is still too early for that.
translation.reference: Just like any other vaccination, there will be a vaccination schedule over time, it's just too early to tell.

translation.cs: Dalším faktem je, že za nedlouho by měla přijít na trh nová vakcína, na bázi inaktivovaného viru, která podle specifikací výrobce slibuje až 10x větší účinnost.
translation.en: Another fact is that a new vaccine, based on an inactivated virus, is expected to come on the market shortly, which, according to the manufacturer's specifications, promises to be up to 10 times more effective.
translation.source: Dalším faktem je, že za nedlouho by měla přijít na trh nová vakcína, na bázi inaktivovaného viru, která podle specifikací výrobce slibuje až 10x větší účinnost.
translation.medium: Another fact is that a new vaccine, based on an inactivated virus, is expected to hit the market soon, according to the manufacturer's specifications, which promises to be 10 times more effective.
translation.reference: Another fact is that a new vaccine, based on an inactivated virus, is expected to come on the market shortly, which, according to the manufacturer's specifications, promises to be up to 10 times more effective.

translation.cs: Množství učiva klidně ponechat.
translation.en: Keep the scale of the curriculum.
translation.source: Množství učiva klidně ponechat.
translation.medium: Keep the amount of content the same.
translation.reference: Keep the scale of the curriculum.

translation.cs: Ale přehodnotit CO se učí.
translation.en: But rethink WHAT is being taught.
translation.source: Ale přehodnotit CO se učí.
translation.medium: But rethink what is being taught.
translation.reference: But rethink WHAT is being taught.

translation.cs: Od dob Marie Terezie naše civilizace a technologie trošku pokročila a učení telefonních seznamů a opisování učebnic do sešitů už nedává moc smysl a je to fakt ztráta času.
translation.en: Since the time of Maria Theresa, our civilization and technology has advanced a bit and memorizing phone books and copying textbooks into notebooks doesn't make much sense anymore and is really a waste of time.
translation.source: Od dob Marie Terezie naše civilizace a technologie trošku pokročila a učení telefonních seznamů a opisování učebnic do sešitů už nedává moc smysl a je to fakt ztráta času.
translation.medium: Since the days of Maria Theresa, our civilisation and technology have progressed somewhat, and learning phone directories and copying textbooks into notebooks no longer makes much sense and is a waste of time.
translation.reference: Since the time of Maria Theresa, our civilization and technology has advanced a bit and memorizing phone books and copying textbooks into notebooks doesn't make much sense anymore and is really a waste of time.

translation.cs: V těchto věcech by šlo fakt brutálně ubrat.
translation.en: You could really severely cut back on these things.
translation.source: V těchto věcech by šlo fakt brutálně ubrat.
translation.medium: In these matters, it would be brutally possible to cut back.
translation.reference: You could really severely cut back on these things.

translation.cs: Na druhou stranu kolik lidí odejde ze základky s nějakou základní finanční gramotností?
translation.en: On the other hand, how many people leave primary school with some basic financial literacy?
translation.source: Na druhou stranu kolik lidí odejde ze základky s nějakou základní finanční gramotností?
translation.medium: On the other hand, how many people leave primary school with basic financial literacy?
translation.reference: On the other hand, how many people leave primary school with some basic financial literacy?

translation.cs: A dalšíma věcma které bude nutně k životu potřebovat?
translation.en: And the other things they’re going to need to survive?
translation.source: A dalšíma věcma které bude nutně k životu potřebovat?
translation.medium: And what else will it need to survive?
translation.reference: And the other things they’re going to need to survive?

translation.cs: Jak mohu legálně sledovat Ligu mistrů online?
translation.en: How can I watch the Champions League online legally?
translation.source: Jak mohu legálně sledovat Ligu mistrů online?
translation.medium: How can I legally watch the Champions League online?
translation.reference: How can I watch the Champions League online legally?

translation.cs: Nevíte, jestli existuje nějaká online služba tady v ČR, která by mi umožnila sledovat Ligu mistrů za poplatek?
translation.en: Do you know if there is an online service here in the Czech Republic where you can watch the Champions League for a fee?
translation.source: Nevíte, jestli existuje nějaká online služba tady v ČR, která by mi umožnila sledovat Ligu mistrů za poplatek?
translation.medium: Do you know if there is any online service in the Czech Republic that would allow me to watch the Champions League for a fee?
translation.reference: Do you know if there is an online service here in the Czech Republic where you can watch the Champions League for a fee?

translation.cs: Doma máme Netbox a platím si sportovní balíček Telly pro španělskou a anglickou fotbalovou ligu.
translation.en: We have a Netbox at home and I subscribed to the Telly sports package for the Spanish and English football leagues.
translation.source: Doma máme Netbox a platím si sportovní balíček Telly pro španělskou a anglickou fotbalovou ligu.
translation.medium: At home, we have Netbox and I pay for the Telly sports package for the Spanish and English football leagues.
translation.reference: We have a Netbox at home and I subscribed to the Telly sports package for the Spanish and English football leagues.

translation.cs: Ten však nezahrnuje Ligu mistrů UEFA.
translation.en: However, it does not include the UEFA Champions League.
translation.source: Ten však nezahrnuje Ligu mistrů UEFA.
translation.medium: This does not include the UEFA Champions League.
translation.reference: However, it does not include the UEFA Champions League.

translation.cs: Myslím, že O2 nabízí Ligu mistrů, ale nechci měnit poskytovatele televize a internetu.
translation.en: I think O2 offers the Champions League, but I don't want to change TV and internet providers.
translation.source: Myslím, že O2 nabízí Ligu mistrů, ale nechci měnit poskytovatele televize a internetu.
translation.medium: I think O2 offers Champions League, but I don't want to change my TV and internet provider.
translation.reference: I think O2 offers the Champions League, but I don't want to change TV and internet providers.

translation.cs: Polsko pohrozilo zastavením plateb do unijního rozpočtu
translation.en: Poland threatens to stop payments to the EU budget
translation.source: Polsko pohrozilo zastavením plateb do unijního rozpočtu
translation.medium: Poland threatens to stop paying into the EU budget
translation.reference: Poland threatens to stop payments to the EU budget

translation.cs: Podle Ziobra by Evropská komise jednala v rozporu s právem, pokud by využila nové pravomoci a kvůli sporu o právní stát zastavila výplatu peněz Polsku.
translation.en: According to Ziobro, the European Commission would be acting unlawfully if it used its new powers to stop paying Poland because of a dispute over the rule of law.
translation.source: Podle Ziobra by Evropská komise jednala v rozporu s právem, pokud by využila nové pravomoci a kvůli sporu o právní stát zastavila výplatu peněz Polsku.
translation.medium: According to Ziobro, the European Commission would be acting unlawfully if it used its new powers to withhold payments to Poland over the rule-of-law dispute.
translation.reference: According to Ziobro, the European Commission would be acting unlawfully if it used its new powers to stop paying Poland because of a dispute over the rule of law.

translation.cs: Komise už odložila schválení polského plánu ohledně čerpání 36 miliard eur z unijního fondu na obnovu ekonomik zasažených pandemií covidu-19.
translation.en: The Commission has already postponed approval of Poland's plan to draw down €36 billion from the EU's fund for the recovery of economies hit by the Covid-19 pandemic.
translation.source: Komise už odložila schválení polského plánu ohledně čerpání 36 miliard eur z unijního fondu na obnovu ekonomik zasažených pandemií covidu-19.
translation.medium: The Commission has already postponed the approval of the Polish plan to draw 36 billion euros from the EU recovery fund for economies affected by the COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.reference: The Commission has already postponed approval of Poland's plan to draw down €36 billion from the EU's fund for the recovery of economies hit by the Covid-19 pandemic.

translation.cs: A je pod tlakem Evropského parlamentu, aby postoupila dál a použila mechanismus umožňující odebrat unijní dotace zemím porušujícím principy právního státu.
translation.en: And it is under pressure from the European Parliament to move forward and use a mechanism to withdraw EU subsidies from countries that violate the rule of law.
translation.source: A je pod tlakem Evropského parlamentu, aby postoupila dál a použila mechanismus umožňující odebrat unijní dotace zemím porušujícím principy právního státu.
translation.medium: And it is under pressure from the European Parliament to go further and use a mechanism to withdraw EU funds from countries that violate the rule of law.
translation.reference: And it is under pressure from the European Parliament to move forward and use a mechanism to withdraw EU subsidies from countries that violate the rule of law.

translation.cs: „Polsko by mělo odpovědět na toto vydírání ze strany EU vetem ve všech záležitostech, které vyžadují jednohlasnost,“ řekl Ziobro, šéf malé strany Solidární Polsko, bez jejíchž hlasů by současná vláda přišla o těsnou většinu v Sejmu.
translation.en: "Poland should respond to this blackmail from the EU with a veto on all issues that require unanimity," said Ziobro, head of Solidary Poland, a small party whose votes ensure the current government’s narrow majority in the Sejm.
translation.source: „Polsko by mělo odpovědět na toto vydírání ze strany EU vetem ve všech záležitostech, které vyžadují jednohlasnost,“ řekl Ziobro, šéf malé strany Solidární Polsko, bez jejíchž hlasů by současná vláda přišla o těsnou většinu v Sejmu.
translation.medium: Poland should respond to this blackmail by the EU with a veto in all matters that require unanimity, said Ziobro, head of the small Solidarity Poland party, without whose votes the current government would lose its narrow majority in the Sejm.
translation.reference: "Poland should respond to this blackmail from the EU with a veto on all issues that require unanimity," said Ziobro, head of Solidary Poland, a small party whose votes ensure the current government’s narrow majority in the Sejm.

translation.cs: „Polsko by také mělo zvážit své závazky v unijní energetické a klimatické politice, které vedou k drastickému nárůstu cen energií,“ dodal Ziobro.
translation.en: "Poland should also consider its commitments to the EU energy and climate policy, which are leading to drastic increases in energy prices," Ziobro added.
translation.source: „Polsko by také mělo zvážit své závazky v unijní energetické a klimatické politice, které vedou k drastickému nárůstu cen energií,“ dodal Ziobro.
translation.medium: Poland should also consider its commitments in EU energy and climate policy, which lead to a drastic increase in energy prices, Ziobro added.
translation.reference: "Poland should also consider its commitments to the EU energy and climate policy, which are leading to drastic increases in energy prices," Ziobro added.

translation.cs: Pokud spor bude pokračovat, budu požadovat, aby Polsko zastavilo své příspěvky do EU.
translation.en: If the dispute continues, I will demand that Poland stops its EU contributions.
translation.source: Pokud spor bude pokračovat, budu požadovat, aby Polsko zastavilo své příspěvky do EU.
translation.medium: If the dispute continues, I will demand that Poland stops its contributions to the EU.
translation.reference: If the dispute continues, I will demand that Poland stops its EU contributions.

translation.cs: Bylo by to ospravedlnitelné vzhledem k tomu, že EU nám protiprávně odpírá prostředky ze společného rozpočtu, do kterého také přispíváme, dodal polský ministr.
translation.en: This would be justified given that the EU is illegally denying us funds from the common budget to which we also contribute, the Polish minister added.
translation.source: Bylo by to ospravedlnitelné vzhledem k tomu, že EU nám protiprávně odpírá prostředky ze společného rozpočtu, do kterého také přispíváme, dodal polský ministr.
translation.medium: It would be justified given that the EU is illegally withholding funds from the common budget, to which we also contribute, the Polish minister added.
translation.reference: This would be justified given that the EU is illegally denying us funds from the common budget to which we also contribute, the Polish minister added.

translation.cs: Jeho strana v přístupu k EU zaujímá radikálnější postoje než vládnoucí strana Právo a spravedlnost.
translation.en: His party's approach to the EU is more radical than that of the ruling Law and Justice party.
translation.source: Jeho strana v přístupu k EU zaujímá radikálnější postoje než vládnoucí strana Právo a spravedlnost.
translation.medium: His party takes a more radical approach to the EU than the ruling Law and Justice party.
translation.reference: His party's approach to the EU is more radical than that of the ruling Law and Justice party.

translation.cs: Podle Evropské komise změny, kterými prošla polská justice za Ziobrova působení, ohrožují její nezávislost a podřizují ji politikům.
translation.en: According to the European Commission, the changes the Polish judiciary has undergone under Ziobro's tenure threaten its independence and puts more political control over it.
translation.source: Podle Evropské komise změny, kterými prošla polská justice za Ziobrova působení, ohrožují její nezávislost a podřizují ji politikům.
translation.medium: According to the European Commission, the changes that the Polish justice system has undergone during Ziobro's tenure threaten its independence and subordinate it to politicians.
translation.reference: According to the European Commission, the changes the Polish judiciary has undergone under Ziobro's tenure threaten its independence and puts more political control over it.

translation.cs: Brusel podle Ziobra staví „nemožné podmínky, protože jeho cílem není právní stát, ale změna vlády v Polsku“.
translation.en: According to Ziobro, Brussels is setting "impossible conditions, because its goal is not the rule of law, but a change of government in Poland."
translation.source: Brusel podle Ziobra staví „nemožné podmínky, protože jeho cílem není právní stát, ale změna vlády v Polsku“.
translation.medium: Brussels, according to Ziobro, is setting "impossible conditions, because its goal is not the rule of law, but a change of government in Poland".
translation.reference: According to Ziobro, Brussels is setting "impossible conditions, because its goal is not the rule of law, but a change of government in Poland."

translation.cs: Varšava čelí „politickému diktátu prováděnému vydíráním a snahou podrýt demokratické rozhodnutí několika milionů Poláků“, řekl také Ziobro.
translation.en: Warsaw is facing "a political dictatorship by blackmail and an attempt to undermine the democratic decision of several million Poles," Ziobro also said.
translation.source: Varšava čelí „politickému diktátu prováděnému vydíráním a snahou podrýt demokratické rozhodnutí několika milionů Poláků“, řekl také Ziobro.
translation.medium: Warsaw is facing a "political dictate enforced by blackmail and an attempt to undermine the democratic decision of several million Poles," Ziobro also said.
translation.reference: Warsaw is facing "a political dictatorship by blackmail and an attempt to undermine the democratic decision of several million Poles," Ziobro also said.

translation.cs: Uvedl, že Polsko by mělo být členem takové EU, která je založena na partnerství suverénních států, a ne na vládě těch nejsilnějších a bruselské byrokracie, která není pod demokratickou kontrolou.
translation.en: He said that Poland should be a member of an EU that is based on a partnership of sovereign states and not on the rule of the most powerful and a Brussels bureaucracy that is not under democratic control.
translation.source: Uvedl, že Polsko by mělo být členem takové EU, která je založena na partnerství suverénních států, a ne na vládě těch nejsilnějších a bruselské byrokracie, která není pod demokratickou kontrolou.
translation.medium: He said that Poland should be a member of an EU that is based on partnership between sovereign states and not on the rule of the strongest and Brussels bureaucracy that is not subject to democratic control.
translation.reference: He said that Poland should be a member of an EU that is based on a partnership of sovereign states and not on the rule of the most powerful and a Brussels bureaucracy that is not under democratic control.

translation.cs: Řekl, že jeho strana nikdy nepřistoupí na takové ústupky Bruselu, v jejichž důsledku by byla omezena suverenita Polska.
translation.en: He said that his party would never make concessions to Brussels that would result in a reduction of Poland's sovereignty.
translation.source: Řekl, že jeho strana nikdy nepřistoupí na takové ústupky Bruselu, v jejichž důsledku by byla omezena suverenita Polska.
translation.medium: He said his party would never agree to such concessions to Brussels that would limit Poland's sovereignty.
translation.reference: He said that his party would never make concessions to Brussels that would result in a reduction of Poland's sovereignty.

translation.cs: „Nikdy nebudeme souhlasit s tím, aby mělo Polsko status kolonie,“ prohlásil.
translation.en: "We will never agree to give Poland the status of a colony," he stated.
translation.source: „Nikdy nebudeme souhlasit s tím, aby mělo Polsko status kolonie,“ prohlásil.
translation.medium: We will never agree to Poland being a colony, he said.
translation.reference: "We will never agree to give Poland the status of a colony," he stated.

translation.cs: Ale vyznat se v tom... U nás v Lidlu mají jeden druh sýra na čtyřech různých místech.
translation.en: But to understand... In the local Lidl one type of cheese can be found in four different places.
translation.source: Ale vyznat se v tom... U nás v Lidlu mají jeden druh sýra na čtyřech různých místech.
translation.medium: But to get to grips with it... In our Lidl, we have one type of cheese in four different places.
translation.reference: But to understand... In the local Lidl one type of cheese can be found in four different places.

translation.cs: Nekoukal jsem po ostatních věcech, jeden jogurt jsem potkal taky vícekrát, potřeboval jsem jenom sýr, parmazán, po deseti minutách u mléčných regálů jsem rezignoval a zeptal jsem se.
translation.en: I didn't look for anything else, I saw one yogurt more than once too, but I just needed parmesan cheese, and after ten minutes at the dairy shelves I gave in and asked someone.
translation.source: Nekoukal jsem po ostatních věcech, jeden jogurt jsem potkal taky vícekrát, potřeboval jsem jenom sýr, parmazán, po deseti minutách u mléčných regálů jsem rezignoval a zeptal jsem se.
translation.medium: I didn't look at other things, I met one yoghurt more than once, I just needed cheese, parmesan, after ten minutes in the dairy section I gave up and asked.
translation.reference: I didn't look for anything else, I saw one yogurt more than once too, but I just needed parmesan cheese, and after ten minutes at the dairy shelves I gave in and asked someone.

translation.cs: Měli ho, to je pravda, v tom úzkém sektoru byly všechny vybrané, méně obvyklé a speciální sýry, ale bylo to mezi zeleninou a bezlaktózovou zónou...
translation.en: They had it, it's true, in that narrow sector were all selected, less usual and special cheeses, but it was between the vegetables and the lactose-free zone...
translation.source: Měli ho, to je pravda, v tom úzkém sektoru byly všechny vybrané, méně obvyklé a speciální sýry, ale bylo to mezi zeleninou a bezlaktózovou zónou...
translation.medium: True, they did have it, but it was in the narrow aisle with all the selected, less common and special cheeses, between the vegetables and the lactose-free zone...
translation.reference: They had it, it's true, in that narrow sector were all selected, less usual and special cheeses, but it was between the vegetables and the lactose-free zone...

translation.cs: Pokud bude vyhnutí, už do žádnýho marketu ani nepáchnu, akce neakce, zlatej krám na náměstí, tam třeba nemají takový výběr, ale většinou mají úplně všechno, co potřebuju a má to nějakej řád, takže mám za deset minut hotovo.
translation.en: If there's an avoidance, I won't even go to any market anymore, there's no action, the golden shop on the square, maybe they don't have such a wide selection, but usually they have everything I need and it has some order, so I'm done in ten minutes.
translation.source: Pokud bude vyhnutí, už do žádnýho marketu ani nepáchnu, akce neakce, zlatej krám na náměstí, tam třeba nemají takový výběr, ale většinou mají úplně všechno, co potřebuju a má to nějakej řád, takže mám za deset minut hotovo.
translation.medium: If I can avoid it, I won't even set foot in a supermarket, action or inaction, golden shop on the square, maybe they don't have such a selection, but they usually have everything I need and it's all in order, so I'm done in ten minutes.
translation.reference: If there's an avoidance, I won't even go to any market anymore, there's no action, the golden shop on the square, maybe they don't have such a wide selection, but usually they have everything I need and it has some order, so I'm done in ten minutes.

translation.cs: Do Lidlu abych si bral dovolenou.
translation.en: I need to take a day off to go shopping in Lidl.
translation.source: Do Lidlu abych si bral dovolenou.
translation.medium: To Lidl to take a holiday.
translation.reference: I need to take a day off to go shopping in Lidl.

translation.cs: A mě je to už úplně jedno.
translation.en: And I don't care one bit anymore.
translation.source: A mě je to už úplně jedno.
translation.medium: And I don't care anymore.
translation.reference: And I don't care one bit anymore.

translation.cs: Dva roky sleduju, jak se tady nakládá s daty jako s hnojem, většina odpůrců očkování je jen o trochu víc mimo mísu než většina zastánců očkování.
translation.en: I've watched two years of data being treated like manure here, most vaccine opponents are only slightly more out of touch than most vaccine advocates.
translation.source: Dva roky sleduju, jak se tady nakládá s daty jako s hnojem, většina odpůrců očkování je jen o trochu víc mimo mísu než většina zastánců očkování.
translation.medium: I've been watching for two years as data is treated like manure, most of the anti-vaxxers are just a little bit more off-base than most of the pro-vaxxers.
translation.reference: I've watched two years of data being treated like manure here, most vaccine opponents are only slightly more out of touch than most vaccine advocates.

translation.cs: Racionální diskuze sice na odborné úrovni probíhá, ale do veřejného prostoru se dostávají jen extrémní názory.
translation.en: Rational discussion takes place at a professional level, but only extreme views make their way into the public sphere.
translation.source: Racionální diskuze sice na odborné úrovni probíhá, ale do veřejného prostoru se dostávají jen extrémní názory.
translation.medium: While a rational discussion is taking place at an expert level, only extreme views are reaching the public domain.
translation.reference: Rational discussion takes place at a professional level, but only extreme views make their way into the public sphere.

translation.cs: Neustále ode zdi ke zdi.
translation.en: Wall to wall all the time.
translation.source: Neustále ode zdi ke zdi.
translation.medium: Back and forth, back and forth.
translation.reference: Wall to wall all the time.

translation.cs: Binární uvažovaní: očkování nás spasí, očkování je k ničemu.
translation.en: Binary thinking: vaccination saves us, vaccination is useless.
translation.source: Binární uvažovaní: očkování nás spasí, očkování je k ničemu.
translation.medium: Binary thinking: vaccination will save us, vaccination is useless.
translation.reference: Binary thinking: vaccination saves us, vaccination is useless.

translation.cs: Všechno zakázat, všechno povolit.
translation.en: Ban everything, allow everything.
translation.source: Všechno zakázat, všechno povolit.
translation.medium: Ban everything, allow everything.
translation.reference: Ban everything, allow everything.

translation.cs: Barevné koláče místo robustních analýz.
translation.en: Colourful pie charts instead of robust analyses.
translation.source: Barevné koláče místo robustních analýz.
translation.medium: Colorful pie charts instead of robust analysis.
translation.reference: Colourful pie charts instead of robust analyses.

translation.cs: Porovnávání jablek s hruškama.
translation.en: It’s apples and oranges.
translation.source: Porovnávání jablek s hruškama.
translation.medium: Comparing apples with pears.
translation.reference: It’s apples and oranges.

translation.cs: Tenhle stát to má takhle a my to máme takhle.
translation.en: That state has it that way and we have it this way.
translation.source: Tenhle stát to má takhle a my to máme takhle.
translation.medium: This state is like that and we are like that.
translation.reference: That state has it that way and we have it this way.

translation.cs: Ale že metodika sběru dat je v těch dvou státech odlišná nikdo neřeší.
translation.en: But no one addresses the fact that the data collection methodology is different in the two states.
translation.source: Ale že metodika sběru dat je v těch dvou státech odlišná nikdo neřeší.
translation.medium: But that the method of data collection is different in those two states is no one's concern.
translation.reference: But no one addresses the fact that the data collection methodology is different in the two states.

translation.cs: Fuj, tak jsem si ulevil.
translation.en: Ugh, I'm so relieved.
translation.source: Fuj, tak jsem si ulevil.
translation.medium: Phew, that was a relief.
translation.reference: Ugh, I'm so relieved.

translation.cs: Sorry za výlev a přeju hezký den Vám všem.
translation.en: Sorry for the outburst and have a nice day to you all.
translation.source: Sorry za výlev a přeju hezký den Vám všem.
translation.medium: Sorry for the rant and have a nice day everyone.
translation.reference: Sorry for the outburst and have a nice day to you all.

translation.cs: Mě v dětství trestali vařečkou.
translation.en: I was punished with a wooden spoon when I was a kid.
translation.source: Mě v dětství trestali vařečkou.
translation.medium: I was beaten with a spoon as a child.
translation.reference: I was punished with a wooden spoon when I was a kid.

translation.cs: Nikdy to nebylo kvůli známkám, většinou šlo jen o to, že jsem opakovaně odmítla poslouchat a zlobila (četla si místo toho abych šla spát, prala se s bráchou atd).
translation.en: It was never because of my the grades, it was usually just that I repeatedly refused to listen and was naughty (reading instead of going to bed, fighting with my brother, etc).
translation.source: Nikdy to nebylo kvůli známkám, většinou šlo jen o to, že jsem opakovaně odmítla poslouchat a zlobila (četla si místo toho abych šla spát, prala se s bráchou atd).
translation.medium: It was never because of grades, it was usually just because I repeatedly refused to listen and misbehaved (reading instead of going to bed, fighting with my brother, etc).
translation.reference: It was never because of my the grades, it was usually just that I repeatedly refused to listen and was naughty (reading instead of going to bed, fighting with my brother, etc).

translation.cs: Zároveň jsem nikdy nebyla potrestána bez upozornění, mamka vždy nejdřív vyhrožovala, že jestli to udělám ještě jednou, tak dostanu ránu (občas dokonce i po dalším "načapání" vařečku pouze přinesla a položila tak, abych ji viděla).
translation.en: At the same time, I was never punished without warning, my mom always threatened first that if I did it again I would get hit (sometimes even after another "catch" she just brought the wooden spoon and put it down so I could see it).
translation.source: Zároveň jsem nikdy nebyla potrestána bez upozornění, mamka vždy nejdřív vyhrožovala, že jestli to udělám ještě jednou, tak dostanu ránu (občas dokonce i po dalším "načapání" vařečku pouze přinesla a položila tak, abych ji viděla).
translation.medium: At the same time, I have never been punished without a warning, my mum always first threatened that if I did it again, I would get a slap (sometimes even after "catching" the spoon a second time, she just brought it and put it down so that I could see it).
translation.reference: At the same time, I was never punished without warning, my mom always threatened first that if I did it again I would get hit (sometimes even after another "catch" she just brought the wooden spoon and put it down so I could see it).

translation.cs: Teprve poté, co jsem opakovaně odmítla poslouchat, jsem dostala pár ran na zadek (přes oblečení).
translation.en: It was only after I repeatedly refused to obey that I got a few swats on the bum (over my clothes).
translation.source: Teprve poté, co jsem opakovaně odmítla poslouchat, jsem dostala pár ran na zadek (přes oblečení).
translation.medium: It wasn't until I repeatedly refused to listen that I got a few smacks on the butt (through clothes).
translation.reference: It was only after I repeatedly refused to obey that I got a few swats on the bum (over my clothes).

translation.cs: Osobně si myslím, že fyzické tresty (v rozumném provedení a míře) jsou prospěšné, protože dítě na ně reaguje mnohem více, než na slova.
translation.en: Personally, I think that physical punishment (when done reasonably and in moderation) is beneficial, because the child responds to it much more than to words.
translation.source: Osobně si myslím, že fyzické tresty (v rozumném provedení a míře) jsou prospěšné, protože dítě na ně reaguje mnohem více, než na slova.
translation.medium: Personally, I believe that physical punishment (in a reasonable manner and degree) is beneficial because children respond to it much more than words.
translation.reference: Personally, I think that physical punishment (when done reasonably and in moderation) is beneficial, because the child responds to it much more than to words.

translation.cs: Důležité je podle mě ta část s varováním, protože to dává dítěti svým způsobem na výběr zda neposlechne a dostane, nebo se polepší a trest nebude.
translation.en: I think the warning part is important because it gives the child a choice in a way whether to disobey and get punished or to do better and not get punished.
translation.source: Důležité je podle mě ta část s varováním, protože to dává dítěti svým způsobem na výběr zda neposlechne a dostane, nebo se polepší a trest nebude.
translation.medium: In my opinion, the most important part is the warning, because it gives the child the choice of whether or not to obey and get punished, or to improve and not get punished.
translation.reference: I think the warning part is important because it gives the child a choice in a way whether to disobey and get punished or to do better and not get punished.

translation.cs: Mně nakonec většinou stačilo pouze varování abych začala poslouchat.
translation.en: In the end, I usually just needed a warning to start listening.
translation.source: Mně nakonec většinou stačilo pouze varování abych začala poslouchat.
translation.medium: I usually just needed a warning to start listening.
translation.reference: In the end, I usually just needed a warning to start listening.

translation.cs: Obrana systému
translation.en: Defense of the system
translation.source: Obrana systému
translation.medium: Defending the system
translation.reference: Defense of the system

translation.cs: Když významný český právník a ústavní soudce Vojtěch Cepl v roce 1999 odpovídal na novinářský dotaz, co pro něj znamená česká ústava – jestli posvátnou listinu, na niž se přísahá a o které se odmala učí ve škole, nebo naopak dohodu, kterou lze v případě potřeby změnit, rozhodně se přikláněl k prvnímu pojetí.
translation.en: When Vojtěch Cepl, a prominent Czech lawyer and constitutional judge, answered a journalist's question in 1999 as to what the Czech constitution means to him - whether it is a sacred document that is sworn to and taught in school or, on the contrary, an agreement that can be changed if necessary, he was definitely inclined to the first concept.
translation.source: Když významný český právník a ústavní soudce Vojtěch Cepl v roce 1999 odpovídal na novinářský dotaz, co pro něj znamená česká ústava – jestli posvátnou listinu, na niž se přísahá a o které se odmala učí ve škole, nebo naopak dohodu, kterou lze v případě potřeby změnit, rozhodně se přikláněl k prvnímu pojetí.
translation.medium: When the prominent Czech lawyer and constitutional judge Vojtěch Cepl answered a journalist's question in 1999 about what the Czech constitution means to him - whether it is a sacred document that is sworn to and taught in school from an early age, or rather an agreement that can be changed if necessary - he definitely sided with the first interpretation.
translation.reference: When Vojtěch Cepl, a prominent Czech lawyer and constitutional judge, answered a journalist's question in 1999 as to what the Czech constitution means to him - whether it is a sacred document that is sworn to and taught in school or, on the contrary, an agreement that can be changed if necessary, he was definitely inclined to the first concept.

translation.cs: Jednou jsme se v ústavě shodli na demokratických pravidlech našeho života, která zároveň definují, kdo jako stát a jeho občané jsme, a se změnami je lépe šetřit.
translation.en: Once we have agreed in the constitution on the democratic rules of our lives that also define who we are as a country and its citizens, it is better to economize with change.
translation.source: Jednou jsme se v ústavě shodli na demokratických pravidlech našeho života, která zároveň definují, kdo jako stát a jeho občané jsme, a se změnami je lépe šetřit.
translation.medium: Once we agreed on the democratic rules of our lives, which also define who we are as a state and its citizens, we should be more careful with changes.
translation.reference: Once we have agreed in the constitution on the democratic rules of our lives that also define who we are as a country and its citizens, it is better to economize with change.

translation.cs: A představte si: některé národy mají svá pravidla dokonce rády.
translation.en: And imagine: some nations even like their rules.
translation.source: A představte si: některé národy mají svá pravidla dokonce rády.
translation.medium: And imagine: some nations actually like their rules.
translation.reference: And imagine: some nations even like their rules.

translation.cs: Tak jako mají Češi rádi knedlíky s vepřovou a zelím, glosoval tenkrát otázku Vojtěch Cepl.
translation.en: Just like Czechs like dumplings with pork and cabbage, Vojtěch Cepl commented on the question at the time.
translation.source: Tak jako mají Češi rádi knedlíky s vepřovou a zelím, glosoval tenkrát otázku Vojtěch Cepl.
translation.medium: Just as the Czechs love dumplings with pork and sauerkraut, Vojtěch Cepl commented at the time.
translation.reference: Just like Czechs like dumplings with pork and cabbage, Vojtěch Cepl commented on the question at the time.

translation.cs: V poslední době se však mezi právníky stále častěji objevuje názor, že Ústava ČR změny potřebuje.
translation.en: Recently, however, there has been a growing opinion among lawyers that the Constitution of the Czech Republic needs changes.
translation.source: V poslední době se však mezi právníky stále častěji objevuje názor, že Ústava ČR změny potřebuje.
translation.medium: In recent years, however, lawyers have become increasingly convinced that the Czech Constitution needs to be amended.
translation.reference: Recently, however, there has been a growing opinion among lawyers that the Constitution of the Czech Republic needs changes.

translation.cs: Léta je testována situacemi, které její tvůrci (k nimž Vojtěch Cepl patřil) nemohli předvídat, například s chováním přímo zvoleného prezidenta.
translation.en: For years, it has been tested by situations that its creators (of whom Vojtěch Cepl was one) could not have foreseen, such as the behavior of the directly elected president.
translation.source: Léta je testována situacemi, které její tvůrci (k nimž Vojtěch Cepl patřil) nemohli předvídat, například s chováním přímo zvoleného prezidenta.
translation.medium: It has been tested by situations that its creators (to whom Vojtěch Cepl belonged) could not foresee, such as the behaviour of the directly elected president.
translation.reference: For years, it has been tested by situations that its creators (of whom Vojtěch Cepl was one) could not have foreseen, such as the behavior of the directly elected president.

translation.cs: V jedné věci měl ale Cepl pravdu.
translation.en: But Cepl was right about one thing.
translation.source: V jedné věci měl ale Cepl pravdu.
translation.medium: However, Cepl was right about one thing.
translation.reference: But Cepl was right about one thing.

translation.cs: Vše, co o takových dokumentech víme, ukazuje, že politické zásahy do jejich textů musí být promyšlené.
translation.en: Everything we know about these documents shows that political interventions in the text must be deliberate.
translation.source: Vše, co o takových dokumentech víme, ukazuje, že politické zásahy do jejich textů musí být promyšlené.
translation.medium: Everything we know about such documents shows that political interventions in their texts must be well thought out.
translation.reference: Everything we know about these documents shows that political interventions in the text must be deliberate.

translation.cs: Ústavu je třeba chápat a aktivně bránit, jen pak může být klíčem pro zvládnutí většiny krizí, které společnosti napříč dějinami potkávají.
translation.en: The Constitution must be understood and actively defended, only then can it be the key to dealing with most of the crises that societies throughout history have faced.
translation.source: Ústavu je třeba chápat a aktivně bránit, jen pak může být klíčem pro zvládnutí většiny krizí, které společnosti napříč dějinami potkávají.
translation.medium: The institution must be understood and actively defended, only then can it be the key to overcoming most of the crises that societies have faced throughout history.
translation.reference: The Constitution must be understood and actively defended, only then can it be the key to dealing with most of the crises that societies throughout history have faced.

translation.cs: Ústava je mimo jiné jakýsi řád vládnutí sestávající z jednotlivých pravidel, která stanovují politikům mantinely hry.
translation.en: A constitution is, among other things, a kind of order of governance consisting of individual rules that set the boundaries of the game for politicians.
translation.source: Ústava je mimo jiné jakýsi řád vládnutí sestávající z jednotlivých pravidel, která stanovují politikům mantinely hry.
translation.medium: The Constitution is, among other things, a sort of rulebook for governing, setting boundaries for politicians.
translation.reference: A constitution is, among other things, a kind of order of governance consisting of individual rules that set the boundaries of the game for politicians.

translation.cs: Bojíme se, že moc bude zneužita proti menšinám či jednotlivcům, takže politiky svazujeme zákazy.
translation.en: We fear that power will be used against minorities or individuals, so we bind politicians with restrictions.
translation.source: Bojíme se, že moc bude zneužita proti menšinám či jednotlivcům, takže politiky svazujeme zákazy.
translation.medium: We fear that power will be abused against minorities or individuals, so we bind politicians with bans.
translation.reference: We fear that power will be used against minorities or individuals, so we bind politicians with restrictions.

translation.cs: Zároveň ale ústavní texty také umožňují, aby politici svou moc.
translation.en: But at the same time, constitutional texts also allow politicians power.
translation.source: Zároveň ale ústavní texty také umožňují, aby politici svou moc.
translation.medium: At the same time, constitutional texts also allow politicians to exercise their power.
translation.reference: But at the same time, constitutional texts also allow politicians power.

translation.cs: Covid si nevybírá, v FN Brno bojují o život několikaměsíčního miminka
translation.en: Covid doesn't choose. A months-old baby is fighting for its life in Brno University Hospital
translation.source: Covid si nevybírá, v FN Brno bojují o život několikaměsíčního miminka
translation.medium: Covid doesn't discriminate, at FN Brno several-month-old baby is fighting for its life
translation.reference: Covid doesn't choose. A months-old baby is fighting for its life in Brno University Hospital

translation.cs: Přestože se ví, že koronavirus bývá k dětem mírnější, najdou se i těžké případy, se kterými se nemocnice potýkají hlavně v poslední době.
translation.en: Although it is known that the coronavirus tends to be milder in children, there are also severe cases, which hospitals have mainly been dealing with recently.
translation.source: Přestože se ví, že koronavirus bývá k dětem mírnější, najdou se i těžké případy, se kterými se nemocnice potýkají hlavně v poslední době.
translation.medium: Although it is known that the coronavirus tends to be milder towards children, there are also severe cases that hospitals have been struggling with recently.
translation.reference: Although it is known that the coronavirus tends to be milder in children, there are also severe cases, which hospitals have mainly been dealing with recently.

translation.cs: „Víme, že děti jsou ohrožené a zasažené méně než dospělí, mluví se o 2 až 5 procentech v porovnání s dospělými,“ řekl Novinkám primář Kliniky dětské anesteziologie a resuscitace Fakultní nemocnice Brno a Lékařské fakulty Masarykovy univerzity Petr Dominik.
translation.en: "We know that children are less at risk and affected than adults, we are talking about 2 to 5 percent compared to adults," Petr Dominik, head of the Department of Pediatric Anesthesiology and Resuscitation at Brno University Hospital and Masaryk University Faculty of Medicine, told Novosti.
translation.source: „Víme, že děti jsou ohrožené a zasažené méně než dospělí, mluví se o 2 až 5 procentech v porovnání s dospělými,“ řekl Novinkám primář Kliniky dětské anesteziologie a resuscitace Fakultní nemocnice Brno a Lékařské fakulty Masarykovy univerzity Petr Dominik.
translation.medium: We know that children are less endangered and affected than adults, with 2 to 5 percent compared to adults, said Petr Dominik, head of the Department of Paediatric Anesthesiology and Resuscitation at Fakultní nemocnice Brno and Masaryk University Faculty of Medicine.
translation.reference: "We know that children are less at risk and affected than adults, we are talking about 2 to 5 percent compared to adults," Petr Dominik, head of the Department of Pediatric Anesthesiology and Resuscitation at Brno University Hospital and Masaryk University Faculty of Medicine, told Novosti.

translation.cs: Průběh bývá podstatně jednodušší, lehčí, často probíhá bez příznaků.
translation.en: The course is usually much simpler, easier, and often without symptoms.
translation.source: Průběh bývá podstatně jednodušší, lehčí, často probíhá bez příznaků.
translation.medium: The course is much simpler, lighter, and often without symptoms.
translation.reference: The course is usually much simpler, easier, and often without symptoms.

translation.cs: Jsou ale dětští pacienti, kteří jsou s koronavirem nemocní těžce, což vidíme zejména v posledním období," dodal Dominik.
translation.en: But some pediatric patients are severely ill with the coronavirus, which we have particularly seen recently," Dominik said.
translation.source: Jsou ale dětští pacienti, kteří jsou s koronavirem nemocní těžce, což vidíme zejména v posledním období," dodal Dominik.
translation.medium: However, there are child patients who are seriously ill with the coronavirus, which we can see especially in recent times," added Dominik.
translation.reference: But some pediatric patients are severely ill with the coronavirus, which we have particularly seen recently," Dominik said.

translation.cs: Podle lékaře se jedná o desítky dětí, které potřebují mírnou podpůrnou péči.
translation.en: According to the doctor, there are dozens of children in need of moderate supportive care.
translation.source: Podle lékaře se jedná o desítky dětí, které potřebují mírnou podpůrnou péči.
translation.medium: According to the doctor, there are dozens of children who need mild support.
translation.reference: According to the doctor, there are dozens of children in need of moderate supportive care.

translation.cs: Ta se odehrává na klinice dětských infekčních nemocí.
translation.en: They are taken care of in the pediatric infectious diseases clinic.
translation.source: Ta se odehrává na klinice dětských infekčních nemocí.
translation.medium: It is set in a children's infectious disease clinic.
translation.reference: They are taken care of in the pediatric infectious diseases clinic.

translation.cs: Opravdu velmi závažně nemocné děti s koronavirem jsou až v poslední době na ARU.
translation.en: It is only recently that very seriously ill children with coronavirus arrived in the ARU.
translation.source: Opravdu velmi závažně nemocné děti s koronavirem jsou až v poslední době na ARU.
translation.medium: Seriously ill children with the coronavirus have only recently been admitted to ARU.
translation.reference: It is only recently that very seriously ill children with coronavirus arrived in the ARU.

translation.cs: Děti s postcovidovými syndromy byly na oddělení dle lékaře kontinuálně v průběhu celého roku.
translation.en: Children suffering from post-Covid syndromes were in the ward continuously throughout the year, according to the physician.
translation.source: Děti s postcovidovými syndromy byly na oddělení dle lékaře kontinuálně v průběhu celého roku.
translation.medium: According to the doctor, children with post-COVID syndromes were continuously admitted to the department throughout the year.
translation.reference: Children suffering from post-Covid syndromes were in the ward continuously throughout the year, according to the physician.

translation.cs: „Teď je nárůst dětí s akutní covidovou pneumonií, to znamená se zápalem plic, která vyžaduje pobyt na resuscitačním lůžku,“ řekl a dodal, že tato nemoc zasahuje vedle dospělých jak adolescenty, tak i několikaměsíční miminka.
translation.en: "There is now an increase in children with acute Covid pneumonia, that is, pneumonia that requires a stay in a resuscitation bed," he said, adding that the disease affects adolescents as well as babies under 1 in addition to adults.
translation.source: „Teď je nárůst dětí s akutní covidovou pneumonií, to znamená se zápalem plic, která vyžaduje pobyt na resuscitačním lůžku,“ řekl a dodal, že tato nemoc zasahuje vedle dospělých jak adolescenty, tak i několikaměsíční miminka.
translation.medium: Now there is an increase in children with acute covid pneumonia, which means pneumonia requiring resuscitation, he said, adding that the disease affects not only adults but also adolescents and several-month-old babies.
translation.reference: "There is now an increase in children with acute Covid pneumonia, that is, pneumonia that requires a stay in a resuscitation bed," he said, adding that the disease affects adolescents as well as babies under 1 in addition to adults.

translation.cs: V nemocnicích se vyskytují i děti v těžkém stavu kvůli koronaviru.
translation.en: There are also children hospitalized in a serious condition due to coronavirus.
translation.source: V nemocnicích se vyskytují i děti v těžkém stavu kvůli koronaviru.
translation.medium: There are also children in serious condition in hospitals due to the coronavirus.
translation.reference: There are also children hospitalized in a serious condition due to coronavirus.

translation.cs: „V současné době u nás leží dítě několikaměsíční i adolescentního věku,“ uvedl primář.
translation.en: "We currently have a child several months old and an adolescent," said the consultant.
translation.source: „V současné době u nás leží dítě několikaměsíční i adolescentního věku,“ uvedl primář.
translation.medium: At the moment, we have a child of several months and an adolescent, said the head physician.
translation.reference: "We currently have a child several months old and an adolescent," said the consultant.

translation.cs: Má ovšem radost, že v dětské nemocnici FN Brno zatím na koronavirus nezaznamenali žádné dětské úmrtí.
translation.en: However, he is happy that no child deaths from coronavirus have been recorded at the Children's Hospital of the University Hospital Brno so far.
translation.source: Má ovšem radost, že v dětské nemocnici FN Brno zatím na koronavirus nezaznamenali žádné dětské úmrtí.
translation.medium: However, he is happy that so far no child has died of the coronavirus in the Children's Hospital of the FN Brno.
translation.reference: However, he is happy that no child deaths from coronavirus have been recorded at the Children's Hospital of the University Hospital Brno so far.

translation.cs: Podle dostupných dat došlo v ČR k 6. prosinci k úmrtí šesti dětí ve věku 0 až 14 let.
translation.en: According to available data, there were six deaths of children aged 0 to 14 in the Czech Republic as of December 6th.
translation.source: Podle dostupných dat došlo v ČR k 6. prosinci k úmrtí šesti dětí ve věku 0 až 14 let.
translation.medium: According to available data, six children aged 0 to 14 died in the Czech Republic on 6 December.
translation.reference: According to available data, there were six deaths of children aged 0 to 14 in the Czech Republic as of December 6th.

translation.cs: Podle Dominika je v dětské nemocnici – nejen na koronavirovém oddělení – nedílnou součástí spolupráce psychologa.
translation.en: According to Dominik, in the children's hospital – not just in the Covid unit – the collaboration of a psychologist is an integral part.
translation.source: Podle Dominika je v dětské nemocnici – nejen na koronavirovém oddělení – nedílnou součástí spolupráce psychologa.
translation.medium: According to Dominik, the psychologist is an integral part of the cooperation in the children's hospital - not only in the coronavirus department.
translation.reference: According to Dominik, in the children's hospital – not just in the Covid unit – the collaboration of a psychologist is an integral part.

translation.cs: Zároveň také upozorňuje na fakt, že stejně jako u dospělých, tak i u dětí očkování zmírňuje průběh nemoci a současně snižuje výskyt postcovidového syndromu.
translation.en: It also highlights the fact that, as in adults, vaccination in children reduces the severity of the disease and at the same time reduces the incidence of post-Covid syndrome.
translation.source: Zároveň také upozorňuje na fakt, že stejně jako u dospělých, tak i u dětí očkování zmírňuje průběh nemoci a současně snižuje výskyt postcovidového syndromu.
translation.medium: At the same time, it points out that, just like in adults, vaccination mitigates the course of the disease and reduces the incidence of post-COVID syndrome in children.
translation.reference: It also highlights the fact that, as in adults, vaccination in children reduces the severity of the disease and at the same time reduces the incidence of post-Covid syndrome.

translation.cs: „Proto aplikaci očkovací dávky doporučujeme i u dětí,“ dodal lékař.
translation.en: "That's why we recommend administering the vaccine dose to children," the doctor added.
translation.source: „Proto aplikaci očkovací dávky doporučujeme i u dětí,“ dodal lékař.
translation.medium: That is why we recommend vaccinating children as well, the doctor added.
translation.reference: "That's why we recommend administering the vaccine dose to children," the doctor added.

translation.cs: V klidové zóně můžeš chodit pouze po vyznačených cestách.
translation.en: You can only walk on designated paths in the quiet zone.
translation.source: V klidové zóně můžeš chodit pouze po vyznačených cestách.
translation.medium: In the quiet zone, you can only walk on marked paths.
translation.reference: You can only walk on designated paths in the quiet zone.

translation.cs: Ale ty klidové zóny nejsou až tak velké.
translation.en: But the quiet zones aren't that big.
translation.source: Ale ty klidové zóny nejsou až tak velké.
translation.medium: But those quiet zones aren't that big.
translation.reference: But the quiet zones aren't that big.

translation.cs: Jsou vidět na turistické mapě na mapy.cz.
translation.en: They can be seen on the tourist map on mapy.cz.
translation.source: Jsou vidět na turistické mapě na mapy.cz.
translation.medium: They can be seen on the tourist map on mapy.cz.
translation.reference: They can be seen on the tourist map on mapy.cz.

translation.cs: Obecně v národních parcích mimo klidovou zónu můžeš chodit kdekoliv (ale nelez přes plot do obory).
translation.en: Generally, in national parks outside the rest area you can walk anywhere (but don't climb over the fence into the game reserve).
translation.source: Obecně v národních parcích mimo klidovou zónu můžeš chodit kdekoliv (ale nelez přes plot do obory).
translation.medium: In national parks outside the quiet zone, you can walk anywhere (but don't climb over fences into enclosures).
translation.reference: Generally, in national parks outside the rest area you can walk anywhere (but don't climb over the fence into the game reserve).

translation.cs: Lyžovat/jezdit na kole v lese mimo označené cesty se nesmí nikde pokud nemáš výjimku (ale samozřejmě se to mimo národní parky až tak moc nehlídá).
translation.en: You can't ski/bike in the forest outside of marked trails anywhere unless you have a waiver (but of course it's not policed that much outside of national parks).
translation.source: Lyžovat/jezdit na kole v lese mimo označené cesty se nesmí nikde pokud nemáš výjimku (ale samozřejmě se to mimo národní parky až tak moc nehlídá).
translation.medium: You are not allowed to ski/ride a bike in the forest outside of marked trails anywhere, unless you have an exception (but of course this is not really enforced outside of national parks).
translation.reference: You can't ski/bike in the forest outside of marked trails anywhere unless you have a waiver (but of course it's not policed that much outside of national parks).

translation.cs: Jak cvičí dirigent?
translation.en: How does a conductor practice?
translation.source: Jak cvičí dirigent?
translation.medium: How does a conductor train?
translation.reference: How does a conductor practice?

translation.cs: Hudba mi jede v hlavě, směje se Josef Kurfiřt.
translation.en: Music is in my head, laughs Josef Kurfiřt.
translation.source: Hudba mi jede v hlavě, směje se Josef Kurfiřt.
translation.medium: The music is running through my head, smiles Josef Kurfiřt.
translation.reference: Music is in my head, laughs Josef Kurfiřt.

translation.cs: Je odkojený libereckou operou a původně hrál na lesní roh.
translation.en: He was brought up by the Liberec opera and originally played the French horn.
translation.source: Je odkojený libereckou operou a původně hrál na lesní roh.
translation.medium: He was brought up on Liberec Opera and originally played the French horn.
translation.reference: He was brought up by the Liberec opera and originally played the French horn.

translation.cs: Jako pěvec může zpívat prakticky veškerý repertoár a jako dirigent působí nejen v libereckém Divadle F. Šaldy, ale třeba také v Plzni, v Divadle Josefa Kajetána Tyla.
translation.en: As a singer, he can sing almost anything in the repertoire and as a conductor he works not only at the F. Šalda Theatre in Liberec, but also in Pilsen, at the Josef Kajetán Tyl Theatre.
translation.source: Jako pěvec může zpívat prakticky veškerý repertoár a jako dirigent působí nejen v libereckém Divadle F. Šaldy, ale třeba také v Plzni, v Divadle Josefa Kajetána Tyla.
translation.medium: As a singer, he can perform practically any repertoire, and as a conductor, he works not only at the Liberec F. X. Šaldy Theatre, but also in Plzeň, at the Divadlo Josefa Kajetána Tyla.
translation.reference: As a singer, he can sing almost anything in the repertoire and as a conductor he works not only at the F. Šalda Theatre in Liberec, but also in Pilsen, at the Josef Kajetán Tyl Theatre.

translation.cs: Spolupracuje s hradeckou filharmonií, s filmovou filharmonií nebo s podkrkonošským symfonickým orchestrem.
translation.en: He collaborates with the Hradec Králové Philharmonic Orchestra, the film philharmonic orchestra and the Podkrkonoše Symphony Orchestra.
translation.source: Spolupracuje s hradeckou filharmonií, s filmovou filharmonií nebo s podkrkonošským symfonickým orchestrem.
translation.medium: He collaborates with the Hradec Králové Philharmonic Orchestra, the Film Orchestra or the Podkrkonošský Symphonic Orchestra.
translation.reference: He collaborates with the Hradec Králové Philharmonic Orchestra, the film philharmonic orchestra and the Podkrkonoše Symphony Orchestra.

translation.cs: Čína buduje dojem zvládnuté nákazy a toho, že autoritářský režim čelí krizi lépe
translation.en: China gives the impression that the infection has been contained and that the authoritarian regime is facing the crisis better
translation.source: Čína buduje dojem zvládnuté nákazy a toho, že autoritářský režim čelí krizi lépe
translation.medium: China projects image of controlled epidemic as authoritarian regime fares better in crisis
translation.reference: China gives the impression that the infection has been contained and that the authoritarian regime is facing the crisis better

translation.cs: Sinolog Jirouš: Čína buduje dojem zvládnuté nákazy a toho, že autoritářský režim čelí krizi lépe.
translation.en: Jirouš, the synologist: China gives the impression that the infection has been contained and that the authoritarian regime is facing the crisis better
translation.source: Sinolog Jirouš: Čína buduje dojem zvládnuté nákazy a toho, že autoritářský režim čelí krizi lépe.
translation.medium: Sinologist Jirouš: China is creating the impression that the epidemic is under control and that the authoritarian regime is better equipped to deal with the crisis.
translation.reference: Jirouš, the synologist: China gives the impression that the infection has been contained and that the authoritarian regime is facing the crisis better

translation.cs: Čína vyrazila do zdravotnické i politické ofenzivy.
translation.en: China has taken the medical and political offensive.
translation.source: Čína vyrazila do zdravotnické i politické ofenzivy.
translation.medium: China has launched a health and political offensive.
translation.reference: China has taken the medical and political offensive.

translation.cs: Před pár měsíci Peking odrážel kritiku za to, že nezvládnul zastavit nákazu, která se proměnila v globální pandemii.
translation.en: A few months ago, Beijing deflected criticism for failing to stop a disease that became a global pandemic.
translation.source: Před pár měsíci Peking odrážel kritiku za to, že nezvládnul zastavit nákazu, která se proměnila v globální pandemii.
translation.medium: A few months ago, Beijing was fending off criticism for failing to contain an outbreak that has become a global pandemic.
translation.reference: A few months ago, Beijing deflected criticism for failing to stop a disease that became a global pandemic.

translation.cs: Teď země hlásí nulový přírůstek nakažených.
translation.en: Now the country is reporting zero infections.
translation.source: Teď země hlásí nulový přírůstek nakažených.
translation.medium: Now the country is reporting zero new cases.
translation.reference: Now the country is reporting zero infections.

translation.cs: Státy včetně Česka soupeří o čínské ochranné pomůcky a čínští lékaři mnohde pomáhají v boji s koronavirem, například i v nejhůře postižené Itálii.
translation.en: Countries, including the Czech Republic, are competing for Chinese protective equipment and Chinese doctors are helping in the fight against the coronavirus in many places, for example in Italy which is affected the worst.
translation.source: Státy včetně Česka soupeří o čínské ochranné pomůcky a čínští lékaři mnohde pomáhají v boji s koronavirem, například i v nejhůře postižené Itálii.
translation.medium: States including the Czech Republic are competing for Chinese protective equipment and Chinese doctors are helping in the fight against the coronavirus, for example, in the worst-hit Italy.
translation.reference: Countries, including the Czech Republic, are competing for Chinese protective equipment and Chinese doctors are helping in the fight against the coronavirus in many places, for example in Italy which is affected the worst.

translation.cs: Jak vnímat ochotu Pekingu?
translation.en: How to perceive Beijing's willingness?
translation.source: Jak vnímat ochotu Pekingu?
translation.medium: How to perceive Beijing's willingness?
translation.reference: How to perceive Beijing's willingness?

translation.cs: Jde o přátelskou podporu nebo se komunistický režim snaží vylepšit svůj obraz ve světě?
translation.en: Is it friendly support or has the communist regime been trying to improve its image in the world?
translation.source: Jde o přátelskou podporu nebo se komunistický režim snaží vylepšit svůj obraz ve světě?
translation.medium: Is it friendly support or is the communist regime trying to improve its image in the world?
translation.reference: Is it friendly support or has the communist regime been trying to improve its image in the world?

translation.cs: Potká kamarád kamaráda a říká mu: hele nechceš sloníka?
translation.en: A friend meets a friend of a friend and says to him: hey do you want an elephant?
translation.source: Potká kamarád kamaráda a říká mu: hele nechceš sloníka?
translation.medium: A friend meets a friend and says: hey, do you want an elephant?
translation.reference: A friend meets a friend of a friend and says to him: hey do you want an elephant?

translation.cs: Mám ho a je parádní.
translation.en: I got it and it's awesome.
translation.source: Mám ho a je parádní.
translation.medium: I have it and it's great.
translation.reference: I got it and it's awesome.

translation.cs: Manželka je ráda, protože spásá trávu, auto chobotem umyje, děti si s ním hrajou.
translation.en: My wife likes it because it keeps the grass trimmed, washes the car with its trunk, and the kids play with it.
translation.source: Manželka je ráda, protože spásá trávu, auto chobotem umyje, děti si s ním hrajou.
translation.medium: My wife is happy because he mows the lawn, washes the car with his trunk, and the children play with him.
translation.reference: My wife likes it because it keeps the grass trimmed, washes the car with its trunk, and the kids play with it.

translation.cs: No prostě paráda.
translation.en: Oh, just great.
translation.source: No prostě paráda.
translation.medium: It's just great.
translation.reference: Oh, just great.

translation.cs: Jestli chceš za 5000,- ti sloníka prodám.
translation.en: I'll sell you the elephant for 5000.
translation.source: Jestli chceš za 5000,- ti sloníka prodám.
translation.medium: If you want, I can sell you a sloth for 5000 CZK.
translation.reference: I'll sell you the elephant for 5000.

translation.cs: Kamarád: tak jo plácnem si, to bude paráda...
translation.en: Friend: okay, let's shake on it, that'll be great...
translation.source: Kamarád: tak jo plácnem si, to bude paráda...
translation.medium: Friend: OK, I'll give it a go...
translation.reference: Friend: okay, let's shake on it, that'll be great...

translation.cs: Po nějaké době se potkají a ten co koupil si stěžuje: ty vole, co jsi to prodal za slona????
translation.en: After a while they meet and the one who bought it complains: dude, what kind of elephant did you sell me????
translation.source: Po nějaké době se potkají a ten co koupil si stěžuje: ty vole, co jsi to prodal za slona????
translation.medium: After some time, they meet and the one who bought it complains: man, what did you sell it for?
translation.reference: After a while they meet and the one who bought it complains: dude, what kind of elephant did you sell me????

translation.cs: Trávník rozslapanej, všude obří hovna, auto rozsedl, děti se ho boji a manželka se chce nechat rozvést.
translation.en: Lawn trashed, giant turds everywhere, car trashed, kids scared of it and wife wants a divorce.
translation.source: Trávník rozslapanej, všude obří hovna, auto rozsedl, děti se ho boji a manželka se chce nechat rozvést.
translation.medium: The lawn is trampled, there are giant turds everywhere, the car is wrecked, the kids are scared and the wife wants a divorce.
translation.reference: Lawn trashed, giant turds everywhere, car trashed, kids scared of it and wife wants a divorce.

translation.cs: Ten co prodal říká: nepěkně mluvíš o slonikovi, takhle sloníka neprodáš...
translation.en: The one who sold it says: you don’t talk nicely about an elephant, you won’t sell that elephant...
translation.source: Ten co prodal říká: nepěkně mluvíš o slonikovi, takhle sloníka neprodáš...
translation.medium: The one who sold it says: you don't talk about the elephant like that, you won't sell the elephant like that...
translation.reference: The one who sold it says: you don’t talk nicely about an elephant, you won’t sell that elephant...

translation.cs: Světové dění je ovládané velmocemi.
translation.en: World events are dominated by the great powers.
translation.source: Světové dění je ovládané velmocemi.
translation.medium: The world is ruled by great powers.
translation.reference: World events are dominated by the great powers.

translation.cs: Přestože platí rovnost suverénních států, jsou to právě velmocí, které určují kurz mezinárodního dění.
translation.en: Despite the equality of sovereign states, it is the great powers that determine the course of international events.
translation.source: Přestože platí rovnost suverénních států, jsou to právě velmocí, které určují kurz mezinárodního dění.
translation.medium: Despite the equality of sovereign states, it is the great powers that determine the course of international events.
translation.reference: Despite the equality of sovereign states, it is the great powers that determine the course of international events.

translation.cs: Evropa se takovou velmocí může stát jen pokud bude pracovat na své integraci.
translation.en: Europe can only become power like that if it works on its integration.
translation.source: Evropa se takovou velmocí může stát jen pokud bude pracovat na své integraci.
translation.medium: Europe can only become a great power if it works on its integration.
translation.reference: Europe can only become power like that if it works on its integration.

translation.cs: Ta zatím funguje na úrovni hospodářské a politické (ve vybraných otázkách), chybí však ještě integrace vojenská.
translation.en: This has so far worked at the economic and political level (on selected issues), but military integration is still lacking.
translation.source: Ta zatím funguje na úrovni hospodářské a politické (ve vybraných otázkách), chybí však ještě integrace vojenská.
translation.medium: So far, it has functioned at the economic and political level (in selected areas), but there is still no military integration.
translation.reference: This has so far worked at the economic and political level (on selected issues), but military integration is still lacking.

translation.cs: Osobně si myslím, že Evropa směřuje k federalizaci.
translation.en: Personally, I think that Europe is heading towards federalization.
translation.source: Osobně si myslím, že Evropa směřuje k federalizaci.
translation.medium: Personally, I believe that Europe is heading towards federalization.
translation.reference: Personally, I think that Europe is heading towards federalization.

translation.cs: Nebude to za 10, 15 nebo 20 let.
translation.en: It won't be in 10, 15 or 20 years.
translation.source: Nebude to za 10, 15 nebo 20 let.
translation.medium: It won't be in 10, 15 or 20 years.
translation.reference: It won't be in 10, 15 or 20 years.

translation.cs: Ale třeba v polovině století budou nálady jiné a povede se to.
translation.en: But maybe by mid-century the mood will be different and it’ll work out.
translation.source: Ale třeba v polovině století budou nálady jiné a povede se to.
translation.medium: But maybe in the middle of the century the mood will be different and it will work out.
translation.reference: But maybe by mid-century the mood will be different and it’ll work out.

translation.cs: Taky mě to napadlo a je to dost možné.
translation.en: I thought of that, too, and it's quite possible.
translation.source: Taky mě to napadlo a je to dost možné.
translation.medium: I also thought of that and it is quite possible.
translation.reference: I thought of that, too, and it's quite possible.

translation.cs: Nejsem expert na češtinu, takže možná slovíčkařím.
translation.en: I'm not an expert in Czech, so maybe I'm hairsplitting again.
translation.source: Nejsem expert na češtinu, takže možná slovíčkařím.
translation.medium: I am not an expert on the Czech language, so I may be nitpicking.
translation.reference: I'm not an expert in Czech, so maybe I'm hairsplitting again.

translation.cs: Jenom vycházím z toho, že elipsa většinou zahrnuje 2 různé jednotky na stejné úrovni.
translation.en: I'm just assuming that an ellipse usually involves 2 different units at the same level.
translation.source: Jenom vycházím z toho, že elipsa většinou zahrnuje 2 různé jednotky na stejné úrovni.
translation.medium: I'm just assuming that the ellipse usually includes 2 different units at the same level.
translation.reference: I'm just assuming that an ellipse usually involves 2 different units at the same level.

translation.cs: Vypůjčím si příklad z jiného komentáře “španělské pomeranče a mandarinky”, kdy je jasné, že se jedná o obojí ze Španělska, kdežto u “španělské ovoce a mandarinky” už u mandarinek není jasné, že jsou ze Španělska.
translation.en: I will take an example from another comment, "Spanish oranges and tangerines" makes it clear that both are from Spain, whereas with "Spanish fruit and tangerines" it is no longer clear that the tangerines are from Spain.
translation.source: Vypůjčím si příklad z jiného komentáře “španělské pomeranče a mandarinky”, kdy je jasné, že se jedná o obojí ze Španělska, kdežto u “španělské ovoce a mandarinky” už u mandarinek není jasné, že jsou ze Španělska.
translation.medium: I will borrow an example from another comment, "Spanish oranges and mandarins", where it is clear that both are from Spain, whereas in "Spanish fruit and mandarins" it is not clear that the mandarins are from Spain.
translation.reference: I will take an example from another comment, "Spanish oranges and tangerines" makes it clear that both are from Spain, whereas with "Spanish fruit and tangerines" it is no longer clear that the tangerines are from Spain.

translation.cs: Navíc to zakládám na tom, že věta zní “všech amerických sil” tedy včetně jejich zbraní a že vím, že americké komplexy jsou operovány jen Američany.
translation.en: And I’m basing this on the fact that the sentence reads "all American forces" including their weapons and that I know that American complexes are only operated by Americans.
translation.source: Navíc to zakládám na tom, že věta zní “všech amerických sil” tedy včetně jejich zbraní a že vím, že americké komplexy jsou operovány jen Američany.
translation.medium: Furthermore, I base this on the fact that the sentence says "all American forces" which includes their weapons, and I know that American complexes are operated only by Americans.
translation.reference: And I’m basing this on the fact that the sentence reads "all American forces" including their weapons and that I know that American complexes are only operated by Americans.

translation.cs: Jinými slovy tedy očekávám, že už je to zahrnuto v tom širokém pojmu a není potřeba to dále specifikovat u amerických sil.
translation.en: So, in other words, I expect it's already included in that broad term and there's no need to further specify it for U.S. forces.
translation.source: Jinými slovy tedy očekávám, že už je to zahrnuto v tom širokém pojmu a není potřeba to dále specifikovat u amerických sil.
translation.medium: In other words, I expect that this is already included in the broad definition and there is no need to further specify it for American forces.
translation.reference: So, in other words, I expect it's already included in that broad term and there's no need to further specify it for U.S. forces.

translation.cs: Ale znovu, třeba jenom slovíčkařím :D
translation.en: But again, maybe I'm just splitting hairs :D
translation.source: Ale znovu, třeba jenom slovíčkařím :D
translation.medium: But again, I'm just nitpicking.
translation.reference: But again, maybe I'm just splitting hairs :D

translation.cs: Ať je to tak, či tak, je to nesmyslný požadavek
translation.en: Either way, it's an unreasonable demand
translation.source: Ať je to tak, či tak, je to nesmyslný požadavek
translation.medium: Either way, it's a ridiculous demand
translation.reference: Either way, it's an unreasonable demand

translation.cs: V Tokiu bylo zaznamenáno zemětřesení o síle pěti stupňů.
translation.en: A magnitude five earthquake has been recorded in Tokyo.
translation.source: V Tokiu bylo zaznamenáno zemětřesení o síle pěti stupňů.
translation.medium: A 5.0 magnitude earthquake was recorded in Tokyo.
translation.reference: A magnitude five earthquake has been recorded in Tokyo.

translation.cs: Japonskou metropoli Tokio a okolní oblasti v neděli zasáhlo zemětřesení o síle 5,0 stupně.
translation.en: On Sunday, Japanese capital Tokyo and its surrounding areas were hit by a 5.0 magnitude earthquake.
translation.source: Japonskou metropoli Tokio a okolní oblasti v neděli zasáhlo zemětřesení o síle 5,0 stupně.
translation.medium: A 5.0 magnitude earthquake struck the Japanese capital Tokyo and surrounding areas on Sunday.
translation.reference: On Sunday, Japanese capital Tokyo and its surrounding areas were hit by a 5.0 magnitude earthquake.

translation.cs: Svědci uvedli, že v hlavním městě se chvěly budovy, žádné škody ale zatím nebyly hlášeny.
translation.en: Witnesses said buildings were shaking in the capital, but no damage has yet been reported.
translation.source: Svědci uvedli, že v hlavním městě se chvěly budovy, žádné škody ale zatím nebyly hlášeny.
translation.medium: Witnesses said buildings shook in the capital, but there were no immediate reports of damage.
translation.reference: Witnesses said buildings were shaking in the capital, but no damage has yet been reported.

translation.cs: Nebylo vydáno ani varování před cunami, informovala agentura Reuters.
translation.en: No tsunami warning was issued, Reuters reported.
translation.source: Nebylo vydáno ani varování před cunami, informovala agentura Reuters.
translation.medium: No tsunami warning was issued, Reuters reported.
translation.reference: No tsunami warning was issued, Reuters reported.

translation.cs: Vicki Holland z Británie mučila opičku kosmana Milly
translation.en: Vicki Holland from the UK torturing her pet marmoset, Milly
translation.source: Vicki Holland z Británie mučila opičku kosmana Milly
translation.medium: British woman Vicki Holland tortured capuchin monkey Milly
translation.reference: Vicki Holland from the UK torturing her pet marmoset, Milly

translation.cs: Děsivé záběry ukazují okamžik, kdy se vyděšená opice krčila v záchodové míse, než ji její bezcitná majitelka spláchla a vysmála se jí.
translation.en: The terrifying footage shows the moment the terrified marmoset crouched in the toilet bowl before its heartless owner flushed the toilet and laughed at it.
