translation.source: Děsivé záběry ukazují okamžik, kdy se vyděšená opice krčila v záchodové míse, než ji její bezcitná majitelka spláchla a vysmála se jí.
translation.medium: Shocking footage shows the moment a terrified monkey cowered in a toilet bowl before its heartless owner flushed it down and mocked it.
translation.reference: The terrifying footage shows the moment the terrified marmoset crouched in the toilet bowl before its heartless owner flushed the toilet and laughed at it.

translation.cs: Hollandová opici také krmila párky, kebabem a hamburgery, bez ohledu na její skutečné výživové potřeby.
translation.en: Holland also fed the marmoset sausages, kebabs and burgers neglecting its actual nutritional needs.
translation.source: Hollandová opici také krmila párky, kebabem a hamburgery, bez ohledu na její skutečné výživové potřeby.
translation.medium: Holland also fed the monkey sausages, kebabs and hamburgers, regardless of her actual nutritional needs.
translation.reference: Holland also fed the marmoset sausages, kebabs and burgers neglecting its actual nutritional needs.

translation.cs: Magistrátní soud v Gwentu jí nyní doživotně zakázal chov zvířat, informoval deník The Sun.
translation.en: The Gwent Magistrates’ Court has now banned her from keeping animals for life, The Sun reported.
translation.source: Magistrátní soud v Gwentu jí nyní doživotně zakázal chov zvířat, informoval deník The Sun.
translation.medium: A magistrates court in Gwent has now banned her from keeping animals for life, The Sun reported.
translation.reference: The Gwent Magistrates’ Court has now banned her from keeping animals for life, The Sun reported.

translation.cs: Odborníci na rehabilitaci opic, kteří se o Milly po jejím týrání starají, prohlásili, že tak vyděšeného kosmana ještě nikdy neviděli.
translation.en: The monkey rehabilitation experts, who are caring for Milly after her abuse, said they had never seen such a terrified marmoset.
translation.source: Odborníci na rehabilitaci opic, kteří se o Milly po jejím týrání starají, prohlásili, že tak vyděšeného kosmana ještě nikdy neviděli.
translation.medium: Experts in the rehabilitation of monkeys, who are caring for Milly after her abuse, have said they have never seen a monkey so terrified.
translation.reference: The monkey rehabilitation experts, who are caring for Milly after her abuse, said they had never seen such a terrified marmoset.

translation.cs: Milly strávila téměř dva roky rehabilitací u pracovníků Monkey World v Dorsetu a nyní si opět spokojeně hraje s další zachráněnou opičkou jménem Moon.
translation.en: Milly has spent almost two years rehabilitating with Monkey World staff in Dorset and is now happily playing with another rescued monkey named Moon.
translation.source: Milly strávila téměř dva roky rehabilitací u pracovníků Monkey World v Dorsetu a nyní si opět spokojeně hraje s další zachráněnou opičkou jménem Moon.
translation.medium: Milly spent nearly two years in rehabilitation at Monkey World in Dorset and is now happily playing with another rescued monkey called Moon.
translation.reference: Milly has spent almost two years rehabilitating with Monkey World staff in Dorset and is now happily playing with another rescued monkey named Moon.

translation.cs: Čtyřnásobná matka se přiznala ke dvěma obviněním ze způsobení zbytečného utrpení chráněnému zvířeti.
translation.en: The mother-of-four has pleaded guilty to two counts of causing unnecessary suffering to a protected animal.
translation.source: Čtyřnásobná matka se přiznala ke dvěma obviněním ze způsobení zbytečného utrpení chráněnému zvířeti.
translation.medium: The mother-of-four pleaded guilty to two charges of causing unnecessary suffering to a protected animal.
translation.reference: The mother-of-four has pleaded guilty to two counts of causing unnecessary suffering to a protected animal.

translation.cs: U magistrátního soudu v Gwentu jí byl uložen dvanáctitýdenní trest odnětí svobody s podmíněným odkladem na jeden rok.
translation.en: Holland was given a 12-week jail term, suspended for 12 months at the Gwent Magistrates Court.
translation.source: U magistrátního soudu v Gwentu jí byl uložen dvanáctitýdenní trest odnětí svobody s podmíněným odkladem na jeden rok.
translation.medium: She was sentenced to 12 weeks in prison, suspended for 12 months, at Gwent Magistrates' Court.
translation.reference: Holland was given a 12-week jail term, suspended for 12 months at the Gwent Magistrates Court.

translation.cs: Hollandová byla rovněž odsouzena ke 120 hodinám neplacených prací, dostala doživotní zákaz chovu zvířat a musí zaplatit v přepočtu 12 000 korun soudních nákladů.
translation.en: Holland was also sentenced to 120 hours community service, banned from keeping animals for life, and ordered to pay CZK 12,000 in court costs.
translation.source: Hollandová byla rovněž odsouzena ke 120 hodinám neplacených prací, dostala doživotní zákaz chovu zvířat a musí zaplatit v přepočtu 12 000 korun soudních nákladů.
translation.medium: Holland was also sentenced to 120 hours of community service, banned from keeping animals for life and ordered to pay court costs of around CZK 12,000.
translation.reference: Holland was also sentenced to 120 hours community service, banned from keeping animals for life, and ordered to pay CZK 12,000 in court costs.

translation.cs: Vedoucí týmu Small Monkeys, který týrané zvíře rehabilitoval, Steph Sawyerová, řekla: „Milly je v pořádku, ale rehabilitace bude ještě dále pokračovat.“
translation.en: The Small Monkeys team leader who rehabilitated the abused animal, Steph Sawyer, said: "Milly is fine but rehabilitation will continue."
translation.source: Vedoucí týmu Small Monkeys, který týrané zvíře rehabilitoval, Steph Sawyerová, řekla: „Milly je v pořádku, ale rehabilitace bude ještě dále pokračovat.“
translation.medium: Leader of the Small Monkeys team, Steph Sawyer, said: "Milly is doing well but her rehabilitation will continue."
translation.reference: The Small Monkeys team leader who rehabilitated the abused animal, Steph Sawyer, said: "Milly is fine but rehabilitation will continue."

translation.cs: Milly trvalo, než si znovu zvykla na lidi.
translation.en: It took Milly a while to get used to people again.
translation.source: Milly trvalo, než si znovu zvykla na lidi.
translation.medium: It took Milly a while to get used to people again.
translation.reference: It took Milly a while to get used to people again.

translation.cs: Krčila a schovávala se před každým, koho potkala a jakýkoli hlasitý zvuk nebo náhlý pohyb ji přiměl ke křiku.
translation.en: She cowered and hid from everyone she saw, and any loud noise or sudden movement made her scream.
translation.source: Krčila a schovávala se před každým, koho potkala a jakýkoli hlasitý zvuk nebo náhlý pohyb ji přiměl ke křiku.
translation.medium: She would crouch and hide from anyone she met and any loud noise or sudden movement would cause her to scream.
translation.reference: She cowered and hid from everyone she saw, and any loud noise or sudden movement made her scream.

translation.cs: Opička odmítala dlouho dobu i jíst.
translation.en: The marmoset refused to eat for a long time.
translation.source: Opička odmítala dlouho dobu i jíst.
translation.medium: The monkey refused to eat for a long time.
translation.reference: The marmoset refused to eat for a long time.

translation.cs: I teď, když se usadila a je spokojená se samcem, může v ní pohled na nové lidi stále vyvolat paniku.
translation.en: Even now that she has settled down and is happy with the male, the sight of new people can still cause her to panic.
translation.source: I teď, když se usadila a je spokojená se samcem, může v ní pohled na nové lidi stále vyvolat paniku.
translation.medium: Even now, when she has settled and is happy with her mate, the sight of new people can still cause her to panic.
translation.reference: Even now that she has settled down and is happy with the male, the sight of new people can still cause her to panic.

translation.cs: Psychické jizvy z týrání ji budou provázet navždy, dodává Sawyerová.
translation.en: The psychological trauma of the abuse will always be with her, Sawyer said.
translation.source: Psychické jizvy z týrání ji budou provázet navždy, dodává Sawyerová.
translation.medium: Psychological scars from the abuse will stay with her forever, Sawyer added.
translation.reference: The psychological trauma of the abuse will always be with her, Sawyer said.

translation.cs: Týrání Milly vyšlo najevo poté, co policie ve Gwentu objevila děsivé záběry v ženině telefonu po razii v jejím bytě kvůli obvinění z drog.
translation.en: Milly's abuse came to light after police in Gwent discovered horrifying footage on the woman's phone following a raid on her flat on drug charges.
translation.source: Týrání Milly vyšlo najevo poté, co policie ve Gwentu objevila děsivé záběry v ženině telefonu po razii v jejím bytě kvůli obvinění z drog.
translation.medium: Milly's abuse was uncovered after police in Gwent found horrific footage on her phone during a drugs raid at her home.
translation.reference: Milly's abuse came to light after police in Gwent discovered horrifying footage on the woman's phone following a raid on her flat on drug charges.

translation.cs: Na záběrech lze slyšet, jak Milly vulgárně nadává.
translation.en: In the footage, you can hear Holland swearing at Milly.
translation.source: Na záběrech lze slyšet, jak Milly vulgárně nadává.
translation.medium: Milly can be heard swearing on the footage.
translation.reference: In the footage, you can hear Holland swearing at Milly.

translation.cs: Na dalším videu je slyšet, jak Hollandová opičce nabízí kokain a říká: „Chceš kokain?“
translation.en: In another video, Holland is offering cocaine to the marmoset and saying: “Want some coke?”
translation.source: Na dalším videu je slyšet, jak Hollandová opičce nabízí kokain a říká: „Chceš kokain?“
translation.medium: In another video, Holland is heard offering the monkey cocaine, saying, "You want some coke?"
translation.reference: In another video, Holland is offering cocaine to the marmoset and saying: “Want some coke?”

translation.cs: Tak mi olízni prsty.
translation.en: Lick my fingers.
translation.source: Tak mi olízni prsty.
translation.medium: So lick my fingers.
translation.reference: Lick my fingers.

translation.cs: V květnu se spolu se svým partnerem Russellem Coxem (43) přiznala k držení kokainu s úmyslem jej prodat.
translation.en: In May, she and her partner, Russell Cox (43), pleaded guilty to possession of cocaine with intent to supply.
translation.source: V květnu se spolu se svým partnerem Russellem Coxem (43) přiznala k držení kokainu s úmyslem jej prodat.
translation.medium: In May, she and her partner Russell Cox (43) admitted possessing cocaine with intent to supply.
translation.reference: In May, she and her partner, Russell Cox (43), pleaded guilty to possession of cocaine with intent to supply.

translation.cs: V jejím domě byl nalezen kokain za 1600 liber (v přepočtu necelých 50 tisíc korun) ukrytý v Kinder vajíčkách.
translation.en: Cocaine worth £1,600 (almost 50,000 Czech crowns) was found hidden in Kinder chocolate eggs in her house.
translation.source: V jejím domě byl nalezen kokain za 1600 liber (v přepočtu necelých 50 tisíc korun) ukrytý v Kinder vajíčkách.
translation.medium: Cocaine worth £1,600 was found hidden in Kinder Eggs at her home.
translation.reference: Cocaine worth £1,600 (almost 50,000 Czech crowns) was found hidden in Kinder chocolate eggs in her house.

translation.cs: Cox byl následně uvězněn na 30 měsíců a Hollandová dostala podmíněný trest 20 měsíců.
translation.en: Cox was subsequently jailed for 30 months and Holland was given a suspended sentence of 20 months.
translation.source: Cox byl následně uvězněn na 30 měsíců a Hollandová dostala podmíněný trest 20 měsíců.
translation.medium: Cox was subsequently sentenced to 30 months in prison and Holland received a suspended sentence of 20 months.
translation.reference: Cox was subsequently jailed for 30 months and Holland was given a suspended sentence of 20 months.

translation.cs: A jaké úžasné koncepty naučíš z toho pravěku třikrát po sobě, když statečně přeskočíš celé 20. století?
translation.en: And what amazing concepts have you learned from prehistory three times in a row when you bravely skip the entire 20th century?
translation.source: A jaké úžasné koncepty naučíš z toho pravěku třikrát po sobě, když statečně přeskočíš celé 20. století?
translation.medium: And what wonderful concepts will you learn from the prehistoric three times in a row, when you bravely jump over the whole 20th century?
translation.reference: And what amazing concepts have you learned from prehistory three times in a row when you bravely skip the entire 20th century?

translation.cs: Jakože si v prváku odneseš ty samé věci jako v šesté třídě?
translation.en: You mean you will take away the same things from your freshman year as you did from year six?
translation.source: Jakože si v prváku odneseš ty samé věci jako v šesté třídě?
translation.medium: So you take the same things with you in the first year as in the sixth year?
translation.reference: You mean you will take away the same things from your freshman year as you did from year six?

translation.cs: A celé to zabíjí idea biflování, kdy nikoho, čest výjimkám, nezajímá, jestli to umíš nebo chápeš.
translation.en: And the whole thing is killed by the idea of cramming, where nobody, with honorable exceptions, cares if you know or understand.
translation.source: A celé to zabíjí idea biflování, kdy nikoho, čest výjimkám, nezajímá, jestli to umíš nebo chápeš.
translation.medium: And the whole thing kills the idea of bifurcation, when nobody, with the exception of a few, cares whether you can do it or understand it.
translation.reference: And the whole thing is killed by the idea of cramming, where nobody, with honorable exceptions, cares if you know or understand.

translation.cs: Hlavně napsat test na 1 a potom už to nikoho nezajímá.
translation.en: Just get an A from the test and then nobody will care.
translation.source: Hlavně napsat test na 1 a potom už to nikoho nezajímá.
translation.medium: The main thing is to write a test on 1 and then nobody cares anymore.
translation.reference: Just get an A from the test and then nobody will care.

translation.cs: Běž a na ulici se náhodně lidí ptej, jestli zvládnout určit charakter kořenů kvadratické rovnice a koeficienty.
translation.en: Go and ask random people on the street if they can manage to define the nature of the roots of a quadratic equation and the coefficients.
translation.source: Běž a na ulici se náhodně lidí ptej, jestli zvládnout určit charakter kořenů kvadratické rovnice a koeficienty.
translation.medium: Run up to people on the street and ask them at random if they know how to find the roots of a quadratic equation and the coefficients.
translation.reference: Go and ask random people on the street if they can manage to define the nature of the roots of a quadratic equation and the coefficients.

translation.cs: Všichni si tím prošli, a absolutní většina si ani neškrtne a řeknou ti, že mají naprosto v piči.
translation.en: They've all been through it, and the absolute majority won't bat an eye and tell you they're totally fucked.
translation.source: Všichni si tím prošli, a absolutní většina si ani neškrtne a řeknou ti, že mají naprosto v piči.
translation.medium: Everyone goes through it, and the vast majority don't even flinch and will tell you they don't care.
translation.reference: They've all been through it, and the absolute majority won't bat an eye and tell you they're totally fucked.

translation.cs: Tak na co se to kurva učí?
translation.en: Then what the fuck are they learning?
translation.source: Tak na co se to kurva učí?
translation.medium: So what the fuck is he learning?
translation.reference: Then what the fuck are they learning?

translation.cs: Já jsem velký fanda všeobecného přehledu a skutečnost je taková, že lidi nechcou a nemají potřebu.
translation.en: I'm a big fan of the general overview and the reality is that people don't want to and don't need to learn it.
translation.source: Já jsem velký fanda všeobecného přehledu a skutečnost je taková, že lidi nechcou a nemají potřebu.
translation.medium: I'm a big fan of general knowledge and the fact is that people don't want and don't need it.
translation.reference: I'm a big fan of the general overview and the reality is that people don't want to and don't need to learn it.

translation.cs: A v tom okamžiku je to zbytečné a nikdy to do nich stejně nedostaneš.
translation.en: And at that point it's pointless anyway so you'll never get them to learn it anyway.
translation.source: A v tom okamžiku je to zbytečné a nikdy to do nich stejně nedostaneš.
translation.medium: And at that point it's pointless and you'll never get it into them.
translation.reference: And at that point it's pointless anyway so you'll never get them to learn it anyway.

translation.cs: Částečně se to učí pro tu spoustu lidí, která tu kterou věc potřebovat bude.
translation.en: Part of it is teaching the many people who will need that kind of thing.
translation.source: Částečně se to učí pro tu spoustu lidí, která tu kterou věc potřebovat bude.
translation.medium: Some of it is learned for the people who will need it.
translation.reference: Part of it is teaching the many people who will need that kind of thing.

translation.cs: Ale jako, tu poznámku že na stání u stroje tohle všechno fakt nepotřebuješ, jsem myslel naprosto vážně... ...protože prostě nepotřebuješ.
translation.en: But, like, the comment that you don't really need all that to stand next to a machine, I was totally serious... ...because you really don't need it.
translation.source: Ale jako, tu poznámku že na stání u stroje tohle všechno fakt nepotřebuješ, jsem myslel naprosto vážně... ...protože prostě nepotřebuješ.
translation.medium: But, that note that you don't really need all of this while standing at the machine, I meant that quite seriously... ...because you just don't need it.
translation.reference: But, like, the comment that you don't really need all that to stand next to a machine, I was totally serious... ...because you really don't need it.

translation.cs: Navíc se pomalu dostáváme do doby, kdy nevědět je známka punku.
translation.en: Plus, we're slowly getting to a place where not knowing about it is cool.
translation.source: Navíc se pomalu dostáváme do doby, kdy nevědět je známka punku.
translation.medium: Moreover, we are slowly approaching the time when not knowing is a sign of punk.
translation.reference: Plus, we're slowly getting to a place where not knowing about it is cool.

translation.cs: (Na čemž se u nás nejspíš podílí i naše komunistická minulost a štvaní proti vzdělancům a elitám) Ovšem cena toho, že nám u těch strojů budou stát barbaři je prostě vysoká.
translation.en: (Our communist past and the incitement against the educated and the elite probably play a part in this) However, the price of having barbarians standing by our machines is simply too high.
translation.source: (Na čemž se u nás nejspíš podílí i naše komunistická minulost a štvaní proti vzdělancům a elitám) Ovšem cena toho, že nám u těch strojů budou stát barbaři je prostě vysoká.
translation.medium: But the price we pay for having barbarians standing guard over our machines is just too high.
translation.reference: (Our communist past and the incitement against the educated and the elite probably play a part in this) However, the price of having barbarians standing by our machines is simply too high.

translation.cs: Kdyby třeba novináři uměli počítat, tak tady covid nejspíš nikdy nedosáhl těchhle rozměrů.
translation.en: If journalists could count, Covid here would probably never have reached these proportions.
translation.source: Kdyby třeba novináři uměli počítat, tak tady covid nejspíš nikdy nedosáhl těchhle rozměrů.
translation.medium: If journalists knew how to count, the coronavirus would never have reached these proportions.
translation.reference: If journalists could count, Covid here would probably never have reached these proportions.

translation.cs: Svatba na první pohled: Válka Kadriho a Andrey pokračuje!
translation.en: Marriage at first sight: Kadri and Andrea's war continues!
translation.source: Svatba na první pohled: Válka Kadriho a Andrey pokračuje!
translation.medium: Love at first sight: Kadri and Andrea's war continues!
translation.reference: Marriage at first sight: Kadri and Andrea's war continues!

translation.cs: Což je hlavní důvod, proč nemůže Švýcarsko opustit hned," odpověděla Andrea na instagramu ve Stories na všetečné otázky zvědavých fanoušků, co jí na Kadrim tak zklamalo, že se rozhodla ukončit veškerý kontakt a dokonce si ho zablokovat na sociálních sítích.
translation.en: Which is the main reason he can't leave Switzerland right away," Andrea replied on her Instagram Stories to the probing questions of curious fans about what has made her so disappointed in Kadri that she has decided to end all contact and even block him on social media.
translation.source: Což je hlavní důvod, proč nemůže Švýcarsko opustit hned," odpověděla Andrea na instagramu ve Stories na všetečné otázky zvědavých fanoušků, co jí na Kadrim tak zklamalo, že se rozhodla ukončit veškerý kontakt a dokonce si ho zablokovat na sociálních sítích.
translation.medium: Which is the main reason why she can't leave Switzerland right away," Andrea answered on Instagram Stories to the inquisitive fans' questions about why she decided to end all contact with Kadri and even block him on social media.
translation.reference: Which is the main reason he can't leave Switzerland right away," Andrea replied on her Instagram Stories to the probing questions of curious fans about what has made her so disappointed in Kadri that she has decided to end all contact and even block him on social media.

translation.cs: Mezi Kadrim a Andreou to skřípalo už od začátku experimentu.
translation.en: Things had not been going smoothly between Kadri and Andrea since the beginning of the experiment.
translation.source: Mezi Kadrim a Andreou to skřípalo už od začátku experimentu.
translation.medium: Kadrim and Andrea clashed from the start of the experiment.
translation.reference: Things had not been going smoothly between Kadri and Andrea since the beginning of the experiment.

translation.cs: Hlavním problémem byl fakt, že Kadri žil a pracoval ve Švýcarsku a jeho představa byla, že se za ní Andrea odstěhuje, tedy alespoň do doby, než se do Čech vrátí natrvalo.
translation.en: The main problem was the fact that Kadri lived and worked in Switzerland and his idea was that Andrea would move in with him, at least until he moved back to the Czech Republic permanently.
translation.source: Hlavním problémem byl fakt, že Kadri žil a pracoval ve Švýcarsku a jeho představa byla, že se za ní Andrea odstěhuje, tedy alespoň do doby, než se do Čech vrátí natrvalo.
translation.medium: The main problem was that Kadri lived and worked in Switzerland and her idea was that Andrea would move there, at least until she returned to the Czech Republic permanently.
translation.reference: The main problem was the fact that Kadri lived and worked in Switzerland and his idea was that Andrea would move in with him, at least until he moved back to the Czech Republic permanently.

translation.cs: Ta to ale rezolutně odmítala.
translation.en: But she adamantly refused.
translation.source: Ta to ale rezolutně odmítala.
translation.medium: However, she resolutely refused.
translation.reference: But she adamantly refused.

translation.cs: A jak je vidět, jejich vztah nejen že neskončil láskou, ale spíše přerostl ve vzájemnou neúctu až nenávist.
translation.en: And as you can tell, their relationship not only did not end in love, but rather has grown into mutual disrespect and even hatred.
translation.source: A jak je vidět, jejich vztah nejen že neskončil láskou, ale spíše přerostl ve vzájemnou neúctu až nenávist.
translation.medium: And it is clear that their relationship did not end in love, but rather grew into mutual disrespect and even hatred.
translation.reference: And as you can tell, their relationship not only did not end in love, but rather has grown into mutual disrespect and even hatred.

translation.cs: Byl to od tebe naplánovaný útok! rozčiloval se obratem Kadri v reakci na Andreino obvinění ze lží, gamblerství a dluhů.
translation.en: It was a planned attack! Kadri reacts angrily to Andrea's accusations of lies, gambling, and debt.
translation.source: Byl to od tebe naplánovaný útok! rozčiloval se obratem Kadri v reakci na Andreino obvinění ze lží, gamblerství a dluhů.
translation.medium: It was your plan! Kadri fumed in response to Andrei's accusations of lies, gambling and debt.
translation.reference: It was a planned attack! Kadri reacts angrily to Andrea's accusations of lies, gambling, and debt.

translation.cs: Údajná upřímnost Kadriho teď už exmanželky se nelíbila ani jeho mladší sestře Lindě.
translation.en: Kadri's younger sister, Linda, hated the alleged honesty from the now ex-wife .
translation.source: Údajná upřímnost Kadriho teď už exmanželky se nelíbila ani jeho mladší sestře Lindě.
translation.medium: Kadri's alleged honesty did not sit well with his ex-wife or his younger sister Linda.
translation.reference: Kadri's younger sister, Linda, hated the alleged honesty from the now ex-wife .

translation.cs: Ta se rozhodla bratra veřejně zastat.
translation.en: She decided to defend her brother publicly.
translation.source: Ta se rozhodla bratra veřejně zastat.
translation.medium: She decided to publicly defend her brother.
translation.reference: She decided to defend her brother publicly.

translation.cs: Normálně se k takovýmto věcem vůbec nevyjadřuji a ani v rodině jsme si nikdy moc extra tyhle věci neříkali.
translation.en: Usually I don't comment on such things and even in my family we never really talked about these things.
translation.source: Normálně se k takovýmto věcem vůbec nevyjadřuji a ani v rodině jsme si nikdy moc extra tyhle věci neříkali.
translation.medium: Normally, I don't say anything about such things, and in my family, we never really talked about them.
translation.reference: Usually I don't comment on such things and even in my family we never really talked about these things.

translation.cs: Nechci rozhodně vyvolávat nějakou lítost.
translation.en: I certainly don't mean to invoke any pity.
translation.source: Nechci rozhodně vyvolávat nějakou lítost.
translation.medium: I certainly don't want to evoke any sympathy.
translation.reference: I certainly don't mean to invoke any pity.

translation.cs: Když ale vidím někoho, kdo se snaží veřejně ubližovat a špinit jméno někoho, koho mám tak moc ráda, tak mi to prostě nedá!
translation.en: But when I see someone trying to publicly hurt and smear the name of someone I love so much, I just can't help it!
translation.source: Když ale vidím někoho, kdo se snaží veřejně ubližovat a špinit jméno někoho, koho mám tak moc ráda, tak mi to prostě nedá!
translation.medium: But when I see someone trying to publicly hurt and slander someone I love so much, I just can't stand it.
translation.reference: But when I see someone trying to publicly hurt and smear the name of someone I love so much, I just can't help it!

translation.cs: Je mi líto, že to musím dělat touhle cestou, ale chtěla bych tímto veřejně poděkovat mému bratrovi Kadrimu za to, že ze sebe udělal charakter a pomohl naší rodině, když jsme to nejvíc potřebovali i přesto, v jak mladém věku byl.
translation.en: I'm sorry to have to do it this way, but I would like to publicly thank my brother Kadri for making himself into a person of character and helping our family when we needed it most, despite how young he was.
translation.source: Je mi líto, že to musím dělat touhle cestou, ale chtěla bych tímto veřejně poděkovat mému bratrovi Kadrimu za to, že ze sebe udělal charakter a pomohl naší rodině, když jsme to nejvíc potřebovali i přesto, v jak mladém věku byl.
translation.medium: I'm sorry I have to do it this way, but I would like to publicly thank my brother Kadir for being a character and helping our family when we needed it most, even at such a young age.
translation.reference: I'm sorry to have to do it this way, but I would like to publicly thank my brother Kadri for making himself into a person of character and helping our family when we needed it most, despite how young he was.

translation.cs: O to víc mě mrzí, když musím číst takhle nepravdivé informace, které jsou pravděpodobně dost vytržené z kontextu.
translation.en: It makes me even more sorry to have to read such false information that is probably taken out of context.
translation.source: O to víc mě mrzí, když musím číst takhle nepravdivé informace, které jsou pravděpodobně dost vytržené z kontextu.
translation.medium: All the more so when I have to read such false information, which is probably taken out of context.
translation.reference: It makes me even more sorry to have to read such false information that is probably taken out of context.

translation.cs: Hrozně bych všem přála znát Kadriho tak jako já, naši blízcí a rodina, stojí ve vyznání v reakci na slova Andrey.
translation.en: I would dearly like everyone to know Kadri as I do, our loved ones and family, reads the confession in response to Andrea's words.
translation.source: Hrozně bych všem přála znát Kadriho tak jako já, naši blízcí a rodina, stojí ve vyznání v reakci na slova Andrey.
translation.medium: I wish everyone knew Kadri the way we do, our close friends and family, she wrote in response to Andrea's words.
translation.reference: I would dearly like everyone to know Kadri as I do, our loved ones and family, reads the confession in response to Andrea's words.

translation.cs: Jsem mu opravdu vděčná za všechno!
translation.en: I'm really grateful to him for everything!
translation.source: Jsem mu opravdu vděčná za všechno!
translation.medium: I am really grateful to him for everything!
translation.reference: I'm really grateful to him for everything!

translation.cs: Samozřejmě lidi budou věřit tomu, co se píše, ale nejdůležitější je, že my, jeho rodina, ho nade vše milujeme a známe skutečnost a víme, jak to doopravdy bylo, dodala neurčitě.
translation.en: Of course, people will believe what is written, but the most important thing is that we, his family, love him more than anything and we know the truth and we know how it really was, she added vaguely.
translation.source: Samozřejmě lidi budou věřit tomu, co se píše, ale nejdůležitější je, že my, jeho rodina, ho nade vše milujeme a známe skutečnost a víme, jak to doopravdy bylo, dodala neurčitě.
translation.medium: Of course people are going to believe what they read, but the most important thing is that we, his family, love him more than anything and know the truth and know what really happened, she added vaguely.
translation.reference: Of course, people will believe what is written, but the most important thing is that we, his family, love him more than anything and we know the truth and we know how it really was, she added vaguely.

translation.cs: Opilý zloděj vyšplhal po fasádě do pátého patra.
translation.en: A drunken thief climbed up the facade to the fifth floor.
translation.source: Opilý zloděj vyšplhal po fasádě do pátého patra.
translation.medium: The drunk thief climbed up the facade to the fifth floor.
translation.reference: A drunken thief climbed up the facade to the fifth floor.

translation.cs: Neuvěříte, kvůli čemu.
translation.en: You won't believe what it's about.
translation.source: Neuvěříte, kvůli čemu.
translation.medium: You won't believe why.
translation.reference: You won't believe what it's about.

translation.cs: Svou loupežnou výpravu zahájil Cchao na parkovišti v rezidenční čtvrti, kde se snažil vniknout do několika aut.
translation.en: Cao began his heist in a parking lot in a residential neighborhood, where he tried to break into several cars.
translation.source: Svou loupežnou výpravu zahájil Cchao na parkovišti v rezidenční čtvrti, kde se snažil vniknout do několika aut.
translation.medium: Chao began his robbery spree at a parking lot in a residential neighborhood, where he attempted to break into several cars.
translation.reference: Cao began his heist in a parking lot in a residential neighborhood, where he tried to break into several cars.

translation.cs: Podle dostupných informací nakonec z jednoho vozidla odcizil v přepočtu necelých 330 korun.
translation.en: According to available information, he ended up stealing less than 330 crowns from one vehicle.
translation.source: Podle dostupných informací nakonec z jednoho vozidla odcizil v přepočtu necelých 330 korun.
translation.medium: According to available information, he ultimately stole the equivalent of just under 330 Czech crowns from one vehicle.
translation.reference: According to available information, he ended up stealing less than 330 crowns from one vehicle.

translation.cs: Poté ho nenapadlo nic lepšího než vyšplhat do 5. patra a otevřeným oknem vlézt do bytu.
translation.en: Then he could think of nothing better to do than to climb to the fifth floor and enter an apartment through an open window.
translation.source: Poté ho nenapadlo nic lepšího než vyšplhat do 5. patra a otevřeným oknem vlézt do bytu.
translation.medium: His next idea was to climb up to the 5th floor and enter the apartment through the open window.
translation.reference: Then he could think of nothing better to do than to climb to the fifth floor and enter an apartment through an open window.

translation.cs: Tam ukradl dva banány.
translation.en: There he stole two bananas.
translation.source: Tam ukradl dva banány.
translation.medium: There he stole two bananas.
translation.reference: There he stole two bananas.

translation.cs: Na záběru z jedné bezpečnostní kamery je pak zachycen, jak odchází po ulici pryč od místa činu a při tom pojídá banán.
translation.en: One security camera shows him walking down the street away from the crime scene while eating a banana.
translation.source: Na záběru z jedné bezpečnostní kamery je pak zachycen, jak odchází po ulici pryč od místa činu a při tom pojídá banán.
translation.medium: Footage from a security camera then shows him walking away from the scene of the crime, eating a banana.
translation.reference: One security camera shows him walking down the street away from the crime scene while eating a banana.

translation.cs: Když se majitel bytu ráno vzbudil, zjistil, že banány nejsou tam, kde byly, a zavolal policii.
translation.en: When the owner of the apartment woke up in the morning, he found that the bananas were not there and called the police.
translation.source: Když se majitel bytu ráno vzbudil, zjistil, že banány nejsou tam, kde byly, a zavolal policii.
translation.medium: When the apartment owner woke up in the morning, he found that the bananas were not where they were, and he called the police.
translation.reference: When the owner of the apartment woke up in the morning, he found that the bananas were not there and called the police.

translation.cs: Ta následně Cchaa zadržela.
translation.en: They subsequently detained Cao.
translation.source: Ta následně Cchaa zadržela.
translation.medium: Cchaa was subsequently arrested.
translation.reference: They subsequently detained Cao.

translation.cs: Muž se přiznal, že v inkriminovaný den popil něco alkoholu.
translation.en: The man admitted to drinking alcohol on the day in question.
translation.source: Muž se přiznal, že v inkriminovaný den popil něco alkoholu.
translation.medium: The man admitted to having had some alcohol on the day in question.
translation.reference: The man admitted to drinking alcohol on the day in question.

translation.cs: A vzhledem k tomu, že potřeboval peníze, v opilosti se rozhodl loupit.
translation.en: And since he needed money, he decided to steal while drunk.
translation.source: A vzhledem k tomu, že potřeboval peníze, v opilosti se rozhodl loupit.
translation.medium: And since he needed money, he decided to rob while drunk.
translation.reference: And since he needed money, he decided to steal while drunk.

translation.cs: Celá věc je zatím v šetření.
translation.en: The whole thing is still under investigation.
translation.source: Celá věc je zatím v šetření.
translation.medium: The whole thing is still under investigation.
translation.reference: The whole thing is still under investigation.

translation.cs: Opilec vyšplhal po fasádě do 5. patra, kde ukradl dva banány.
translation.en: The drunk man climbed up the outside of the building to the 5th floor, where he stole two bananas.
translation.source: Opilec vyšplhal po fasádě do 5. patra, kde ukradl dva banány.
translation.medium: The drunk climbed up the facade to the fifth floor, where he stole two bananas.
translation.reference: The drunk man climbed up the outside of the building to the 5th floor, where he stole two bananas.

translation.cs: Pandemický zákon je časově omezený a účinností vázán na pandemickou pohotovost.
translation.en: The Pandemic Act is time limited and tied in effect to a pandemic emergency situation.
translation.source: Pandemický zákon je časově omezený a účinností vázán na pandemickou pohotovost.
translation.medium: The pandemic law is time-limited and linked to the pandemic readiness.
translation.reference: The Pandemic Act is time limited and tied in effect to a pandemic emergency situation.

translation.cs: Když ta bude zrušena, zákon nebude účinný.
translation.en: If it is repealed, the law will not be effective.
translation.source: Když ta bude zrušena, zákon nebude účinný.
translation.medium: Without it, the law will not be effective.
translation.reference: If it is repealed, the law will not be effective.

translation.cs: Zákon sice omezuje rozsah podnikání
translation.en: Although the law limits the scope of business
translation.source: Zákon sice omezuje rozsah podnikání
translation.medium: The law does limit the scope of business
translation.reference: Although the law limits the scope of business

translation.cs: To ti jako důvod nestačí?
translation.en: That's not reason enough for you?
translation.source: To ti jako důvod nestačí?
translation.medium: That's not enough of a reason for you?
translation.reference: That's not reason enough for you?

translation.cs: Právo shromažďovat se bude omezeno, ale nikoli zrušeno.
translation.en: The right to assemble will be restricted but not abolished.
translation.source: Právo shromažďovat se bude omezeno, ale nikoli zrušeno.
translation.medium: The right to assemble will be restricted but not abolished.
translation.reference: The right to assemble will be restricted but not abolished.

translation.cs: K sobotním volbám do zastupitelstev čtyř obcí přišlo přes 60 procent voličů
translation.en: More than 60 per cent of voters turned out for Saturday's elections to the four municipal councils
translation.source: K sobotním volbám do zastupitelstev čtyř obcí přišlo přes 60 procent voličů
translation.medium: More than 60 percent of voters turned out for Saturday's local elections
translation.reference: More than 60 per cent of voters turned out for Saturday's elections to the four municipal councils

translation.cs: Nová zastupitelstva lidé v sobotu volili v obcích Komňa na Uherskohradišťsku, Lužice na Mostecku, Nová Ves na Liberecku a v Rovné na Pelhřimovsku.
translation.en: On Saturday, people in the municipalities of Komňa in the Uherské Hradiště region, Lužice in the Most region, Nová Ves in the Liberec region and Rovná in the Pelhřimov region voted for new councils.
translation.source: Nová zastupitelstva lidé v sobotu volili v obcích Komňa na Uherskohradišťsku, Lužice na Mostecku, Nová Ves na Liberecku a v Rovné na Pelhřimovsku.
translation.medium: The new councils were elected on Saturday in the municipalities of Komňa in Uherské Hradiště, Lužice in Most, Nová Ves in Liberec and Rovná in Pelhřimov.
translation.reference: On Saturday, people in the municipalities of Komňa in the Uherské Hradiště region, Lužice in the Most region, Nová Ves in the Liberec region and Rovná in the Pelhřimov region voted for new councils.

translation.cs: Počet zastupitelů v těchto obcích klesl pod zákonem stanovený počet nebo se zde zvolená zastupitelstva rozpadla.
translation.en: The number of councilors in these municipalities has fallen below the statutory number or the elected councils have fallen apart.
translation.source: Počet zastupitelů v těchto obcích klesl pod zákonem stanovený počet nebo se zde zvolená zastupitelstva rozpadla.
translation.medium: The number of councillors in these municipalities has fallen below the legally prescribed number or the elected councils have collapsed.
translation.reference: The number of councilors in these municipalities has fallen below the statutory number or the elected councils have fallen apart.

translation.cs: O celkových 28 mandátů se v sobotu ucházelo 99 kandidátů.
translation.en: A total of 99 candidates contested the 28 mandates on Saturday.
translation.source: O celkových 28 mandátů se v sobotu ucházelo 99 kandidátů.
translation.medium: A total of 99 candidates competed for 28 seats on Saturday.
translation.reference: A total of 99 candidates contested the 28 mandates on Saturday.

translation.cs: Průměrný věk nově zvolených zastupitelů je 46,7 roku.
translation.en: The average age of newly elected councilors is 46.7.
translation.source: Průměrný věk nově zvolených zastupitelů je 46,7 roku.
translation.medium: The average age of the newly elected councillors is 46.7 years.
translation.reference: The average age of newly elected councilors is 46.7.

translation.cs: Nejstaršímu z nich je 69 let, nejmladšímu 33 let.
translation.en: The oldest of them is 69, the youngest is 33.
translation.source: Nejstaršímu z nich je 69 let, nejmladšímu 33 let.
translation.medium: The oldest is 69, the youngest 33.
translation.reference: The oldest of them is 69, the youngest is 33.

translation.cs: Zpracování výsledků sobotních voleb pro nás symbolicky uzavírá poměrně náročný, ale úspěšný rok.
translation.en: The processing of the results of Saturday's elections represents the symbolic conclusion of a rather difficult but successful year for us.
translation.source: Zpracování výsledků sobotních voleb pro nás symbolicky uzavírá poměrně náročný, ale úspěšný rok.
translation.medium: The processing of the results of the Saturday elections for us symbolically closes a relatively difficult but successful year.
translation.reference: The processing of the results of Saturday's elections represents the symbolic conclusion of a rather difficult but successful year for us.

translation.cs: Uskutečnily se v něm celkem čtvery nové či opakované volby do obecních zastupitelstev a především velmi sledované volby do Poslanecké sněmovny, uvedla místopředsedkyně ČSÚ Eva Krumpová.
translation.en: A total of four new or repeated elections to municipal councils and, above all, the high-profile elections to the Chamber of Deputies took place, said CSO Vice President Eva Krumpová.
translation.source: Uskutečnily se v něm celkem čtvery nové či opakované volby do obecních zastupitelstev a především velmi sledované volby do Poslanecké sněmovny, uvedla místopředsedkyně ČSÚ Eva Krumpová.
translation.medium: A total of four new or repeated elections to municipal councils and, above all, very closely watched elections to the Chamber of Deputies took place there, said Eva Krumpová, Deputy President of the Czech Statistical Office.
translation.reference: A total of four new or repeated elections to municipal councils and, above all, the high-profile elections to the Chamber of Deputies took place, said CSO Vice President Eva Krumpová.

translation.cs: Připomněla, že kvůli epidemii covidu-19 byly volby náročnější na vybavení i personální zabezpečení.
translation.en: She pointed out that the covid-19 epidemic made the election more challenging in terms of equipment and staffing.
translation.source: Připomněla, že kvůli epidemii covidu-19 byly volby náročnější na vybavení i personální zabezpečení.
translation.medium: She reminded that due to the COVID-19 epidemic, the elections were more demanding in terms of equipment and personnel.
translation.reference: She pointed out that the covid-19 epidemic made the election more challenging in terms of equipment and staffing.

translation.cs: V Komni na Uherskohradišťsku vyhrálo sobotní volby Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů, které získalo 27,76 procenta hlasů a dva mandáty v sedmičlenném zastupitelstvu.
translation.en: The Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů party won Saturday's elections in Komňa in the Uherské Hradiště region, gaining 27.76 % of the vote and two seats on the seven-member town council.
translation.source: V Komni na Uherskohradišťsku vyhrálo sobotní volby Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů, které získalo 27,76 procenta hlasů a dva mandáty v sedmičlenném zastupitelstvu.
translation.medium: In Komňa in Uherské Hradiště, the Association of Independent Candidates won the Saturday elections, gaining 27.76 percent of the vote and two mandates in the seven-member council.
translation.reference: The Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů party won Saturday's elections in Komňa in the Uherské Hradiště region, gaining 27.76 % of the vote and two seats on the seven-member town council.

translation.cs: Kandidátka STAN obdržela 24,84 procenta hlasů, což také znamená zisk dvou mandátů.
translation.en: The STAN party ballot received 24.84 % of the vote, which also means the party won two seats.
translation.source: Kandidátka STAN obdržela 24,84 procenta hlasů, což také znamená zisk dvou mandátů.
translation.medium: The STAN candidate received 24.84 percent of the votes, which also means that she won two mandates.
translation.reference: The STAN party ballot received 24.84 % of the vote, which also means the party won two seats.

translation.cs: Dvě křesla v zastupitelstvu získali i Občané pro Komňu, svůj hlas jim dalo 18,52 procenta voličů.
translation.en: The Občané pro Komňu party also won two seats on the council, with 18.52 % of voters giving them their vote.
translation.source: Dvě křesla v zastupitelstvu získali i Občané pro Komňu, svůj hlas jim dalo 18,52 procenta voličů.
translation.medium: The Citizens for Komňa also won two seats in the council, with 18.52 percent of the vote.
translation.reference: The Občané pro Komňu party also won two seats on the council, with 18.52 % of voters giving them their vote.

translation.cs: Znovu se za ně dostala do zastupitelstva též dosavadní starostka obce Jana Křižková, která je členkou Soukromníků.
translation.en: The current mayor of the municipality, Jana Křižková, who is a member of the Soukromníci party, was elected to the council again.
translation.source: Znovu se za ně dostala do zastupitelstva též dosavadní starostka obce Jana Křižková, která je členkou Soukromníků.
translation.medium: The former mayor of the village, Jana Křižková, who is a member of the Soukromníci, also got back into the council.
translation.reference: The current mayor of the municipality, Jana Křižková, who is a member of the Soukromníci party, was elected to the council again.

translation.cs: Na jeden mandát v zastupitelstvu dosáhli Komňané – nezávislí kandidáti.
translation.en: The Komňané - independent candidates party won one seat on the council.
translation.source: Na jeden mandát v zastupitelstvu dosáhli Komňané – nezávislí kandidáti.
translation.medium: Komňané, independent candidates, gained one seat in the town council.
translation.reference: The Komňané - independent candidates party won one seat on the council.

translation.cs: K urnám přišlo 75,48 procenta oprávněných voličů.
translation.en: 75.48 % of eligible voters came to the ballot box.
translation.source: K urnám přišlo 75,48 procenta oprávněných voličů.
translation.medium: 75.48 percent of eligible voters went to the polls.
translation.reference: 75.48 % of eligible voters came to the ballot box.

translation.cs: V obci Rovná na Pelhřimovsku zvítězilo sdružení Pro Rovnou.
translation.en: The Pro Rovná association won in the village of Rovná in the Pelhřimov region.
translation.source: V obci Rovná na Pelhřimovsku zvítězilo sdružení Pro Rovnou.
translation.medium: In the village of Rovná in Pelhřimovsko, the association Pro Rovnou won.
translation.reference: The Pro Rovná association won in the village of Rovná in the Pelhřimov region.

translation.cs: Získalo 50,50 procenta hlasů, což znamená čtyři mandáty ze sedmi.
translation.en: It won 50.50 percent of the vote, which means four seats out of seven.
translation.source: Získalo 50,50 procenta hlasů, což znamená čtyři mandáty ze sedmi.
translation.medium: It received 50.50 percent of the votes, which means four mandates out of seven.
translation.reference: It won 50.50 percent of the vote, which means four seats out of seven.

translation.cs: Do obecního zastupitelstva se dostali ještě dva zástupci ze Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů 1 a jeden ze Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů 2.
translation.en: Two more representatives from the Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů 1 association and one from the Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů 2 association were elected to the municipal council.
translation.source: Do obecního zastupitelstva se dostali ještě dva zástupci ze Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů 1 a jeden ze Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů 2.
translation.medium: Two representatives from the Association of Independent Candidates 1 and one from the Association of Independent Candidates 2 were elected to the municipal council.
translation.reference: Two more representatives from the Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů 1 association and one from the Sdružení nezávislých kandidátů 2 association were elected to the municipal council.

translation.cs: Volební účast byla 93,62 procenta.
translation.en: The voter turnout was 93.62 percent.
translation.source: Volební účast byla 93,62 procenta.
translation.medium: Voter turnout was 93.62 percent.
translation.reference: The voter turnout was 93.62 percent.

translation.cs: Opakované volby v Lužici na Mostecku znovu vyhrálo Sdružení Lužice a Svinčice vedené starostou Jindřichem Johnem.
translation.en: The Sdružení Lužice a Svinčice association, led by Mayor Jindřich John, won the re-election in Lužice in the Most region.
translation.source: Opakované volby v Lužici na Mostecku znovu vyhrálo Sdružení Lužice a Svinčice vedené starostou Jindřichem Johnem.
translation.medium: The Association of Lusatia and Svinčice, led by the mayor Jindřich John, won the repeated elections in Lusatia in Mostecko.
translation.reference: The Sdružení Lužice a Svinčice association, led by Mayor Jindřich John, won the re-election in Lužice in the Most region.

translation.cs: Získalo 56,73 procenta hlasů a stejně jako v roce 2018 tak má v sedmičlenném zastupitelstvu čtyři mandáty.
translation.en: It won 56.73% of the vote and has four seats in the seven-member council, unchanged from 2018
translation.source: Získalo 56,73 procenta hlasů a stejně jako v roce 2018 tak má v sedmičlenném zastupitelstvu čtyři mandáty.
translation.medium: It received 56.73 percent of the vote and, like in 2018, has four seats in the seven-member council.
translation.reference: It won 56.73% of the vote and has four seats in the seven-member council, unchanged from 2018

translation.cs: Druhá skončila kandidátka Obec pro lid, které hlas dalo 43,27 procenta voličů, v zastupitelstvu tak bude mít tři zástupce.
translation.en: The Obec pro lid party ballot finished second with 43.27 % of the vote and will have three representatives on the town council.
translation.source: Druhá skončila kandidátka Obec pro lid, které hlas dalo 43,27 procenta voličů, v zastupitelstvu tak bude mít tři zástupce.
translation.medium: In second place was the Občané pro Budějovice party, which received 43.27 percent of the vote, and will have three representatives in the council.
translation.reference: The Obec pro lid party ballot finished second with 43.27 % of the vote and will have three representatives on the town council.

translation.cs: K urnám přišlo 76,7 procenta voličů.
translation.en: 76.7 % of eligible voters came to the ballot box.
translation.source: K urnám přišlo 76,7 procenta voličů.
translation.medium: 76.7 percent of voters went to the polls.
translation.reference: 76.7 % of eligible voters came to the ballot box.

translation.cs: Volby v Nové Vsi na Liberecku vyhráli nezávislí kandidáti Naděje pro Novou Ves před Hnutím ANO.
translation.en: The elections in Nová Ves in the Liberec region were won by the independent candidates for the Naděje pro Novou Ves party over the Hnutí ANO party.
translation.source: Volby v Nové Vsi na Liberecku vyhráli nezávislí kandidáti Naděje pro Novou Ves před Hnutím ANO.
translation.medium: The elections in Nová Ves in Liberec were won by the independent candidates of Naděje pro Novou Ves ahead of ANO.
translation.reference: The elections in Nová Ves in the Liberec region were won by the independent candidates for the Naděje pro Novou Ves party over the Hnutí ANO party.

translation.cs: Pro sdružení nezávislých kandidátů hlasovalo 59,88 procenta voličů a získali tak čtyři místa v sedmičlenném obecním zastupitelstvu.
translation.en: 59.88 % of voters voted for the association of independent candidates and thus won four seats on the seven-member municipal council.
translation.source: Pro sdružení nezávislých kandidátů hlasovalo 59,88 procenta voličů a získali tak čtyři místa v sedmičlenném obecním zastupitelstvu.
translation.medium: The association of independent candidates received 59.88 percent of the vote and won four seats in the seven-member municipal council.
translation.reference: 59.88 % of voters voted for the association of independent candidates and thus won four seats on the seven-member municipal council.

translation.cs: ANO dostalo 40,12 procenta hlasů a proti řádným volbám v roce 2018 posílilo, získalo o mandát víc a má tři.
translation.en: The ANO party received 40.12 % of the vote and has strengthened compared to the regular elections in 2018, gaining one more seat and therefore having three seats in total.
translation.source: ANO dostalo 40,12 procenta hlasů a proti řádným volbám v roce 2018 posílilo, získalo o mandát víc a má tři.
translation.medium: ANO received 40.12 percent of the votes and strengthened its position compared to the regular elections in 2018, gaining one mandate and now has three.
translation.reference: The ANO party received 40.12 % of the vote and has strengthened compared to the regular elections in 2018, gaining one more seat and therefore having three seats in total.

translation.cs: Volební účast byla 42,9 procenta voličů.
translation.en: The voter turnout was 42.9 percent.
translation.source: Volební účast byla 42,9 procenta voličů.
translation.medium: Voter turnout was 42.9 percent.
translation.reference: The voter turnout was 42.9 percent.

translation.cs: V pondělí výsledky voleb projedná Státní volební komise.
translation.en: The State Election Commission will discuss the election results on Monday.
translation.source: V pondělí výsledky voleb projedná Státní volební komise.
translation.medium: On Monday, the State Election Commission will discuss the election results.
translation.reference: The State Election Commission will discuss the election results on Monday.

translation.cs: Poté budou zveřejněny ve Sbírce zákonů.
translation.en: They will then be published in the Statute Book.
translation.source: Poté budou zveřejněny ve Sbírce zákonů.
translation.medium: They will then be published in the Collection of Laws.
translation.reference: They will then be published in the Statute Book.

translation.cs: Co myslíš, že by byl větší problém?
translation.en: What do you think would be the bigger problem?
translation.source: Co myslíš, že by byl větší problém?
translation.medium: What do you think would be the bigger problem?
translation.reference: What do you think would be the bigger problem?

translation.cs: Mrtvý civilista nebo zahraniční politik?
translation.en: A dead civilian or a foreign politician?
translation.source: Mrtvý civilista nebo zahraniční politik?
translation.medium: Dead civilian or foreign politician?
translation.reference: A dead civilian or a foreign politician?

translation.cs: Myslím, že tohle všechno co ti tady lidi píšou dobře víš.
translation.en: I think you know all this stuff people are writing to you.
translation.source: Myslím, že tohle všechno co ti tady lidi píšou dobře víš.
translation.medium: I think you know all of this.
translation.reference: I think you know all this stuff people are writing to you.

translation.cs: Jen si hraješ na hlupáka aby ses měl s kým "hádat".
translation.en: You're just playing dumb to have someone to "argue" with.
translation.source: Jen si hraješ na hlupáka aby ses měl s kým "hádat".
translation.medium: You're just playing dumb to have someone to argue with.
translation.reference: You're just playing dumb to have someone to "argue" with.

translation.cs: Pokud ne, tak je to smutné.
translation.en: If not, that's sad.
translation.source: Pokud ne, tak je to smutné.
translation.medium: If not, it's sad.
translation.reference: If not, that's sad.

translation.cs: Netvrdím, že křesťané jsou degeneráti, ani nic takového.
translation.en: I'm not saying that Christians are degenerates or anything like that.
translation.source: Netvrdím, že křesťané jsou degeneráti, ani nic takového.
translation.medium: I am not saying that Christians are degenerates, or anything like that.
translation.reference: I'm not saying that Christians are degenerates or anything like that.

translation.cs: Dokonce se mi i líbí spousta církevních staveb z estetického pohledu (což koneckonců byl cíl, aby vypadaly dobře).
translation.en: I even like a lot of church buildings from an aesthetic point of view (which, after all, was the goal, to make them look good).
translation.source: Dokonce se mi i líbí spousta církevních staveb z estetického pohledu (což koneckonců byl cíl, aby vypadaly dobře).
translation.medium: In fact, I quite like a lot of church architecture from an aesthetic point of view (which, after all, was the point).
translation.reference: I even like a lot of church buildings from an aesthetic point of view (which, after all, was the goal, to make them look good).

translation.cs: A je mi celkem jedno, kdo v co věří.
translation.en: And I don't really care who believes in what.
translation.source: A je mi celkem jedno, kdo v co věří.
translation.medium: And I don't care who believes in what.
translation.reference: And I don't really care who believes in what.

translation.cs: Na druhou stranu mi vadí, jak moc církev měla moc ve středověku, kolik peněz nahrabala, potlačování vědy atd.
translation.en: However, it disturbs me how much power the Church had in the Middle Ages, how much money they raked in, the suppression of science, and so on.
translation.source: Na druhou stranu mi vadí, jak moc církev měla moc ve středověku, kolik peněz nahrabala, potlačování vědy atd.
translation.medium: On the other hand, I don't like how much power the church had in the Middle Ages, how much money it amassed, the suppression of science, etc.
translation.reference: However, it disturbs me how much power the Church had in the Middle Ages, how much money they raked in, the suppression of science, and so on.

translation.cs: Nemluvě o všech válkách, co způsobila, např. ta třicetiletá
translation.en: Let alone all the wars it's caused, like the Thirty Years' War
translation.source: Nemluvě o všech válkách, co způsobila, např. ta třicetiletá
translation.medium: Not to mention all the wars she caused, such as the Thirty Years' War
translation.reference: Let alone all the wars it's caused, like the Thirty Years' War

translation.cs: Tl;dr: věřte si třeba ve špagetové monstrum, ale stát a církev nemají dohromady co dělat
translation.en: Tl;dr: believe in the spaghetti monster, but the state and the church should have nothing to do with each other
translation.source: Tl;dr: věřte si třeba ve špagetové monstrum, ale stát a církev nemají dohromady co dělat
translation.medium: TL;DR: believe in the spaghetti monster, but the state and the church have nothing in common
translation.reference: Tl;dr: believe in the spaghetti monster, but the state and the church should have nothing to do with each other

translation.cs: Muž spadl hlavou dolů z dvanácti metrů.
translation.en: The man fell upside down from 12 meters.
translation.source: Muž spadl hlavou dolů z dvanácti metrů.
translation.medium: The man fell head first from a height of twelve metres.
translation.reference: The man fell upside down from 12 meters.

translation.cs: Náraz na beton přežil.
translation.en: He survived the crash onto concrete.
translation.source: Náraz na beton přežil.
translation.medium: He survived hitting the concrete.
translation.reference: He survived the crash onto concrete.

translation.cs: Neuvěřitelný pád přežil v neděli v noci muž v Ostravě, u něhož zasahovali záchranáři krajské Zdravotnické záchranné služby.
translation.en: A man survived an incredible fall on Sunday night in Ostrava, where rescuers from the regional ambulance service intervened.
translation.source: Neuvěřitelný pád přežil v neděli v noci muž v Ostravě, u něhož zasahovali záchranáři krajské Zdravotnické záchranné služby.
translation.medium: A man miraculously survived a fall in Ostrava on Sunday night. Rescuers from the Moravian-Silesian Ambulance Service were called to the scene.
translation.reference: A man survived an incredible fall on Sunday night in Ostrava, where rescuers from the regional ambulance service intervened.

translation.cs: Pracovníci krajského operačního střediska převzali hodinu po sobotní půlnoci tísňové volání s prvotními informacemi o pádu muže z výšky.
translation.en: Workers at the regional operations center received an emergency call an hour after midnight on Saturday with initial information about a man having fallen from a height.
translation.source: Pracovníci krajského operačního střediska převzali hodinu po sobotní půlnoci tísňové volání s prvotními informacemi o pádu muže z výšky.
translation.medium: An hour after midnight on Saturday, the regional operational centre received an emergency call with initial information about the fall of a man from a height.
translation.reference: Workers at the regional operations center received an emergency call an hour after midnight on Saturday with initial information about a man having fallen from a height.

translation.cs: Na místo ihned vyjely dvě posádky ZZS – lékařská a zdravotnická.
translation.en: Two ambulance crews - doctors and paramedics - immediately went to the scene.
translation.source: Na místo ihned vyjely dvě posádky ZZS – lékařská a zdravotnická.
translation.medium: Two ambulance crews were immediately sent to the scene - a doctor and a paramedic.
translation.reference: Two ambulance crews - doctors and paramedics - immediately went to the scene.

translation.cs: Po příjezdu na místo zdravotníci zjistili, že sedmadvacetiletý muž měl spadnout z okna z výšky okolo dvanácti metrů a dopadnout hlavou na beton!
translation.en: On arrival at the scene, paramedics found that the 27-year-old man had fallen from a window from a height of around 12 meters and hit his head on the concrete!
translation.source: Po příjezdu na místo zdravotníci zjistili, že sedmadvacetiletý muž měl spadnout z okna z výšky okolo dvanácti metrů a dopadnout hlavou na beton!
translation.medium: When paramedics arrived at the scene, they discovered that the 27-year-old man had fallen out of the window from a height of around 12 metres and landed head first on the concrete!
translation.reference: On arrival at the scene, paramedics found that the 27-year-old man had fallen from a window from a height of around 12 meters and hit his head on the concrete!

translation.cs: Ve Vítkovicích chytlo uhlí.
translation.en: Coal caught fire in Vítkovice.
translation.source: Ve Vítkovicích chytlo uhlí.
translation.medium: Coal caught fire in Vítkovice.
translation.reference: Coal caught fire in Vítkovice.

translation.cs: Ale ne tak, jak by mělo, a do akce šli hasiči.
translation.en: But not as it should have been, and the fire department jumped into action.
translation.source: Ale ne tak, jak by mělo, a do akce šli hasiči.
translation.medium: But not as it should, and the firefighters went into action.
translation.reference: But not as it should have been, and the fire department jumped into action.

translation.cs: V okamžiku příjezdu týmů záchranné služby byl muž v bezvědomí, s mnohočetnými poraněními a v přímém ohrožení života.
translation.en: At the time of the arrival of the ambulance teams, the man was unconscious, with multiple injuries and in immediate danger of his life.
translation.source: V okamžiku příjezdu týmů záchranné služby byl muž v bezvědomí, s mnohočetnými poraněními a v přímém ohrožení života.
translation.medium: When the emergency services arrived, the man was unconscious, with multiple injuries and in a life-threatening condition.
translation.reference: At the time of the arrival of the ambulance teams, the man was unconscious, with multiple injuries and in immediate danger of his life.

translation.cs: Zasahující lékař zaintuboval jeho dýchací cesty, zajistil umělou plicní ventilaci a po dalších opatřeních v rámci přednemocniční neodkladné péče jej sanitní vozidlo přepravilo do další péče ostravského traumatologického centra, informoval mluvčí ZZS MS kraje, Lukáš Humpl.
translation.en: The intervening doctor intubated his airways, provided artificial pulmonary ventilation and after further measures as part of pre-hospital emergency care, the ambulance transported him to the Ostrava trauma center for further care, informed Lukáš Humpl, spokesman for the MS Region's Emergency Medical Services.
translation.source: Zasahující lékař zaintuboval jeho dýchací cesty, zajistil umělou plicní ventilaci a po dalších opatřeních v rámci přednemocniční neodkladné péče jej sanitní vozidlo přepravilo do další péče ostravského traumatologického centra, informoval mluvčí ZZS MS kraje, Lukáš Humpl.
translation.medium: The intervening doctor intubated his airways, secured artificial lung ventilation, and after other measures within the pre-hospital emergency care, the ambulance transported him to further care at the Ostrava trauma centre, informed the spokesman for the Moravian-Silesian Ambulance Service, Lukáš Humpl.
translation.reference: The intervening doctor intubated his airways, provided artificial pulmonary ventilation and after further measures as part of pre-hospital emergency care, the ambulance transported him to the Ostrava trauma center for further care, informed Lukáš Humpl, spokesman for the MS Region's Emergency Medical Services.

translation.cs: Větší obavy než z koronaviru mám z neadekvátních reakcí veřejnosti i úřadů
translation.en: I am more worried about the inadequate response of the public and the authorities than about the coronavirus

translation.en: The spread of coronavirus in the Czech Republic poses a challenge for politicians and officials, but the frontline in the fight against the disease is mainly doctors and medical staff.

translation.en: Outsider Julianna Peña managed to defeat the legendary wrestler Amanda Nunes, who had been undefeated in seven years.

translation.en: Lightweight Charles Oliveira didn't hesitate and demonstrated a flawless choke against Dustin Poirier to defend his belt.
translation.source: Charles Oliveira v lehké váze nezaváhal, předvedl proti Dustinu Poirierovi skvělé škrcení a obhájil pás.

translation.reference: Lightweight Charles Oliveira didn't hesitate and demonstrated a flawless choke against Dustin Poirier to defend his belt.

translation.cs: Vítězství zaznamenal také Kai Kara-France, který rychle smetl Codyho Garbrandta technickým KO v prvním kole.
translation.en: Also scoring a win was Kai Kara-France, who quickly swept Cody Garbrandt with a technical KO in the first round.

translation.reference: Also scoring a win was Kai Kara-France, who quickly swept Cody Garbrandt with a technical KO in the first round.

translation.en: Sean O'Malley also defeated his opponent.

translation.medium: Sean O'Malley also defeated his opponent.
translation.reference: Sean O'Malley also defeated his opponent.
