translation.source: Pravidelné hodnocení se teda nějak děje, ve formě jakou to probíhá u nás to docela jde (nastav si nějaké cíle na další rok, za rok se podíváme co vyšlo a co ne) - je to spíš sebehodnocení, než že by tebe hodnotil někdo podle nějakých čísel, a podobně.
translation.medium: Regular assessment does, in fact, take place, in the form in which it takes place in our country (set yourself some goals for the next year, and at the end of the year we'll look at what worked and what didn't). It's more of a self-assessment, rather than being assessed by someone according to some numbers, and so on.
translation.reference: So regular evaluation is happening somehow, in the form it's happening here it's quite good (set some goals for next year, in a year we'll see what worked and what didn't) - it's more of a self-assessment than someone evaluating you by some numbers, etc.

translation.cs: Firemní akce taktéž nepovinné.
translation.en: Attending company events is also optional.
translation.source: Firemní akce taktéž nepovinné.
translation.medium: Corporate events are also optional.
translation.reference: Attending company events is also optional.

translation.cs: Ale jsme i v rámci naší firmy trochu unikát - jsou oddělení co jsou víc "korporátní".
translation.en: But even in our company we’re pretty unique - there are departments that are more "corporate".
translation.source: Ale jsme i v rámci naší firmy trochu unikát - jsou oddělení co jsou víc "korporátní".
translation.medium: But we're also a bit unique within our company - there are departments that are more corporate.
translation.reference: But even in our company we’re pretty unique - there are departments that are more "corporate".

translation.cs: Někdy má člověk pocit, že jsme takový skoro-startup, který squatuje v kancelářích velkého korporátu no.
translation.en: Sometimes you get the feeling that we're an almost-startup squatting in the offices of a big corporation.
translation.source: Někdy má člověk pocit, že jsme takový skoro-startup, který squatuje v kancelářích velkého korporátu no.
translation.medium: Sometimes it feels like we're a quasi-startup squatting in the offices of a big corporation.
translation.reference: Sometimes you get the feeling that we're an almost-startup squatting in the offices of a big corporation.

translation.cs: Ale funguje to tak nás moc neotravují, dokud jsou výsledky.
translation.en: But it works so they don't bother us too much as long as there are results.
translation.source: Ale funguje to tak nás moc neotravují, dokud jsou výsledky.
translation.medium: But it works as long as the results are there.
translation.reference: But it works so they don't bother us too much as long as there are results.

translation.cs: Češka pohřešovaná v Británii je po smrti.
translation.en: A Czech woman missing in Britain is dead.
translation.source: Češka pohřešovaná v Británii je po smrti.
translation.medium: The Czech woman missing in Britain is dead.
translation.reference: A Czech woman missing in Britain is dead.

translation.cs: Její tělo nalezli v Londýně.
translation.en: Her body was found in London.
translation.source: Její tělo nalezli v Londýně.
translation.medium: Her body was found in London.
translation.reference: Her body was found in London.

translation.cs: Téměř deset dní britská policie bezvýsledně pátrala po pohřešované 32leté Češce, která se ztratila na konci listopadu.
translation.en: For almost ten days, the British police searched without success for a missing 32-year-old Czech woman who went missing at the end of November.
translation.source: Téměř deset dní britská policie bezvýsledně pátrala po pohřešované 32leté Češce, která se ztratila na konci listopadu.
translation.medium: British police have been searching for a missing 32-year-old Czech woman for almost ten days without success.
translation.reference: For almost ten days, the British police searched without success for a missing 32-year-old Czech woman who went missing at the end of November.

translation.cs: V neděli 12. prosince oznámil ministr zahraničních věcí v demisi Jakub Kulhánek na sociálních sítí, že ženu z Uherskohradištska nalezli mrtvou.
translation.en: On Sunday, 12 December, Czech Foreign Minister Jakub Kulhánek announced on social media that the woman from Uherské Hradiště had been found dead.
translation.source: V neděli 12. prosince oznámil ministr zahraničních věcí v demisi Jakub Kulhánek na sociálních sítí, že ženu z Uherskohradištska nalezli mrtvou.
translation.medium: On Sunday, December 12, Minister of Foreign Affairs Jakub Kulhánek announced on social media that the woman from Uherskohradištska had been found dead.
translation.reference: On Sunday, 12 December, Czech Foreign Minister Jakub Kulhánek announced on social media that the woman from Uherské Hradiště had been found dead.

translation.cs: Britská policie dnes odpoledne našemu zastupitelskému úřadu v Londýně bohužel potvrdila, že nalezla tělo pohřešované české občanky.
translation.en: Unfortunately, our embassy in London had confirmation from the British police this afternoon that they have found the body of the missing Czech citizen.
translation.source: Britská policie dnes odpoledne našemu zastupitelskému úřadu v Londýně bohužel potvrdila, že nalezla tělo pohřešované české občanky.
translation.medium: Unfortunately, the British police confirmed to our embassy in London this afternoon that the body of the missing Czech citizen has been found.
translation.reference: Unfortunately, our embassy in London had confirmation from the British police this afternoon that they have found the body of the missing Czech citizen.

translation.cs: Příčina úmrtí se vyšetřuje.
translation.en: The cause of death is under investigation.
translation.source: Příčina úmrtí se vyšetřuje.
translation.medium: The cause of death is under investigation.
translation.reference: The cause of death is under investigation.

translation.cs: S ohledem na rodinu nebudeme k případu sdělovat více informací.
translation.en: We will not give any more information about the case out of respect for the family.
translation.source: S ohledem na rodinu nebudeme k případu sdělovat více informací.
translation.medium: Out of respect for the family, we will not be releasing any further information.
translation.reference: We will not give any more information about the case out of respect for the family.

translation.cs: Upřímnou soustrast, uvedl na Twitteru Kulhánek.
translation.en: My sincere condolences, Kulhánek tweeted.
translation.source: Upřímnou soustrast, uvedl na Twitteru Kulhánek.
translation.medium: Sincere condolences, Kulhánek wrote on Twitter.
translation.reference: My sincere condolences, Kulhánek tweeted.

translation.cs: Mladou ženu naposledy viděli 28. listopadu v autobusu při cestě z práce, před nastoupením si měla ještě vyzvednout peníze z bankomatu.
translation.en: The young woman was last seen on 28 November on a bus on her way home from work, before getting on the bus she was supposed to withdraw money from an ATM.
translation.source: Mladou ženu naposledy viděli 28. listopadu v autobusu při cestě z práce, před nastoupením si měla ještě vyzvednout peníze z bankomatu.
translation.medium: The young woman was last seen on 28 November on a bus on her way home from work. She was going to withdraw money from an ATM before getting on the bus.
translation.reference: The young woman was last seen on 28 November on a bus on her way home from work, before getting on the bus she was supposed to withdraw money from an ATM.

translation.cs: Její zmizení ohlásili kolegové z práce o pět dní později.
translation.en: Her disappearance was reported by work colleagues five days later.
translation.source: Její zmizení ohlásili kolegové z práce o pět dní později.
translation.medium: Her disappearance was reported by her work colleagues five days later.
translation.reference: Her disappearance was reported by work colleagues five days later.

translation.cs: Následně po ní začala londýnská policie pátrat, Interpol ji zařadil mezi pohřešované po celém světě.
translation.en: Subsequently, the London police began searching for her and Interpol listed her as missing worldwide.
translation.source: Následně po ní začala londýnská policie pátrat, Interpol ji zařadil mezi pohřešované po celém světě.
translation.medium: Following this, the London police started looking for her, and Interpol listed her as a missing person worldwide.
translation.reference: Subsequently, the London police began searching for her and Interpol listed her as missing worldwide.

translation.cs: Objevila se tak i v české databázi pohřešovaných osob.
translation.en: She also appeared in the Czech database of missing persons.
translation.source: Objevila se tak i v české databázi pohřešovaných osob.
translation.medium: It also appeared in the Czech database of missing persons.
translation.reference: She also appeared in the Czech database of missing persons.

translation.cs: Policie v této souvislosti již před několika dny zadržela jednoho muže.
translation.en: The police already arrested a man in relation to this case several days ago.
translation.source: Policie v této souvislosti již před několika dny zadržela jednoho muže.
translation.medium: The police have already arrested one man in connection with this.
translation.reference: The police already arrested a man in relation to this case several days ago.

translation.cs: Jakou měl v případu sehrát roli a z čeho jej podezřívá, ale nezveřejnila.
translation.en: However, they did not disclose what role he was supposed to have played in the case or what he is suspected of having done.
translation.source: Jakou měl v případu sehrát roli a z čeho jej podezřívá, ale nezveřejnila.
translation.medium: She did not say what role he played in the case or what he is suspected of.
translation.reference: However, they did not disclose what role he was supposed to have played in the case or what he is suspected of having done.

translation.cs: Ve čtyřech obcích si ke konci roku nadělili nová zastupitelstva
translation.en: Four municipalities got new councils at the end of the year
translation.source: Ve čtyřech obcích si ke konci roku nadělili nová zastupitelstva
translation.medium: Four municipalities got new councils at the end of the year
translation.reference: Four municipalities got new councils at the end of the year

translation.cs: V sobotu 11. prosince se v obcích Komňa na Uherskohradišťsku, Lužice na Mostecku, Nová Ves na Liberecku a Rovná na Pelhřimovsku volila nová zastupitelstva.
translation.en: On Saturday 11 December, people in the municipalities of Komňa in the Uherské Hradiště region, Lužice in the Most region, Nová Ves in the Liberec region and Rovná in the Pelhřimov region voted for new councils.
translation.source: V sobotu 11. prosince se v obcích Komňa na Uherskohradišťsku, Lužice na Mostecku, Nová Ves na Liberecku a Rovná na Pelhřimovsku volila nová zastupitelstva.
translation.medium: On Saturday, 11 December, new councils were elected in Komňa in Uherskohradišťsko, Lužice in Mostecko, Nová Ves in Liberecko and Rovná in Pelhřimovsko.
translation.reference: On Saturday 11 December, people in the municipalities of Komňa in the Uherské Hradiště region, Lužice in the Most region, Nová Ves in the Liberec region and Rovná in the Pelhřimov region voted for new councils.

translation.cs: Počet zastupitelů v těchto obcích klesl pod zákonem stanovený počet nebo se zde zvolená zastupitelstva rozpadla.
translation.en: The number of councilors in these municipalities has fallen below the statutory number or the elected councils have fallen apart.
translation.source: Počet zastupitelů v těchto obcích klesl pod zákonem stanovený počet nebo se zde zvolená zastupitelstva rozpadla.
translation.medium: The number of councillors in these municipalities has fallen below the legally prescribed number or the elected councils have collapsed.
translation.reference: The number of councilors in these municipalities has fallen below the statutory number or the elected councils have fallen apart.

translation.cs: O 28 mandátů se v nových volbách ucházelo 99 platných kandidátů.
translation.en: There were 99 valid candidates running for 28 seats in the new elections.
translation.source: O 28 mandátů se v nových volbách ucházelo 99 platných kandidátů.
translation.medium: In the new elections, 99 valid candidates competed for 28 mandates.
translation.reference: There were 99 valid candidates running for 28 seats in the new elections.

translation.cs: Volební účast dosáhla 62,41 %.
translation.en: Voter turnout was 62.41%.
translation.source: Volební účast dosáhla 62,41 %.
translation.medium: Voter turnout was 62.41%.
translation.reference: Voter turnout was 62.41%.

translation.cs: Nejvyšší zájem zaznamenali v obci Rovná, kde volilo 93,62 % oprávněných voličů.
translation.en: The highest interest was recorded in the Rovná village where 93.62 % of eligible voters voted.
translation.source: Nejvyšší zájem zaznamenali v obci Rovná, kde volilo 93,62 % oprávněných voličů.
translation.medium: The highest turnout was recorded in Rovná, where 93.62% of eligible voters voted.
translation.reference: The highest interest was recorded in the Rovná village where 93.62 % of eligible voters voted.

translation.cs: Mandát získalo celkem 8 žen a 20 mužů.
translation.en: A total of 8 women and 20 men won seats.
translation.source: Mandát získalo celkem 8 žen a 20 mužů.
translation.medium: A total of 8 women and 20 men were elected.
translation.reference: A total of 8 women and 20 men won seats.

translation.cs: Průměrný věk zvolených zastupitelů je 46,7 let.
translation.en: The average age of newly elected councilors is 46.7 years.
translation.source: Průměrný věk zvolených zastupitelů je 46,7 let.
translation.medium: The average age of the elected representatives is 46.7 years.
translation.reference: The average age of newly elected councilors is 46.7 years.

translation.cs: Nejstaršímu je 69 let, nejmladšímu 33 let.
translation.en: The oldest of them is 69 years old, the youngest is 33 years old.
translation.source: Nejstaršímu je 69 let, nejmladšímu 33 let.
translation.medium: The oldest is 69, the youngest 33.
translation.reference: The oldest of them is 69 years old, the youngest is 33 years old.

translation.cs: Pro nové volby do zastupitelstev v uvedených čtyřech obcích bylo zaregistrováno celkem 13 kandidátních listin.
translation.en: A total of 13 candidate lists have been registered for the new municipal elections in the four municipalities.
translation.source: Pro nové volby do zastupitelstev v uvedených čtyřech obcích bylo zaregistrováno celkem 13 kandidátních listin.
translation.medium: A total of 13 candidate lists were registered for the new elections to the councils of the four mentioned municipalities.
translation.reference: A total of 13 candidate lists have been registered for the new municipal elections in the four municipalities.

translation.cs: O 28 zastupitelských postů se ucházelo 36 žen a 63 mužů.
translation.en: 36 women and 63 men ran for 28 seats.
translation.source: O 28 zastupitelských postů se ucházelo 36 žen a 63 mužů.
translation.medium: A total of 36 women and 63 men competed for 28 seats.
translation.reference: 36 women and 63 men ran for 28 seats.

translation.cs: Průměrný věk kandidujících byl 46,6 let.
translation.en: The average age of the candidates was 46.6.
translation.source: Průměrný věk kandidujících byl 46,6 let.
translation.medium: The average age of the candidates was 46.6 years.
translation.reference: The average age of the candidates was 46.6.

translation.cs: Nejmladšímu kandidátovi bylo 22 let, nejstaršímu 72 let.
translation.en: The youngest candidate was 22, the oldest was 72.
translation.source: Nejmladšímu kandidátovi bylo 22 let, nejstaršímu 72 let.
translation.medium: The youngest candidate was 22 years old, the oldest 72.
translation.reference: The youngest candidate was 22, the oldest was 72.

translation.cs: Zpracování výsledků sobotních voleb pro nás symbolicky uzavírá poměrně náročný, ale úspěšný rok.
translation.en: The processing of the results of Saturday's elections represents the symbolic conclusion of a rather difficult but successful year for us.
translation.source: Zpracování výsledků sobotních voleb pro nás symbolicky uzavírá poměrně náročný, ale úspěšný rok.
translation.medium: The processing of the results of the Saturday elections for us symbolically closes a relatively difficult but successful year.
translation.reference: The processing of the results of Saturday's elections represents the symbolic conclusion of a rather difficult but successful year for us.

translation.cs: Uskutečnily se v něm čtvery nové či opakované volby do obecních zastupitelstev a především velmi sledované volby do Poslanecké sněmovny.
translation.en: A total of four new or repeated elections to municipal councils and, above all, the high-profile elections to the Chamber of Deputies took place.
translation.source: Uskutečnily se v něm čtvery nové či opakované volby do obecních zastupitelstev a především velmi sledované volby do Poslanecké sněmovny.
translation.medium: Four new or repeated elections to municipal councils and above all very closely watched elections to the Chamber of Deputies took place there.
translation.reference: A total of four new or repeated elections to municipal councils and, above all, the high-profile elections to the Chamber of Deputies took place.

translation.cs: Museli jsme přitom většinou pracovat v náročnějších epidemických podmínkách, které kladly větší nároky na vybavení i personální zabezpečení, zhodnotila Eva Krumpová, 1. místopředsedkyně Českého statistického úřadu.
translation.en: We mostly had to work in more demanding epidemic conditions, which placed greater demands on equipment and staffing, assessed Eva Krumpová, 1st Vice President of the Czech Statistical Office.
translation.source: Museli jsme přitom většinou pracovat v náročnějších epidemických podmínkách, které kladly větší nároky na vybavení i personální zabezpečení, zhodnotila Eva Krumpová, 1. místopředsedkyně Českého statistického úřadu.
translation.medium: We had to work in more difficult epidemiological conditions, which put greater demands on equipment and personnel, said Eva Krumpová, 1st Deputy President of the Czech Statistical Office.
translation.reference: We mostly had to work in more demanding epidemic conditions, which placed greater demands on equipment and staffing, assessed Eva Krumpová, 1st Vice President of the Czech Statistical Office.

translation.cs: Poslední volební okrsek byl zpracován v neděli 12. prosince v 03:49 hodin.
translation.en: The last voting precinct was processed on Sunday, 12 December at 03:49 hours.
translation.source: Poslední volební okrsek byl zpracován v neděli 12. prosince v 03:49 hodin.
translation.medium: The last precinct was called at 3:49 a.m. on Sunday, December 12.
translation.reference: The last voting precinct was processed on Sunday, 12 December at 03:49 hours.

translation.cs: V pondělí výsledky hlasování projedná Státní volební komise a po schválení budou zveřejněny ve Sbírce zákonů.
translation.en: The results of the vote will be discussed by the State Election Commission on Monday and, once approved, will be published in the Collection of Laws.
translation.source: V pondělí výsledky hlasování projedná Státní volební komise a po schválení budou zveřejněny ve Sbírce zákonů.
translation.medium: On Monday, the State Election Commission will consider the results of the vote and, if approved, they will be published in the Official Gazette.
translation.reference: The results of the vote will be discussed by the State Election Commission on Monday and, once approved, will be published in the Collection of Laws.

translation.cs: Tohle je největší problém, který s celou pandemií mám.
translation.en: This is the biggest problem I have with the whole pandemic.
translation.source: Tohle je největší problém, který s celou pandemií mám.
translation.medium: This is the biggest problem I have with the whole pandemic.
translation.reference: This is the biggest problem I have with the whole pandemic.

translation.cs: Vyrovnat se s tím že tu máme celkem nebezpečnou nakažlivou nemoc mi na úplném začátku chvíli trvalo, ale šlo to bez větších zádrhelů.
translation.en: It took me a while to come to terms with the fact that we have a quite dangerous contagious disease at the very beginning, but it went without any major hitches.
translation.source: Vyrovnat se s tím že tu máme celkem nebezpečnou nakažlivou nemoc mi na úplném začátku chvíli trvalo, ale šlo to bez větších zádrhelů.
translation.medium: It took me a while to come to terms with the fact that we have quite a dangerous infectious disease, but it went smoothly.
translation.reference: It took me a while to come to terms with the fact that we have a quite dangerous contagious disease at the very beginning, but it went without any major hitches.

translation.cs: Vyrovnat se s tím, jak idiotsky se k tomu staví velká část populace na všech jejích vrstvách, s tím mám problém doteď.
translation.en: Coming to terms with the idiotic attitudes of much of the population at all levels, I still have a problem with that.
translation.source: Vyrovnat se s tím, jak idiotsky se k tomu staví velká část populace na všech jejích vrstvách, s tím mám problém doteď.
translation.medium: I am still struggling to come to terms with the fact that a large part of the population, at all levels, is behaving so idiotically.
translation.reference: Coming to terms with the idiotic attitudes of much of the population at all levels, I still have a problem with that.

translation.cs: Na očkování (zítra!) se nejvíc těším protože díky němu budu konečně míň závislý na tom, že ostatní lidi nejsou hovada.
translation.en: I'm looking forward to the vaccination (tomorrow!) the most because it will finally make me less dependent on other people not being assholes.
translation.source: Na očkování (zítra!) se nejvíc těším protože díky němu budu konečně míň závislý na tom, že ostatní lidi nejsou hovada.
translation.medium: I am most looking forward to getting vaccinated (tomorrow!) because thanks to it I will finally be less dependent on the fact that other people are not assholes.
translation.reference: I'm looking forward to the vaccination (tomorrow!) the most because it will finally make me less dependent on other people not being assholes.

translation.cs: Byl by zbaven funkce prezidenta a způsobilosti ji znovu nabýt.
translation.en: He would be stripped of his presidency and his eligibility to regain it.
translation.source: Byl by zbaven funkce prezidenta a způsobilosti ji znovu nabýt.
translation.medium: He would be stripped of the presidency and disqualified from holding it again.
translation.reference: He would be stripped of his presidency and his eligibility to regain it.

translation.cs: Šance, že k tomu opravdu dojde je ale jak tady ostatní zmiňují hodně malá.
translation.en: But the chances of that actually happening are, as others have mentioned here, very slim.
translation.source: Šance, že k tomu opravdu dojde je ale jak tady ostatní zmiňují hodně malá.
translation.medium: However, the chances of this actually happening are very small.
translation.reference: But the chances of that actually happening are, as others have mentioned here, very slim.

translation.cs: Navíc si nejsem jistý, jestli by se zkartovani spisu vůbec dalo za velezradu považovat.
translation.en: And anyway, I'm not sure if mapping the file could even be considered treason.
translation.source: Navíc si nejsem jistý, jestli by se zkartovani spisu vůbec dalo za velezradu považovat.
translation.medium: Moreover, I am not sure whether the declassification of the file could be considered treason.
translation.reference: And anyway, I'm not sure if mapping the file could even be considered treason.

translation.cs: Velezrada je takový čin, kterým prezident republiky ohrozí svrchovanost, územní celistvost, nebo demokratický charakter státu.
translation.en: Treason is such an act by which the President of the Republic threatens the sovereignty, territorial integrity, or democratic character of the State.
translation.source: Velezrada je takový čin, kterým prezident republiky ohrozí svrchovanost, územní celistvost, nebo demokratický charakter státu.
translation.medium: High treason is such an act that endangers the sovereignty, territorial integrity, or democratic character of the state.
translation.reference: Treason is such an act by which the President of the Republic threatens the sovereignty, territorial integrity, or democratic character of the State.

translation.cs: Muselo to být něco závažnějšího.
translation.en: It has to have been something more serious.
translation.source: Muselo to být něco závažnějšího.
translation.medium: It must have been something more serious.
translation.reference: It has to have been something more serious.

translation.cs: Jak pandemie ovlivnila intimní život: Roste počet lidí do 35 let, kteří jsou bez sexu celý rok
translation.en: How the pandemic has affected intimate life: There is a growing number of people under 35 who go a whole year without sex
translation.source: Jak pandemie ovlivnila intimní život: Roste počet lidí do 35 let, kteří jsou bez sexu celý rok
translation.medium: How the pandemic is affecting people's sex lives: Number of under-35s going a year without sex rises
translation.reference: How the pandemic has affected intimate life: There is a growing number of people under 35 who go a whole year without sex

translation.cs: Čím dál více mladých dospělých v USA žije své životy bez sexu.
translation.en: Greater numbers of young American adults are living their lives without sex.
translation.source: Čím dál více mladých dospělých v USA žije své životy bez sexu.
translation.medium: More and more young adults in the US are living their lives without sex.
translation.reference: Greater numbers of young American adults are living their lives without sex.

translation.cs: Jedná se hlavně o nábožensky založené lidi, uvádí web deníku DailyMail.
translation.en: These are mainly religious people according to the Daily Mail website.
translation.source: Jedná se hlavně o nábožensky založené lidi, uvádí web deníku DailyMail.
translation.medium: According to the Daily Mail's website, this mainly concerns religious people.
translation.reference: These are mainly religious people according to the Daily Mail website.

translation.cs: Průzkum ukázal, že od roku 2008 do roku 2021 se podíl lidí mladších 35, kteří se sexuálního života zříkají, zvedl z osmi na 21 procent.
translation.en: The survey has shown that from 2008 to 2021 the proportion of people under 35 who are abstaining from sex has risen from eight to 21 per cent.
translation.source: Průzkum ukázal, že od roku 2008 do roku 2021 se podíl lidí mladších 35, kteří se sexuálního života zříkají, zvedl z osmi na 21 procent.
translation.medium: The survey found that the proportion of people under 35 who abstain from sex has risen from eight per cent to 21 per cent between 2008 and 2021.
translation.reference: The survey has shown that from 2008 to 2021 the proportion of people under 35 who are abstaining from sex has risen from eight to 21 per cent.

translation.cs: Žen mezi 18 a 35 lety, které uvedly, že v posledním roce pohlavní styk neměly, je více než kdy dříve.
translation.en: More women aged 18 and 35 than ever before say that they haven’t had sex in the preceding year.
translation.source: Žen mezi 18 a 35 lety, které uvedly, že v posledním roce pohlavní styk neměly, je více než kdy dříve.
translation.medium: The number of women aged 18 to 35 who said they had not had sex in the past year is at an all-time high.
translation.reference: More women aged 18 and 35 than ever before say that they haven’t had sex in the preceding year.

translation.cs: K poklesu počtu sexuálně aktivních jedinců přispívají i další faktory, ukázal průzkum Institutu pro rodinné studie (IFS).
translation.en: Other factors have been contributing to the decline in the number of sexually active individuals according to a survey done by the Institute for Family Studies (IFS).
translation.source: K poklesu počtu sexuálně aktivních jedinců přispívají i další faktory, ukázal průzkum Institutu pro rodinné studie (IFS).
translation.medium: The decline in the number of sexually active individuals is also influenced by other factors, according to a survey by the Institute for Family Studies (IFS).
translation.reference: Other factors have been contributing to the decline in the number of sexually active individuals according to a survey done by the Institute for Family Studies (IFS).

translation.cs: Jedním z nich mohou být ekonomické dopady pandemie koronaviru a vyšší procento nezaměstnanosti.
translation.en: One may be the economic impact of the coronavirus pandemic and higher unemployment rates.
translation.source: Jedním z nich mohou být ekonomické dopady pandemie koronaviru a vyšší procento nezaměstnanosti.
translation.medium: One of them could be the economic impact of the coronavirus pandemic and higher unemployment.
translation.reference: One may be the economic impact of the coronavirus pandemic and higher unemployment rates.

translation.cs: Přispět mohla ale také přítomnost médií, sociálních sítí či videoher, které pro mladé lidi dělají ze sexu menší a menší prioritu.
translation.en: The presence of media, social networks and video games, which make sex less and less of a priority for young people, may also have contributed.
translation.source: Přispět mohla ale také přítomnost médií, sociálních sítí či videoher, které pro mladé lidi dělají ze sexu menší a menší prioritu.
translation.medium: However, the presence of the media, social networks or video games could also have contributed to this. For young people, sex is becoming less and less of a priority.
translation.reference: The presence of media, social networks and video games, which make sex less and less of a priority for young people, may also have contributed.

translation.cs: „Od roku 2010 rychle roste podíl mužů a žen mezi 18 a 35 lety věku, kteří uvádí, že za předchozí rok neměli sex,“ uvedl výzkumný pracovník IFS Lyman Stone.
translation.en: "Since 2010, there has been a rapid increase in the proportion of men and women between the ages of 18 and 35 who report not having had sex in the previous year," said IFS researcher Lyman Stone.
translation.source: „Od roku 2010 rychle roste podíl mužů a žen mezi 18 a 35 lety věku, kteří uvádí, že za předchozí rok neměli sex,“ uvedl výzkumný pracovník IFS Lyman Stone.
translation.medium: Since 2010, the share of men and women between the ages of 18 and 35 who say they did not have sex in the past year has grown rapidly, said Lyman Stone, a researcher at the IFS.
translation.reference: "Since 2010, there has been a rapid increase in the proportion of men and women between the ages of 18 and 35 who report not having had sex in the previous year," said IFS researcher Lyman Stone.

translation.cs: U lidí v manželství je sexuální aktivita častější, za rok 2021 pouze 5 % z nich uvedlo, že byli za poslední rok bez sexu.
translation.en: Married people are more likely to be sexually active, with only 5% in 2021 saying they had not had sex in the last year.
translation.source: U lidí v manželství je sexuální aktivita častější, za rok 2021 pouze 5 % z nich uvedlo, že byli za poslední rok bez sexu.
translation.medium: People in marriages are more sexually active, with just 5% of those surveyed in 2021 saying they had gone a year without sex.
translation.reference: Married people are more likely to be sexually active, with only 5% in 2021 saying they had not had sex in the last year.

translation.cs: U svobodných lidí to bylo 29 %. Stone dodal, že manželství ve věku pod 35 je pouze malé procento.
translation.en: This was 29% for single people. Stone added that there is only a small percentage of marriages under the age of 35.
translation.source: U svobodných lidí to bylo 29 %. Stone dodal, že manželství ve věku pod 35 je pouze malé procento.
translation.medium: Among the unmarried, it was 29 percent. Stone added that marriages under age 35 are only a small percentage.
translation.reference: This was 29% for single people. Stone added that there is only a small percentage of marriages under the age of 35.

translation.cs: K úbytku sexuální aktivity pak přispívá také strach z předmanželského styku a náboženské založení.
translation.en: Fear of premarital intercourse and religiosity also contribute to the decline in sexual activity.
translation.source: K úbytku sexuální aktivity pak přispívá také strach z předmanželského styku a náboženské založení.
translation.medium: The decline in sexual activity is also due to the fear of premarital sex and the religious background.
translation.reference: Fear of premarital intercourse and religiosity also contribute to the decline in sexual activity.

translation.cs: Přestože je u manželů větší pravděpodobnost, že budou sexuálně aktivní, procento ženatých a vdaných mladších 35 let stále klesá.
translation.en: Although married couples are more likely to be sexually active, the percentage of married people under 35 is still declining.
translation.source: Přestože je u manželů větší pravděpodobnost, že budou sexuálně aktivní, procento ženatých a vdaných mladších 35 let stále klesá.
translation.medium: While married couples are more likely to be sexually active, the percentage of married and cohabiting people under 35 is still falling.
translation.reference: Although married couples are more likely to be sexually active, the percentage of married people under 35 is still declining.

translation.cs: Mladé lidi názor na předmanželský sex rozděluje, asi 30% ho má za špatnou věc, zatímco cca 70 % si myslí, že je v pořádku.
translation.en: Youngsters are divided on premarital sex, with about 30% considering it a bad thing, and around 70% seeing it as OK.
translation.source: Mladé lidi názor na předmanželský sex rozděluje, asi 30% ho má za špatnou věc, zatímco cca 70 % si myslí, že je v pořádku.
translation.medium: Young people are divided on the issue of premarital sex, with about 30% thinking it's a bad thing, while about 70% think it's okay.
translation.reference: Youngsters are divided on premarital sex, with about 30% considering it a bad thing, and around 70% seeing it as OK.

translation.cs: „Je pravda, že mezi svobodnými jedinci v této věkové skupině jsou minoritou, ale jejich chování tento trend posouvá,“ mluví Stone o těchto třiceti procentech.
translation.en: "They’re a minority among single individuals in this age group, it’s true, but their behavior is beginning to shift the trend," Stone says of the thirty percent.
translation.source: „Je pravda, že mezi svobodnými jedinci v této věkové skupině jsou minoritou, ale jejich chování tento trend posouvá,“ mluví Stone o těchto třiceti procentech.
translation.medium: While free-living individuals in this age group are a minority, their behavior is driving this trend," Stone says of the 30 percent.
translation.reference: "They’re a minority among single individuals in this age group, it’s true, but their behavior is beginning to shift the trend," Stone says of the thirty percent.

translation.cs: U většiny z těch, kteří mají morální problém s předmanželským stykem, je důvodem náboženské založení.
translation.en: Most people who have a moral problem with premarital intercourse cite religion as the reason.
translation.source: U většiny z těch, kteří mají morální problém s předmanželským stykem, je důvodem náboženské založení.
translation.medium: For most of those who have a moral problem with premarital sex, the reason is religious.
translation.reference: Most people who have a moral problem with premarital intercourse cite religion as the reason.

translation.cs: Od roku 2008 se u svobodných lidí mladších 35 let, kteří se náboženských setkání účastní více než jednou měsíčně, se poměr abstinence zvýšil z 20 na téměř 60 %.
translation.en: Since 2008, single people under 35 who attend religious meetings more than once a month have reported an increase in abstinence from 20% to almost 60%.
translation.source: Od roku 2008 se u svobodných lidí mladších 35 let, kteří se náboženských setkání účastní více než jednou měsíčně, se poměr abstinence zvýšil z 20 na téměř 60 %.
translation.medium: Since 2008, the abstinence rate among unmarried people younger than 35 who attend religious services more than once a month has increased from 20 percent to nearly 60 percent.
translation.reference: Since 2008, single people under 35 who attend religious meetings more than once a month have reported an increase in abstinence from 20% to almost 60%.

translation.cs: Mezi „méně věřícími“ se trend zvedl z 10 na 20 %," prohlásil Stone.
translation.en: Among the 'less religious', the trend has risen from 10% to 20%," Stone said.
translation.source: Mezi „méně věřícími“ se trend zvedl z 10 na 20 %," prohlásil Stone.
translation.medium: Among the "less religious," the trend rose from 10 to 20 percent," Stone said.
translation.reference: Among the 'less religious', the trend has risen from 10% to 20%," Stone said.

translation.cs: K poklesu sexuálních aktivit také přispívají další faktory, například méně sociální interakce a hlavně sociálního pití alkoholu za doby pandemie.
translation.en: There are also other factors contributing to the decline in sexual activity such as less social interaction and especially social drinking during the pandemic.
translation.source: K poklesu sexuálních aktivit také přispívají další faktory, například méně sociální interakce a hlavně sociálního pití alkoholu za doby pandemie.
translation.medium: Other factors contributing to the decline in sexual activity include less social interaction and especially less social drinking during the pandemic.
translation.reference: There are also other factors contributing to the decline in sexual activity such as less social interaction and especially social drinking during the pandemic.

translation.cs: Studie také ukázala, že je pravděpodobnost sexu menší u lidí bez práce, či s nižšími příjmy.
translation.en: The study has also showed that people without jobs or with lower incomes are less likely to have sex.
translation.source: Studie také ukázala, že je pravděpodobnost sexu menší u lidí bez práce, či s nižšími příjmy.
translation.medium: The study also showed that people who are unemployed or have lower incomes are less likely to have sex.
translation.reference: The study has also showed that people without jobs or with lower incomes are less likely to have sex.

translation.cs: Dalším důvodem může být rozšíření digitálních médií, které zřejmě snižují potřebu sexu.
translation.en: Another reason may be the spread of digital media which seems to reduce the need for sex.
translation.source: Dalším důvodem může být rozšíření digitálních médií, které zřejmě snižují potřebu sexu.
translation.medium: Another reason may be the expansion of digital media, which may reduce the need for sex.
translation.reference: Another reason may be the spread of digital media which seems to reduce the need for sex.

translation.cs: Lidé tráví více času online, čímž tuto potřebu „nahrazují“.
translation.en: People are spending more time online "replacing" this need.
translation.source: Lidé tráví více času online, čímž tuto potřebu „nahrazují“.
translation.medium: People are spending more time online, which is replacing this need.
translation.reference: People are spending more time online "replacing" this need.

translation.cs: Tento trend se uchytil hlavně za lockdownu v době pandemie koronaviru.
translation.en: This trend was particularly popular during the lockdown of the coronavirus pandemic.
translation.source: Tento trend se uchytil hlavně za lockdownu v době pandemie koronaviru.
translation.medium: This trend took hold especially during the lockdown during the coronavirus pandemic.
translation.reference: This trend was particularly popular during the lockdown of the coronavirus pandemic.

translation.cs: Celé nařizování vakcinace proti covidu je o tom, zda by měla společnost donutit část populace k chování, které oni nechtějí, ale které jim může zachránit život.
translation.en: The whole point of mandating Covid vaccination is about whether society should force a segment of the population to engage in a behaviour that they don't want but that could save their lives.
translation.source: Celé nařizování vakcinace proti covidu je o tom, zda by měla společnost donutit část populace k chování, které oni nechtějí, ale které jim může zachránit život.
translation.medium: The whole point of vaccinating against Covid is whether a society should force part of the population to do something they don't want to do, but which might save their lives.
translation.reference: The whole point of mandating Covid vaccination is about whether society should force a segment of the population to engage in a behaviour that they don't want but that could save their lives.

translation.cs: Je to poměrně těžká otázka, na které mě osobně nejvíc zajímá otázka společenského svědomí.
translation.en: This is a rather difficult question, and one in which I am personally most interested in the question of social conscience.
translation.source: Je to poměrně těžká otázka, na které mě osobně nejvíc zajímá otázka společenského svědomí.
translation.medium: It's a tough question, and one that I'm personally most interested in from the perspective of social conscience.
translation.reference: This is a rather difficult question, and one in which I am personally most interested in the question of social conscience.

translation.cs: Tj. například otázka, zda když jim to nenařídíme a oni umřou, tak to bude naše vina.
translation.en: I.e., for example, the question of whether it's our fault if we don't order it and they die.
translation.source: Tj. například otázka, zda když jim to nenařídíme a oni umřou, tak to bude naše vina.
translation.medium: For example, the question of whether, if we do not order them to do it and they die, it will be our fault.
translation.reference: I.e., for example, the question of whether it's our fault if we don't order it and they die.

translation.cs: Můj argument je, že bychom určitě mohli za smrt osmdesátiletého člověka, který vlastně moc nevěděl, dobře jsme mu to nevysvětlili, zaslechl nějakou dezinformaci, a v důsledku toho se naočkovat nedal a nakonec to chytil a umřel.
translation.en: My reason is that we could certainly blame the death of an 80 year old man who didn't really know much, we didn't explain it well, he heard some misinformation, and as a result didn't get vaccinated and ended up catching it and dying.
translation.source: Můj argument je, že bychom určitě mohli za smrt osmdesátiletého člověka, který vlastně moc nevěděl, dobře jsme mu to nevysvětlili, zaslechl nějakou dezinformaci, a v důsledku toho se naočkovat nedal a nakonec to chytil a umřel.
translation.medium: My argument is that we could certainly be held responsible for the death of an 80-year-old man who didn't really know what he was doing, we didn't explain it well enough to him, he heard some misinformation, and in the end he didn't get vaccinated and died.
translation.reference: My reason is that we could certainly blame the death of an 80 year old man who didn't really know much, we didn't explain it well, he heard some misinformation, and as a result didn't get vaccinated and ended up catching it and dying.

translation.cs: Na druhou stranu si nemyslím, že můžeme za smrt zatvrzelého odpůrce očkování, který tu po boku SPD a KSČ pořvává něco o šikaně a totalitním státu.
translation.en: On the other hand, I don't think we are to blame for the death of an inveterate opponent of vaccination who is shouting something about bullying and a totalitarian state alongside the SPD and the Communist Party.
translation.source: Na druhou stranu si nemyslím, že můžeme za smrt zatvrzelého odpůrce očkování, který tu po boku SPD a KSČ pořvává něco o šikaně a totalitním státu.
translation.medium: On the other hand, I do not think that we can be held responsible for the death of a stubborn opponent of vaccinations, who is standing here next to the SPD and the KSČ, shouting something about bullying and a totalitarian state.
translation.reference: On the other hand, I don't think we are to blame for the death of an inveterate opponent of vaccination who is shouting something about bullying and a totalitarian state alongside the SPD and the Communist Party.

translation.cs: Z těch statistik co jsem zmínil lze celkem jasně dovozovat, že většina neočkovaných důchodců nejspíš patří do té druhé skupiny, tudíž si za to skutečně budou moct sami.
translation.en: From the statistics I mentioned, it is quite clear that most of the unvaccinated pensioners probably belong to the second group, so they will really be to blame.
translation.source: Z těch statistik co jsem zmínil lze celkem jasně dovozovat, že většina neočkovaných důchodců nejspíš patří do té druhé skupiny, tudíž si za to skutečně budou moct sami.
translation.medium: From the statistics I mentioned, it can be inferred that the majority of unvaccinated pensioners probably belong to the second group, so they will be able to blame themselves.
translation.reference: From the statistics I mentioned, it is quite clear that most of the unvaccinated pensioners probably belong to the second group, so they will really be to blame.

translation.cs: Česko bez sněhu.
translation.en: Czech Republic without snow.
translation.source: Česko bez sněhu.
translation.medium: Czechia without snow.
translation.reference: Czech Republic without snow.

translation.cs: Jak se mírná zima podepíše na boji se suchem?
translation.en: How will the mild winter affect the fight against drought?
translation.source: Jak se mírná zima podepíše na boji se suchem?
translation.medium: How will the mild winter affect the fight against drought?
translation.reference: How will the mild winter affect the fight against drought?

translation.cs: Letošní zima dosud v Česku přinesla jednu z nejmenších sněhových nadílek za poslední dobu.
translation.en: So far, this winter has brought the least amount of snow in the Czech Republic in recent times.
translation.source: Letošní zima dosud v Česku přinesla jednu z nejmenších sněhových nadílek za poslední dobu.
translation.medium: This winter has so far brought one of the smallest snowfalls in the Czech Republic in recent years.
translation.reference: So far, this winter has brought the least amount of snow in the Czech Republic in recent times.

translation.cs: Provozovatelé lyžařských areálů se neobejdou bez technického sněhu, počasí komplikuje třeba i přípravu běžkařské Jizerské padesátky.
translation.en: The ski resorts operators cannot do without technical snow, the weather also complicates the preparation of the cross-country skiing Jizerska 50.
translation.source: Provozovatelé lyžařských areálů se neobejdou bez technického sněhu, počasí komplikuje třeba i přípravu běžkařské Jizerské padesátky.
translation.medium: Operators of ski resorts cannot do without artificial snow, the weather is also complicating the preparations for the cross-country skiing Jizerská 50.
translation.reference: The ski resorts operators cannot do without technical snow, the weather also complicates the preparation of the cross-country skiing Jizerska 50.

translation.cs: Jde o trend, nebo o výjimku?
translation.en: Is this a trend or an exception?
translation.source: Jde o trend, nebo o výjimku?
translation.medium: Is this a trend or an exception?
translation.reference: Is this a trend or an exception?

translation.cs: A co bude málo sněhu znamenat pro boj se suchem v Česku?
translation.en: And what will such little snow mean for the fight against drought in the Czech Republic?
translation.source: A co bude málo sněhu znamenat pro boj se suchem v Česku?
translation.medium: And what will the lack of snow mean for the fight against drought in the Czech Republic?
translation.reference: And what will such little snow mean for the fight against drought in the Czech Republic?

translation.cs: Jednu historku bych měla, ale nejde v ní o pánbíčkáře.
translation.en: I have one story, but it's not about a bible basher.
translation.source: Jednu historku bych měla, ale nejde v ní o pánbíčkáře.
translation.medium: I have one story, but it's not about a prankster.
translation.reference: I have one story, but it's not about a bible basher.

translation.cs: Jednou na střední nás učitelka vedla přes celé město na loděnici, abychom se mohly projet na loďkách po řece.
translation.en: Once in high school, our teacher took us across town to the boathouse so we could go boating on the river.
translation.source: Jednou na střední nás učitelka vedla přes celé město na loděnici, abychom se mohly projet na loďkách po řece.
translation.medium: Once in middle school, our teacher took us all the way across town to the boat dock so we could go boating on the river.
translation.reference: Once in high school, our teacher took us across town to the boathouse so we could go boating on the river.

translation.cs: Cestou tam jsme šly jednou takovou docela širokou ulicí a koho asi v prostředku nevidíme - stoupence sekty Hare Krišna.
translation.en: On the way there, we walked down a fairly wide street and who do we see in the middle – followers of Hare Krishna.
translation.source: Cestou tam jsme šly jednou takovou docela širokou ulicí a koho asi v prostředku nevidíme - stoupence sekty Hare Krišna.
translation.medium: On the way there, we walked down a fairly wide street and who did we see in the middle of it - Hare Krišna followers.
translation.reference: On the way there, we walked down a fairly wide street and who do we see in the middle – followers of Hare Krishna.

translation.cs: Samozřejmě se na nás sesypali.
translation.en: They came down on us of course.
translation.source: Samozřejmě se na nás sesypali.
translation.medium: Of course, they came down on us.
translation.reference: They came down on us of course.

translation.cs: Já jsem naštěstí utekla, ale s jednou kamarádkou se dali do řeči.
translation.en: I was lucky I got away, but they started talking to a friend.
translation.source: Já jsem naštěstí utekla, ale s jednou kamarádkou se dali do řeči.
translation.medium: Fortunately, I managed to escape, but one of my friends got into an argument.
translation.reference: I was lucky I got away, but they started talking to a friend.

translation.cs: Když od nich odešla, ptaly jsme se jí i s učitelkou, co jim říkala.
translation.en: When she left, the teacher and I asked her what she had told them.
translation.source: Když od nich odešla, ptaly jsme se jí i s učitelkou, co jim říkala.
translation.medium: When she left, we asked her and her teacher what she had told them.
translation.reference: When she left, the teacher and I asked her what she had told them.

translation.cs: "Ptali se mně, jestli prý chci spasit svou duši.
translation.en: "They asked me if I wanted to save my soul.
translation.source: "Ptali se mně, jestli prý chci spasit svou duši.
translation.medium: They asked me if I wanted to save my soul.
translation.reference: "They asked me if I wanted to save my soul.

translation.cs: Já jsem jim na to řekla, že žádnou duši nemám," odpověděla.
translation.en: I told them I had no soul," she replied.
translation.source: Já jsem jim na to řekla, že žádnou duši nemám," odpověděla.
translation.medium: I told them I don't have a soul," she replied.
translation.reference: I told them I had no soul," she replied.

translation.cs: Všechny, včetně učitelky, jsme se smály celou cestu až na loděnici.
translation.en: All of us, including the teacher, laughed all the way to the boat house.
translation.source: Všechny, včetně učitelky, jsme se smály celou cestu až na loděnici.
translation.medium: We all laughed all the way to the boathouse, including the teacher.
translation.reference: All of us, including the teacher, laughed all the way to the boat house.

translation.cs: Jsme hrozně rozmazlení.
translation.en: We're terribly spoiled.
translation.source: Jsme hrozně rozmazlení.
translation.medium: We are spoiled.
translation.reference: We're terribly spoiled.

translation.cs: Neděje se toho tolik, ale systém už se hroutí, říká Orozovič
translation.en: Not that much is happening, but the system has already been collapsing, says Orozovic.
translation.source: Neděje se toho tolik, ale systém už se hroutí, říká Orozovič
translation.medium: Not much is happening, but the system is already collapsing, says Orozovič
translation.reference: Not that much is happening, but the system has already been collapsing, says Orozovic.

translation.cs: Nový německý kancléř Olaf Scholz po předchozích návštěvách Paříže a Bruselu v neděli přiletěl do Varšavy, kde jej s vojenskými poctami přivítal premiér Mateusz Morawiecki.
translation.en: After prior visits to Paris and Brussels, the new German chancellor, Olaf Scholz, flew into Warsaw on Sunday, where he was greeted with military honors by Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki.
translation.source: Nový německý kancléř Olaf Scholz po předchozích návštěvách Paříže a Bruselu v neděli přiletěl do Varšavy, kde jej s vojenskými poctami přivítal premiér Mateusz Morawiecki.
translation.medium: New German Chancellor Olaf Scholz arrived in Warsaw on Sunday after visits to Paris and Brussels, where he was welcomed with military honours by Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki.
translation.reference: After prior visits to Paris and Brussels, the new German chancellor, Olaf Scholz, flew into Warsaw on Sunday, where he was greeted with military honors by Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki.

translation.cs: „Otvíráme novou kapitolu vzájemných vztahů,“ řekl Morawiecki na společné tiskové konferenci po jednání.
translation.en: "We are turning over a new page in our relationship," Morawiecki told a joint press conference after the meeting.
translation.source: „Otvíráme novou kapitolu vzájemných vztahů,“ řekl Morawiecki na společné tiskové konferenci po jednání.
translation.medium: We are opening a new chapter in our relations, said Morawiecki at a joint press conference after the meeting.
translation.reference: "We are turning over a new page in our relationship," Morawiecki told a joint press conference after the meeting.

translation.cs: Scholz zdůraznil, že Evropa musí dát společně najevo, že nebude akceptovat porušení územní celistvosti Ukrajiny.
translation.en: Scholz stressed that Europe must make it clear together that no violation of Ukraine's territorial integrity will be accepted.
translation.source: Scholz zdůraznil, že Evropa musí dát společně najevo, že nebude akceptovat porušení územní celistvosti Ukrajiny.
translation.medium: Scholz stressed that Europe must show together that it will not accept the violation of the territorial integrity of Ukraine.
translation.reference: Scholz stressed that Europe must make it clear together that no violation of Ukraine's territorial integrity will be accepted.

translation.cs: Krizi, vyvolanou znepokojivými pohyby ruských vojsk u ukrajinských hranic, je podle kancléře záhodno řešit s využitím diplomatických jednání, a to i v rámci „normandské skupiny“, sdružující Francii, Německo, Rusko a Ukrajinu.
translation.en: According to the chancellor, the crisis, triggered by alarming Russian troop movements near the Ukrainian border, should be resolved by diplomatic negotiations, including the Normandy format, which brings together France, Germany, Russia, and Ukraine.
translation.source: Krizi, vyvolanou znepokojivými pohyby ruských vojsk u ukrajinských hranic, je podle kancléře záhodno řešit s využitím diplomatických jednání, a to i v rámci „normandské skupiny“, sdružující Francii, Německo, Rusko a Ukrajinu.
translation.medium: According to the Chancellor, the crisis caused by the worrying movements of Russian troops near the Ukrainian border is worth resolving through diplomatic negotiations, even within the "Normandy Group", which brings together France, Germany, Russia and Ukraine.
translation.reference: According to the chancellor, the crisis, triggered by alarming Russian troop movements near the Ukrainian border, should be resolved by diplomatic negotiations, including the Normandy format, which brings together France, Germany, Russia, and Ukraine.

translation.cs: Morawiecki uvedl, že kancléře informoval o situaci na polské hranici s Běloruskem, jehož vůdce Alexandr Lukašenko uměle vyvolal migrační krizi a používá lidi jako živé terče a zbraň, protože noc co noc zaznamenáváme stovku pokusů o (nelegální) překročení hranic.
translation.en: Morawiecki said he had informed the chancellor about the situation on the Polish border with Belarus, whose leader, Alexander Lukashenko, artificially created a migration crisis and is using people as live targets and weapons, as night after night hundreds of (illegal) attempts to cross the border are recorded.
translation.source: Morawiecki uvedl, že kancléře informoval o situaci na polské hranici s Běloruskem, jehož vůdce Alexandr Lukašenko uměle vyvolal migrační krizi a používá lidi jako živé terče a zbraň, protože noc co noc zaznamenáváme stovku pokusů o (nelegální) překročení hranic.
translation.medium: Morawiecki said he informed the chancellor about the situation on the Polish border with Belarus, whose leader Alexander Lukashenko has artificially created a migration crisis and uses people as live targets and weapons, as we record a hundred attempts to (illegally) cross the border every night.
translation.reference: Morawiecki said he had informed the chancellor about the situation on the Polish border with Belarus, whose leader, Alexander Lukashenko, artificially created a migration crisis and is using people as live targets and weapons, as night after night hundreds of (illegal) attempts to cross the border are recorded.

translation.cs: S kancléřem jednal o dalších sankcích, aby Lukašenkův režim a jeho patroni v Kremlu konečně pochopili, že jsme rozhodnuti ubránit východní hranici EU.
translation.en: He discussed further sanctions with the chancellor so that Lukashenko’s regime and its supporters in the Kremlin would finally realize that we are determined to protect the EU's eastern border.
translation.source: S kancléřem jednal o dalších sankcích, aby Lukašenkův režim a jeho patroni v Kremlu konečně pochopili, že jsme rozhodnuti ubránit východní hranici EU.
translation.medium: I spoke to the Chancellor about further sanctions to finally make the Lukashenko regime and its patrons in the Kremlin understand that we are determined to defend the eastern border of the EU.
translation.reference: He discussed further sanctions with the chancellor so that Lukashenko’s regime and its supporters in the Kremlin would finally realize that we are determined to protect the EU's eastern border.

translation.cs: Scholz podle agentury DPA ujistil, že Varšava se ve sporu s Běloruskem těší německé podpoře, a odsoudil nelidské zacházení Lukašenkova režimu s běženci.
translation.en: According to the DPA, Scholz made it understood that Warsaw can depend on German support in the dispute with Belarus and condemned the inhumane treatment of refugees by Lukashenko’s regime.
translation.source: Scholz podle agentury DPA ujistil, že Varšava se ve sporu s Běloruskem těší německé podpoře, a odsoudil nelidské zacházení Lukašenkova režimu s běženci.
translation.medium: Scholz, according to the DPA agency, assured that Warsaw can count on German support in the dispute with Belarus, and condemned the inhumane treatment of Lukashenko's regime with refugees.
translation.reference: According to the DPA, Scholz made it understood that Warsaw can depend on German support in the dispute with Belarus and condemned the inhumane treatment of refugees by Lukashenko’s regime.

translation.cs: Opilá polská řeholnice zavinila nehodu, snažila se to zatajit
translation.en: Drunk Polish nun caused accident, tried to hide it
translation.source: Opilá polská řeholnice zavinila nehodu, snažila se to zatajit
translation.medium: Drunk Polish nun caused crash, tried to cover it up
translation.reference: Drunk Polish nun caused accident, tried to hide it

translation.cs: Auto se po chvíli na místo nehody vrátilo, vůz však řídila už jiná jeptiška, která se pokoušela vzít vinu na sebe.
translation.en: After a short time, the vehicle returned to the scene, but another nun was driving and tried to take the blame.
translation.source: Auto se po chvíli na místo nehody vrátilo, vůz však řídila už jiná jeptiška, která se pokoušela vzít vinu na sebe.
translation.medium: The car returned to the scene of the accident after a while, but it was driven by another nun, who tried to take the blame on herself.
translation.reference: After a short time, the vehicle returned to the scene, but another nun was driving and tried to take the blame.

translation.cs: Když jí policisté sdělili, že i tak může za nedání přednosti v jízdě a ujetí z místa nehody přijít o řidičský průkaz, vyšla s pravdou ven, uvedla stanice TVN24.
translation.en: When police officers told her that she could still lose her license for failing to give right of way and leaving the scene of an accident, she came clean, TVN24 reported.
translation.source: Když jí policisté sdělili, že i tak může za nedání přednosti v jízdě a ujetí z místa nehody přijít o řidičský průkaz, vyšla s pravdou ven, uvedla stanice TVN24.
translation.medium: When the police told her that she could still lose her driving licence for failing to give way and leaving the scene of an accident, she came clean, TVN24 reported.
translation.reference: When police officers told her that she could still lose her license for failing to give right of way and leaving the scene of an accident, she came clean, TVN24 reported.

translation.cs: Přiznala, že do vozidla narazila jiná jeptiška, která ji požádala o pomoc.
translation.en: She admitted that the vehicle had been hit by another nun, who asked for her help.
translation.source: Přiznala, že do vozidla narazila jiná jeptiška, která ji požádala o pomoc.
translation.medium: She admitted that she hit another nun, who asked her for help.
translation.reference: She admitted that the vehicle had been hit by another nun, who asked for her help.

translation.cs: Policisté si pak pro sestru Celestinu přišli.
translation.en: The police then came for Sister Celestina.
translation.source: Policisté si pak pro sestru Celestinu přišli.
translation.medium: The police then came for Celestina.
translation.reference: The police then came for Sister Celestina.

translation.cs: Podrobili ji dechové zkoušce a poté, co zjistili, že má v krvi přes dvě promile, okamžitě jí odebrali řidičský průkaz.
translation.en: She was breathalyzed and they found she had over two milligrams of alcohol in her blood so they immediately revoked her driver's license.
translation.source: Podrobili ji dechové zkoušce a poté, co zjistili, že má v krvi přes dvě promile, okamžitě jí odebrali řidičský průkaz.
translation.medium: They subjected her to a breathalyser test and, after discovering that she had more than two promilles of alcohol in her blood, they immediately confiscated her driving licence.
translation.reference: She was breathalyzed and they found she had over two milligrams of alcohol in her blood so they immediately revoked her driver's license.

translation.cs: Současně jí oznámili, že se ze svých činů bude zpovídat u soudu.
translation.en: At the same time, they informed her that she would answer for her actions in court.
translation.source: Současně jí oznámili, že se ze svých činů bude zpovídat u soudu.
translation.medium: At the same time, they informed her that she would have to account for her actions in court.
translation.reference: At the same time, they informed her that she would answer for her actions in court.

translation.cs: Pes Hugo dělá co může.
translation.en: Hugo the dog is doing his best.
translation.source: Pes Hugo dělá co může.
translation.medium: Hugo the dog is doing what he can.
translation.reference: Hugo the dog is doing his best.

translation.cs: Juraj Šajmovič ale svůj film neuhlídal.
translation.en: But Juraj Šajmovič did not protect his film.
translation.source: Juraj Šajmovič ale svůj film neuhlídal.
translation.medium: Juraj Šajmovič, however, did not keep an eye on his film.
translation.reference: But Juraj Šajmovič did not protect his film.

translation.cs: Čeští tvůrci rodinných komedií se zhlédli v amerických příbězích o psích miláčcích.
translation.en: Czech filmmakers of family comedies have been inspired by American stories about pet dogs.
translation.source: Čeští tvůrci rodinných komedií se zhlédli v amerických příbězích o psích miláčcích.
translation.medium: The Czech creators of family comedies looked to American stories about beloved pets.
translation.reference: Czech filmmakers of family comedies have been inspired by American stories about pet dogs.

translation.cs: Zapomněli ale při tom na podstatnou věc: zákonitosti filmového řemesla.
translation.en: But in doing so, they forgot one essential thing: the laws of film craft.
translation.source: Zapomněli ale při tom na podstatnou věc: zákonitosti filmového řemesla.
translation.medium: However, they forgot one important thing: the laws of filmmaking.
translation.reference: But in doing so, they forgot one essential thing: the laws of film craft.

translation.cs: Po kýčovitém filmu F. Brabce Gump - pes, který naučil lidi žít, se teď o divácké emoce v kinech uchází další snímek Tady hlídáme my.
translation.en: After F. Brabec's kitsch film Gump - The Dog Who Taught People How to Live, another film, Watchdogs, is now competing for the audience's emotions.
translation.source: Po kýčovitém filmu F. Brabce Gump - pes, který naučil lidi žít, se teď o divácké emoce v kinech uchází další snímek Tady hlídáme my.
translation.medium: After the kitschy film F. Brabce Gump - the dog that taught people to live, another film is now vying for the audience's emotions in cinemas.
translation.reference: After F. Brabec's kitsch film Gump - The Dog Who Taught People How to Live, another film, Watchdogs, is now competing for the audience's emotions.

translation.cs: Spoluautor scénáře i režisér v jedné osobě Juraj Šajmovič ml. volně navazuje na svůj předchozí film Tady hlídám já z roku 2012.
translation.en: Co-writer and director Juraj Šajmovič Jr. follows his previous film Watchdog made in 2012.
translation.source: Spoluautor scénáře i režisér v jedné osobě Juraj Šajmovič ml. volně navazuje na svůj předchozí film Tady hlídám já z roku 2012.
translation.medium: Juraj Šajmovič Jr., the scriptwriter and director in one person, loosely follows his previous film Tady hlídám já from 2012.
translation.reference: Co-writer and director Juraj Šajmovič Jr. follows his previous film Watchdog made in 2012.

translation.cs: Na scénu se vrací mluvící jezevčík Hugo a některé známé postavy kolem něj.
translation.en: Hugo the talking dachshund and some familiar characters are returning to the scene.
translation.source: Na scénu se vrací mluvící jezevčík Hugo a některé známé postavy kolem něj.
translation.medium: Hugo, the talking hedgehog, is back, along with some familiar characters.
translation.reference: Hugo the talking dachshund and some familiar characters are returning to the scene.

translation.cs: Julie a Ivan, majitelé šumavského penzionu, který skomírá, a tak do něj začnou zvát pejskaře, Juliin otec s partnerkou a hlavně její dcera Veronika.
translation.en: Julie and Ivan, the owners of a poorly-run guesthouse in the Šumava Mountains, start inviting dog walkers, Julie's father and his partner and especially her daughter Veronika.
translation.source: Julie a Ivan, majitelé šumavského penzionu, který skomírá, a tak do něj začnou zvát pejskaře, Juliin otec s partnerkou a hlavně její dcera Veronika.
translation.medium: Julie and Ivan, the owners of a dying pension in the Šumava mountains, start inviting dog owners, Julie's father with his partner and especially her daughter Veronika.
translation.reference: Julie and Ivan, the owners of a poorly-run guesthouse in the Šumava Mountains, start inviting dog walkers, Julie's father and his partner and especially her daughter Veronika.

translation.cs: Ta už není malou holčičkou, nýbrž dospívající dívkou, jež prožívá první lásku.
translation.en: She’s not a little girl any more, but a teenager experiencing first love.
translation.source: Ta už není malou holčičkou, nýbrž dospívající dívkou, jež prožívá první lásku.
translation.medium: She is no longer a little girl, but a teenager who is experiencing her first love.
translation.reference: She’s not a little girl any more, but a teenager experiencing first love.

translation.cs: Režisér s partnerkou Beatriz Šajmovičovou (která je i producentkou filmu) se potýkali s postupy vyprávění už v předchozím psím snímku, tam ale bavily alespoň děti a pes.
translation.en: The director and his partner Beatriz Šajmovič (who is also the producer of the film) had already struggled with the narrative techniques in their previous dog film, but there at least the children and the dog had fun.
translation.source: Režisér s partnerkou Beatriz Šajmovičovou (která je i producentkou filmu) se potýkali s postupy vyprávění už v předchozím psím snímku, tam ale bavily alespoň děti a pes.
translation.medium: The director and his partner Beatriz Šajmovičová (who is also the film's producer) struggled with the narrative in their previous dog film, but at least children and the dog were amusing.
translation.reference: The director and his partner Beatriz Šajmovič (who is also the producer of the film) had already struggled with the narrative techniques in their previous dog film, but there at least the children and the dog had fun.

translation.cs: Tentokrát napsala tvůrčí dvojice ještě slabší scénář, který vyvolává směsici úžasu a pocitů trapnosti.
translation.en: This time, the creative duo wrote an even weaker script that evokes a mixture of amazement and embarrassment.
translation.source: Tentokrát napsala tvůrčí dvojice ještě slabší scénář, který vyvolává směsici úžasu a pocitů trapnosti.
translation.medium: This time, the creative duo has written an even weaker script that elicits a mixture of awe and embarrassment.
translation.reference: This time, the creative duo wrote an even weaker script that evokes a mixture of amazement and embarrassment.

translation.cs: Pojďme si to shrnout.
translation.en: Let's sum it up.
translation.source: Pojďme si to shrnout.
translation.medium: Let's recap.
translation.reference: Let's sum it up.

translation.cs: Julie, ač vědkyně, podléhá v touze po dítěti tmářským bludům a přijde-li správná „konstelace“, kopuluje se svým lesním inženýrem Ivanem, kdekoli souřadnice právě určí – na kapotě auta či kostelní věži (samozřejmě během probíhající exkurze s místním průvodcem), vysloužilý plukovník Mojmír navzdory letitému výcviku postřelí v lese vlastní dceru (Julii), která upadne do kómatu, načež je rodinou odebrána nemocnici, aby se v srdci šumavské samoty mohl odehrát zázračný proces uzdravení psem.
translation.en: Julie, though a scientist, succumbs to superstitious delusions in her desire for a child and, if the right "constellation" comes along, she copulates with her forest engineer Ivan wherever the coordinates determine - on the hood of a car or a church tower (during an ongoing excursion with a local guide, of course); Mojmír, a retired colonel, despite his years of training, shoots his own daughter (Julia) in the woods she then falls into a coma, whereupon she is taken by her family away from the hospital so that the miraculous process of healing by dog can take place in the heart of the Šumava solitude.
translation.source: Julie, ač vědkyně, podléhá v touze po dítěti tmářským bludům a přijde-li správná „konstelace“, kopuluje se svým lesním inženýrem Ivanem, kdekoli souřadnice právě určí – na kapotě auta či kostelní věži (samozřejmě během probíhající exkurze s místním průvodcem), vysloužilý plukovník Mojmír navzdory letitému výcviku postřelí v lese vlastní dceru (Julii), která upadne do kómatu, načež je rodinou odebrána nemocnici, aby se v srdci šumavské samoty mohl odehrát zázračný proces uzdravení psem.
translation.medium: Julie, despite being a scientist, falls prey to superstitious nonsense and, if the stars are right, will copulate with her forest engineer Ivan wherever the coordinates dictate - on the bonnet of a car or a church tower (of course, during an ongoing tour with a local guide), retired Colonel Mojmír, despite years of training, shoots his own daughter (Julie), who falls into a coma, and the family takes her to the hospital, where a miraculous healing process can take place with the help of a dog.
translation.reference: Julie, though a scientist, succumbs to superstitious delusions in her desire for a child and, if the right "constellation" comes along, she copulates with her forest engineer Ivan wherever the coordinates determine - on the hood of a car or a church tower (during an ongoing excursion with a local guide, of course); Mojmír, a retired colonel, despite his years of training, shoots his own daughter (Julia) in the woods she then falls into a coma, whereupon she is taken by her family away from the hospital so that the miraculous process of healing by dog can take place in the heart of the Šumava solitude.

translation.cs: Nic proti očistné léčbě přírody a síle zvířecích miláčků.
translation.en: Nothing against the cleansing treatment of nature and the power of pets.
translation.source: Nic proti očistné léčbě přírody a síle zvířecích miláčků.
translation.medium: Nothing against the healing power of nature and the strength of beloved animals.
translation.reference: Nothing against the cleansing treatment of nature and the power of pets.

translation.cs: Jejich majitelé vědí, proč je mají.
translation.en: Their owners know why they got them.
translation.source: Jejich majitelé vědí, proč je mají.
translation.medium: Their owners know why they have them.
translation.reference: Their owners know why they got them.

translation.cs: Divák ale žasne, jaký obsahový pelmel plný nevěrohodných situací i figur byl k tomuto poselství zapotřebí.
translation.en: However, the audience is amazed at the motley collection of unbelievable situations and scenes that were needed for this message.
translation.source: Divák ale žasne, jaký obsahový pelmel plný nevěrohodných situací i figur byl k tomuto poselství zapotřebí.
translation.medium: However, the viewer is amazed at the amount of content jumble full of unbelievable situations and figures that was needed to convey this message.
translation.reference: However, the audience is amazed at the motley collection of unbelievable situations and scenes that were needed for this message.

translation.cs: Dvojice zlodějek z personálu, soutěž pejskařů, šumavský šarlatán, policajti přijíždějící na udání hledat „drogy“ a diskutující nad bylinkami o hnojivé síle kostní moučky – a které vypečená rodinka v penzionu samozřejmě opije.
translation.en: A couple of female thieves among the staff, a competition of dog-walkers, a Šumava charlatan, policemen arriving on a tip-off to look for "drugs" and people discussing over herbs about the fertilizing power of bone meal - which get drunk by the foxy family in the guesthouse, of course.
translation.source: Dvojice zlodějek z personálu, soutěž pejskařů, šumavský šarlatán, policajti přijíždějící na udání hledat „drogy“ a diskutující nad bylinkami o hnojivé síle kostní moučky – a které vypečená rodinka v penzionu samozřejmě opije.
translation.medium: A pair of thieves from the staff, a dog show, the Shumava charlatan, the police coming to a tip-off to look for "drugs" and discussing the fertilising power of bone meal - and, of course, the over-indulged family staying in the pension.
translation.reference: A couple of female thieves among the staff, a competition of dog-walkers, a Šumava charlatan, policemen arriving on a tip-off to look for "drugs" and people discussing over herbs about the fertilizing power of bone meal - which get drunk by the foxy family in the guesthouse, of course.

translation.cs: Když se hrdinka po těžkém kómatu probere a vzápětí sedí naondulovaná a nalíčená s cigárem u rodinného stolu a dožaduje se otcovy whisky a flákoty coby vyléčená vegetariánka, nelze se nesmát.
translation.en: When the heroine wakes up after a severe coma and sits at the family table with a cigarette and make-up on, demanding her father's whiskey and meat as a cured vegetarian, it is hard not to laugh.
translation.source: Když se hrdinka po těžkém kómatu probere a vzápětí sedí naondulovaná a nalíčená s cigárem u rodinného stolu a dožaduje se otcovy whisky a flákoty coby vyléčená vegetariánka, nelze se nesmát.
translation.medium: When the heroine wakes up from a coma and immediately sits at the family table, made up and smoking a cigar, demanding her father's whisky and chips as a recovered vegetarian, it's hard not to laugh.
translation.reference: When the heroine wakes up after a severe coma and sits at the family table with a cigarette and make-up on, demanding her father's whiskey and meat as a cured vegetarian, it is hard not to laugh.

translation.cs: Navrch ještě divákovi tvůrci vysvětlí, že „to se někdy po kómatu stává“.
translation.en: On top of that, the filmmakers explain to viewers that "this happens after a coma sometimes."
translation.source: Navrch ještě divákovi tvůrci vysvětlí, že „to se někdy po kómatu stává“.
translation.medium: To top it off, the creators explain to the viewer that "this sometimes happens after a coma."
translation.reference: On top of that, the filmmakers explain to viewers that "this happens after a coma sometimes."

translation.cs: Šajmovičovu týmu chybí základní dramaturgické znalosti práce s textem, schopnost vystavět nosné situace, cit pro charaktery postav i pointu a režijní vedení.
translation.en: Šajmovič's team lacks the basic knowledge of dramaturgy, the ability to construct supporting situations, a sense for the characters and the punchline, and directorial leadership.
translation.source: Šajmovičovu týmu chybí základní dramaturgické znalosti práce s textem, schopnost vystavět nosné situace, cit pro charaktery postav i pointu a režijní vedení.
translation.medium: Šajmovič's team lacks the basic dramaturgical knowledge of working with the text, the ability to build the main situations, the feeling for the characters and the point, and the directorial guidance.
translation.reference: Šajmovič's team lacks the basic knowledge of dramaturgy, the ability to construct supporting situations, a sense for the characters and the punchline, and directorial leadership.

translation.cs: Herecké výkony jsou nevyrovnané, střih bezradný a celkový dojem upatlaný.
translation.en: The acting is uneven, the editing clueless and the overall impression sloppy.
translation.source: Herecké výkony jsou nevyrovnané, střih bezradný a celkový dojem upatlaný.
translation.medium: The performances are uneven, the editing is clumsy and the overall impression is sloppy.
translation.reference: The acting is uneven, the editing clueless and the overall impression sloppy.

translation.cs: Jakkoli se Lukáš Vaculík, Jitka Ježková či Nela Boudová snaží své party ustát, nemají příliš co hrát.
translation.en: As much as Lukáš Vaculík, Jitka Ježková and Nela Boudová try to hold to their roles, they don't have much to act.
translation.source: Jakkoli se Lukáš Vaculík, Jitka Ježková či Nela Boudová snaží své party ustát, nemají příliš co hrát.
