translation.medium: Due to the modernisation of the railway, there are long-term restrictions on the tracks from Prague to Beroun, Prague to Lysá nad Labem and around Kolín.
translation.reference: Long-term restrictions continue on the lines Prague - Beroun, Prague - Lysá nad Labem and in the vicinity of Kolín due to the modernisation of the railway.

translation.cs: Změny čekají na cestující také na dalších místech.
translation.en: Changes are also awaiting passengers at other locations.
translation.source: Změny čekají na cestující také na dalších místech.
translation.medium: Passengers can also expect changes at other locations.
translation.reference: Changes are also awaiting passengers at other locations.

translation.cs: Autobusy nahrazují některé zrušené železniční linky nebo se rozšiřuje úsek na lince 420 z Dobříše s návazností z Prahy, kde je možné využívat jízdenky PID až do Milevska.
translation.en: Buses will replace some canceled railway lines or extend the section on the 420 line from Dobříš with a connection from Prague, where it is possible to use PID tickets all the way to Milevsko.
translation.source: Autobusy nahrazují některé zrušené železniční linky nebo se rozšiřuje úsek na lince 420 z Dobříše s návazností z Prahy, kde je možné využívat jízdenky PID až do Milevska.
translation.medium: Buses are replacing some of the cancelled railway lines or expanding the section of line 420 from Dobříš with a connection to Prague, where it is possible to use PID tickets all the way to Milevsko.
translation.reference: Buses will replace some canceled railway lines or extend the section on the 420 line from Dobříš with a connection from Prague, where it is possible to use PID tickets all the way to Milevsko.

translation.cs: Změnu doznaly trasy linek 540 až 543 na Nymbursku a upraveny jsou trasy některých autobusů na hranici středních Čech a Hořovicka v Plzeňském kraji.
translation.en: The 540 to 543 line routes in Nymburk have been changed and some bus routes on the border of central Bohemia and Hořovice in the Pilsen region have been modified.
translation.source: Změnu doznaly trasy linek 540 až 543 na Nymbursku a upraveny jsou trasy některých autobusů na hranici středních Čech a Hořovicka v Plzeňském kraji.
translation.medium: The routes of lines 540 to 543 in Nymburk have been changed, and the routes of some buses on the border of the Central Bohemian Region and Hořovicko in the Plzeň Region have been adjusted.
translation.reference: The 540 to 543 line routes in Nymburk have been changed and some bus routes on the border of central Bohemia and Hořovice in the Pilsen region have been modified.

translation.cs: Zdravá svačina/oběd do kanceláře ze supermarketu
translation.en: Healthy office snack/lunch from the supermarket
translation.source: Zdravá svačina/oběd do kanceláře ze supermarketu
translation.medium: Healthy snack/lunch from the supermarket for the office
translation.reference: Healthy office snack/lunch from the supermarket

translation.cs: Ahoj, dělám klasicky 9-5 s přestávkou 30min a mojí jedinou možností, kde sehnat jídlo, je si zajít vedle do Billy nebo kousek dál do Lidlu.
translation.en: Hi, I do the classic 9-5 with a 30min break and my only option for food is to go next door to Billa or a little further down the road to Lidl.
translation.source: Ahoj, dělám klasicky 9-5 s přestávkou 30min a mojí jedinou možností, kde sehnat jídlo, je si zajít vedle do Billy nebo kousek dál do Lidlu.
translation.medium: Hi, I work 9-5 with a 30-minute lunch break and my only option for food is to go across the road to Billy or a bit further to Lidl.
translation.reference: Hi, I do the classic 9-5 with a 30min break and my only option for food is to go next door to Billa or a little further down the road to Lidl.

translation.cs: Vzhledem k tomu, že nemám žádný pohyb, po práci nemám sílu cvičit, tak musím jíst co nejvíc zdravě a dietně.
translation.en: Since I don't have any movement, I don't have the strength to exercise after work, so I have to eat as healthy a diet as possible.
translation.source: Vzhledem k tomu, že nemám žádný pohyb, po práci nemám sílu cvičit, tak musím jíst co nejvíc zdravě a dietně.
translation.medium: Because I have no movement, after work I do not have the strength to exercise, so I have to eat as healthily and dietarily as possible.
translation.reference: Since I don't have any movement, I don't have the strength to exercise after work, so I have to eat as healthy a diet as possible.

translation.cs: Bohužel nikdy nevím co si koupit a v rychlosti koupím maximálně pizza žemle a ke svačině jogurt a jablko.
translation.en: Unfortunately, I never know what to buy and in a hurry I buy at most a pizza roll and a yoghurt and an apple for a snack.
translation.source: Bohužel nikdy nevím co si koupit a v rychlosti koupím maximálně pizza žemle a ke svačině jogurt a jablko.
translation.medium: Unfortunately, I never know what to buy and in a hurry I can only buy pizza dough and for a snack yoghurt and an apple.
translation.reference: Unfortunately, I never know what to buy and in a hurry I buy at most a pizza roll and a yoghurt and an apple for a snack.

translation.cs: Otázka: co zdravého bez nutnosti tepelné úpravy byste mi doporučili v supermarketu koupit?
translation.en: Question: what healthy no-cook foods would you recommend I buy in the supermarket?
translation.source: Otázka: co zdravého bez nutnosti tepelné úpravy byste mi doporučili v supermarketu koupit?
translation.medium: Question: what healthy food that doesn't need to be cooked would you recommend me to buy in the supermarket?
translation.reference: Question: what healthy no-cook foods would you recommend I buy in the supermarket?

translation.cs: Ne každý čeká na metr sněhu jako vy, tak to bohužel je.
translation.en: Not everyone waits for a meter of snow like you do, unfortunately that's just the way it is.
translation.source: Ne každý čeká na metr sněhu jako vy, tak to bohužel je.
translation.medium: Not everyone waits for a metre of snow like you do, unfortunately.
translation.reference: Not everyone waits for a meter of snow like you do, unfortunately that's just the way it is.

translation.cs: A nejde o stromy, které musíte nutně vidět.
translation.en: And it's not about trees that you necessarily have to see.
translation.source: A nejde o stromy, které musíte nutně vidět.
translation.medium: And it's not the trees you have to see.
translation.reference: And it's not about trees that you necessarily have to see.

translation.cs: Pod sněhem se může ukrývat jen špička stromku.
translation.en: Only the tip of the tree can hide under the snow.
translation.source: Pod sněhem se může ukrývat jen špička stromku.
translation.medium: Only the tip of the tree is visible under the snow.
translation.reference: Only the tip of the tree can hide under the snow.

translation.cs: Pokud se poničí, stromek může být náchylnější na houbové onemocnění.
translation.en: If damaged, the tree may be more susceptible to fungal diseases.
translation.source: Pokud se poničí, stromek může být náchylnější na houbové onemocnění.
translation.medium: If damaged, the tree may be more susceptible to fungal diseases.
translation.reference: If damaged, the tree may be more susceptible to fungal diseases.

translation.cs: Netvrdím, že je to jediný důvod proč nám zakazují jezdit mimo sjezdovky, ale je to jeden z nich.
translation.en: I'm not saying that's the only reason we're banned from the slopes, but it's one of them.
translation.source: Netvrdím, že je to jediný důvod proč nám zakazují jezdit mimo sjezdovky, ale je to jeden z nich.
translation.medium: I'm not saying it's the only reason we're not allowed to go off-piste, but it is one of them.
translation.reference: I'm not saying that's the only reason we're banned from the slopes, but it's one of them.

translation.cs: Přiznání Dary o vztahu s Nedvědem: Na tohle jsem se vůbec netěšila
translation.en: Dara's confession about her relationship with Nedved: I wasn't looking forward to this at all
translation.source: Přiznání Dary o vztahu s Nedvědem: Na tohle jsem se vůbec netěšila
translation.medium: Dara's admission about her relationship with Nedved: I wasn't looking forward to this
translation.reference: Dara's confession about her relationship with Nedved: I wasn't looking forward to this at all

translation.cs: Český showbyznysový rybníček od pátku nežije ničím jiným než odhalením vztahu Dary Rolins a Pavla Nedvěda.
translation.en: Since Friday, the Czech showbusiness world has been alive with nothing but the revelation of Dara Rolins and Pavel Nedved's relationship.
translation.source: Český showbyznysový rybníček od pátku nežije ničím jiným než odhalením vztahu Dary Rolins a Pavla Nedvěda.
translation.medium: Since Friday, the Czech showbiz pond has been alive with nothing but revelations about the relationship between Dara Rolins and Pavel Nedvěd.
translation.reference: Since Friday, the Czech showbusiness world has been alive with nothing but the revelation of Dara Rolins and Pavel Nedved's relationship.

translation.cs: Táhnou to spolu už od léta, slavný fotbalista se dokonce kvůli zpěvačce nechal rozvést.
translation.en: They've been dating since the summer, and the famous footballer even got a divorce because of the singer.
translation.source: Táhnou to spolu už od léta, slavný fotbalista se dokonce kvůli zpěvačce nechal rozvést.
translation.medium: They have been together since the summer, and the famous footballer even got divorced because of the singer.
translation.reference: They've been dating since the summer, and the famous footballer even got a divorce because of the singer.

translation.cs: Dara teď fanouškům poslala obsáhlý vzkaz, v němž vysvětluje, proč před nimi lásku dlouhý půlrok tajila.
translation.en: Dara has now sent her fans a lengthy message explaining why she kept her love a secret from them for six months.
translation.source: Dara teď fanouškům poslala obsáhlý vzkaz, v němž vysvětluje, proč před nimi lásku dlouhý půlrok tajila.
translation.medium: Dara has now sent a lengthy message to fans explaining why she kept her love a secret for so long.
translation.reference: Dara has now sent her fans a lengthy message explaining why she kept her love a secret from them for six months.

translation.cs: „Dovoluji si tvrdit, že aktuálně neexistuje v Čechách ani na Slovensku nikdo, komu by uniklo, že Dara ulovila medvěda, teda pardon, Nedvěda,“ vtipkuje Dara Rolins, která je do nejúspěšnějšího českého fotbalisty zamilovaná až po uši.
translation.en: "I dare say that there is currently no one in the Czech Republic or Slovakia who would miss the fact that Dara has caught a bear, sorry, Nedved," jokes Dara Rolins, who is head over heels in love with the most successful Czech footballer.
translation.source: „Dovoluji si tvrdit, že aktuálně neexistuje v Čechách ani na Slovensku nikdo, komu by uniklo, že Dara ulovila medvěda, teda pardon, Nedvěda,“ vtipkuje Dara Rolins, která je do nejúspěšnějšího českého fotbalisty zamilovaná až po uši.
translation.medium: I allow myself to say that there is currently no one in the Czech Republic or Slovakia who does not know that Dara has caught a bear, that is, pardon, Nedvěd, Dara Rolins jokes, who is madly in love with the most successful Czech football player.
translation.reference: "I dare say that there is currently no one in the Czech Republic or Slovakia who would miss the fact that Dara has caught a bear, sorry, Nedved," jokes Dara Rolins, who is head over heels in love with the most successful Czech footballer.

translation.cs: Prý ale sbalil on ji, ne naopak.
translation.en: Apparently, he picked her up, not the other way around.
translation.source: Prý ale sbalil on ji, ne naopak.
translation.medium: However, he claims that he was the one who dumped her, not the other way around.
translation.reference: Apparently, he picked her up, not the other way around.

translation.cs: Tři dny jsou středem pozornosti, a přestože jsou na zájem veřejnosti zvyklí, radost z toho nemají.
translation.en: For three days they have been the center of attention, and although they are used to public interest, they are not happy about it.
translation.source: Tři dny jsou středem pozornosti, a přestože jsou na zájem veřejnosti zvyklí, radost z toho nemají.
translation.medium: Three days are in the spotlight, and while they're used to public interest, they don't enjoy it.
translation.reference: For three days they have been the center of attention, and although they are used to public interest, they are not happy about it.

translation.cs: A je to tady.
translation.en: Here we go.
translation.source: A je to tady.
translation.medium: And here it is.
translation.reference: Here we go.

translation.cs: To, na co jsme se oba netěšili, ale věděli jsme, že k tomu jednou dojde, pokračuje zpěvačka.
translation.en: It’s something neither of us was looking forward to, but we knew it would happen one day, the singer continued.
translation.source: To, na co jsme se oba netěšili, ale věděli jsme, že k tomu jednou dojde, pokračuje zpěvačka.
translation.medium: The thing we were both dreading, but knew was inevitable, continues the singer.
translation.reference: It’s something neither of us was looking forward to, but we knew it would happen one day, the singer continued.

translation.cs: Jenom nevím, kdo je na tom hůř.
translation.en: I just don't know who's worse off.
translation.source: Jenom nevím, kdo je na tom hůř.
translation.medium: I don't know who is worse off.
translation.reference: I just don't know who's worse off.

translation.cs: Jestli ti, které to vůbec nezajímá a vyskakuje to na nich i z konzervy, anebo my, jejichž životy dopodrobna rozpitvávají.
translation.en: Whether those who don't care at all and it’s everywhere around them, or us, whose lives they dissect in detail.
translation.source: Jestli ti, které to vůbec nezajímá a vyskakuje to na nich i z konzervy, anebo my, jejichž životy dopodrobna rozpitvávají.
translation.medium: Whether it's the ones who don't care at all and it pops up on them even from a can, or us, whose lives are dissected in detail.
translation.reference: Whether those who don't care at all and it’s everywhere around them, or us, whose lives they dissect in detail.

translation.cs: Jako kdyby chtěl někdo z vás slyšet názor na to, jestli se k sobě s manželem nebo přítelkyní dost hodíte, anebo jste trvali na tom, aby ale opravdu všichni dopodrobna znali seznam vašich bývalých partnerů a byli obeznámení s výčtem vašich omylů a chyb.
translation.en: It's as if one of you wanted an opinion as to whether you and your husband or girlfriend are a good match, or if you insisted that everyone really know the list of your former partners in detail and be familiar with the list of your mistakes and errors.
translation.source: Jako kdyby chtěl někdo z vás slyšet názor na to, jestli se k sobě s manželem nebo přítelkyní dost hodíte, anebo jste trvali na tom, aby ale opravdu všichni dopodrobna znali seznam vašich bývalých partnerů a byli obeznámení s výčtem vašich omylů a chyb.
translation.medium: As if one of you wanted to hear the other's opinion on whether or not you're compatible with your husband or wife, or if you insisted on everyone knowing in detail the list of your ex-partners and being aware of the list of your mistakes and failures.
translation.reference: It's as if one of you wanted an opinion as to whether you and your husband or girlfriend are a good match, or if you insisted that everyone really know the list of your former partners in detail and be familiar with the list of your mistakes and errors.

translation.cs: To je přece žúžo, to chceš, vadí Daře.
translation.en: Isn’t it dope? That’s what you want, it bothers Dara.
translation.source: To je přece žúžo, to chceš, vadí Daře.
translation.medium: That's what you want, Dara.
translation.reference: Isn’t it dope? That’s what you want, it bothers Dara.

translation.cs: Dvojice se dala dohromady v Itálii, kam Rolins jezdila kvůli přípravám své nové módní kolekce.
translation.en: The couple got together in Italy, where Rolins went to prepare her new fashion collection.
translation.source: Dvojice se dala dohromady v Itálii, kam Rolins jezdila kvůli přípravám své nové módní kolekce.
translation.medium: The couple met in Italy, where Rolins was preparing her new fashion collection.
translation.reference: The couple got together in Italy, where Rolins went to prepare her new fashion collection.

translation.cs: Nedvěd tam zase dlouhodobě působí jako viceprezident fotbalového klubu Juventus.
translation.en: Nedved has been there for a long time as vice-president of Juventus Football Club.
translation.source: Nedvěd tam zase dlouhodobě působí jako viceprezident fotbalového klubu Juventus.
translation.medium: Nedvěd has been the vice-president of the football club Juventus for a long time.
translation.reference: Nedved has been there for a long time as vice-president of Juventus Football Club.

translation.cs: S pravdou ven šli až teď, protože čekali na završení Nedvědova rozvodu.
translation.en: They only came out with the truth now, because they were waiting for Nedved's divorce to be finalized.
translation.source: S pravdou ven šli až teď, protože čekali na završení Nedvědova rozvodu.
translation.medium: They only came clean now, because they were waiting for the completion of Nedvěd's divorce.
translation.reference: They only came out with the truth now, because they were waiting for Nedved's divorce to be finalized.

translation.cs: S manželkou Ivanou byli už tři roky odloučení, papírově nejsou svoji ale teprve tři týdny.
translation.en: He and his wife Ivana have been separated for three years, but on paper, it’s only been three weeks.
translation.source: S manželkou Ivanou byli už tři roky odloučení, papírově nejsou svoji ale teprve tři týdny.
translation.medium: He has been separated from his wife Ivana for three years, but they have only been legally divorced for three weeks.
translation.reference: He and his wife Ivana have been separated for three years, but on paper, it’s only been three weeks.

translation.cs: Každopádně těm, kteří se radují s námi a přejí nám to, děkujeme.
translation.en: Anyway, thank you to those who rejoice with us and wish us well.
translation.source: Každopádně těm, kteří se radují s námi a přejí nám to, děkujeme.
translation.medium: Anyway, we thank those who rejoice with us and wish us well.
translation.reference: Anyway, thank you to those who rejoice with us and wish us well.

translation.cs: I my jsme jenom lidi, máme rodiny, děti, minulost i sny.
translation.en: And we’re only human; we have families, children, pasts and dreams.
translation.source: I my jsme jenom lidi, máme rodiny, děti, minulost i sny.
translation.medium: We are just people, we have families, children, past and dreams.
translation.reference: And we’re only human; we have families, children, pasts and dreams.

translation.cs: Nejsme dokonalí, ale myslím, že máme oba srdce na pravém místě.
translation.en: We're not perfect, but I think we both have our hearts in the right place.
translation.source: Nejsme dokonalí, ale myslím, že máme oba srdce na pravém místě.
translation.medium: We're not perfect, but I think we both have our hearts in the right place.
translation.reference: We're not perfect, but I think we both have our hearts in the right place.

translation.cs: I proto svého nového muže miluji a stejně jako on při mě, stojím i já při něm. V dobrém i ve zlém, uzavřela Rolins.
translation.en: That is why I love my new man, and just as he stands by me, I stand by him. For better or worse, Rolins concluded.
translation.source: I proto svého nového muže miluji a stejně jako on při mě, stojím i já při něm. V dobrém i ve zlém, uzavřela Rolins.
translation.medium: This is why I love my new man and I stand by him, both in good times and bad, concluded Rolins.
translation.reference: That is why I love my new man, and just as he stands by me, I stand by him. For better or worse, Rolins concluded.

translation.cs: Ahoj, ostatní komentující už asi všechno podstatné řekli, jen potvrzuju, že koleje jsou super do začátku, moji spolužáci se většinou v průběhu prvního semestru nebo dvou seznámili a skamarádili a našli si pak podnájmy spolu, což mi přijde jako nejlepší varianta, protože víš, s kým budeš bydlet.
translation.en: Hi, the other commenters have probably already said all the essentials, I'm just confirming that dorms are great to start with, my classmates usually met and made friends in the first semester or two and then found sublets together, which seems like the best option because you know who you'll be living with.
translation.source: Ahoj, ostatní komentující už asi všechno podstatné řekli, jen potvrzuju, že koleje jsou super do začátku, moji spolužáci se většinou v průběhu prvního semestru nebo dvou seznámili a skamarádili a našli si pak podnájmy spolu, což mi přijde jako nejlepší varianta, protože víš, s kým budeš bydlet.
translation.medium: Hi, other commenters have probably already said it, but I just want to confirm that the halls are great to start with, my fellow students usually get to know each other and become friends during the first semester or two, and then they find accommodation together, which I think is the best option, because you know who you will be living with.
translation.reference: Hi, the other commenters have probably already said all the essentials, I'm just confirming that dorms are great to start with, my classmates usually met and made friends in the first semester or two and then found sublets together, which seems like the best option because you know who you'll be living with.

translation.cs: Byty se většinou neinzerují moc dlouho dopředu, takže teď toho asi moc nenajdeš, ale podívat se na nabídku určitě neuškodí.
translation.en: Apartments are usually not advertised very far in advance, so you probably won't find much now, but it certainly doesn't hurt to take a look at what’s on offer.

translation.cs: Jinak určitě se vyhni nejen Cejlu, ale i okolí (ulice jako Vranovská, Francouzská apod., to je dost špatná adresa), i některé části Židenic jsou trochu ghetto.
translation.en: Otherwise, definitely avoid Cejl and the surrounding area as well (streets like Vranovská, Francouzská, etc., that's a pretty bad area), even some parts of Židenice are a bit of a ghetto.

translation.en: On the other hand, the Veveří district is very student-oriented, it’s OK in Královo pole and in that direction, besides it's close to most of the BUT faculties (I don't know where you're going exactly).

translation.cs: Kvůli tomu, co se rozhodlo udělat několik lékařů kdesi v Polsku, je vlastně úplně v pořádku, že stát dostatečně nefinancuje některé školy.
translation.en: Because of what a few doctors somewhere in Poland have decided to do, it is actually quite right that the state does not fund some schools sufficiently.
translation.source: Kvůli tomu, co se rozhodlo udělat několik lékařů kdesi v Polsku, je vlastně úplně v pořádku, že stát dostatečně nefinancuje některé školy.

translation.cs: Buďto ať si učí co chtějí a platí si to ze svého nebo ať jedou podle státního a zaplatí to stát.
translation.en: Either let them teach what they want and pay for it out of their own pocket, or let them go by the state and have the state pay for it.
translation.source: Buďto ať si učí co chtějí a platí si to ze svého nebo ať jedou podle státního a zaplatí to stát.
translation.medium: Either they learn what they want and pay for it themselves, or they follow the state curriculum and the state pays for it.
translation.reference: Either let them teach what they want and pay for it out of their own pocket, or let them go by the state and have the state pay for it.

translation.cs: Přece nemůžeme nechat soukromého aktéra ovládnout kus školství jen proto, že k plnohodnotnému státnímu příspěvku přihodí pár korun a díky tomu si ve školách bude moct učit co chce.
translation.en: We cannot let a private actor take over a piece of education just because he throws in a few crowns on top of the full state contribution and thanks to that he can teach whatever he wants in schools.
translation.source: Přece nemůžeme nechat soukromého aktéra ovládnout kus školství jen proto, že k plnohodnotnému státnímu příspěvku přihodí pár korun a díky tomu si ve školách bude moct učit co chce.
translation.medium: Surely we cannot allow a private actor to take over a part of the education system just because they add a few crowns to the state contribution and can then teach whatever they want in schools.
translation.reference: We cannot let a private actor take over a piece of education just because he throws in a few crowns on top of the full state contribution and thanks to that he can teach whatever he wants in schools.

translation.cs: Takové tvrzení poněkud ztrácí na váze, když ho napíše člověk, který se dva dny předtím takto vyjadřoval o petiční akci za bojkot totalitního státu:
translation.en: Such a statement loses some weight when it is written by a person who made such a statement about a petition drive to boycott the totalitarian state two days earlier:

translation.en: So, in your opinion, voting against someone getting an abortion is the same as voting against a statue in the town square?

translation.cs: Jinak já už jsem při katalogizaci/digitalizaci zažil, že (a to i dlouholetí profesionálové) to buď nějak hodí od oka, nebo zapíšou něco na způsob xxx *** nebo ... (dle konvence) a do poznámky, že to je nečitelné.
translation.en: Otherwise, I have experienced when cataloguing/digitizing that they (even long-time professionals) either throw it away or write something like xxx *** or ... (according to convention) and note that it is illegible.
translation.source: Jinak já už jsem při katalogizaci/digitalizaci zažil, že (a to i dlouholetí profesionálové) to buď nějak hodí od oka, nebo zapíšou něco na způsob xxx *** nebo ... (dle konvence) a do poznámky, že to je nečitelné.
translation.medium: Otherwise, I have already experienced that (and this also applies to long-term professionals) that they either guess or write something like xxx *** or ... (according to convention) and in the note that it is illegible.

translation.en: All important approved documents are examined word for word, some basic knowledge of English is not enough for that anyway, it is a matter for lawyers.

translation.en: There are hundreds of translators and interpreters working in the various EU institutions, and English is more suited to politicians for informal contacts and establishing above-standard relations.

translation.cs: Jo, bydlí tam asi většina romské populace Brna, ale jediné co dělají je, že překáží na chodníku a parkuji kde nemají :D rozhodně to není, že bych se tam večer bál vylézt na ulici.
translation.en: Yeah, most of Brno's Romani population lives there, but all they do is get in the way on the sidewalk and park where they shouldn't :D I'm definitely not afraid to go out on the street in the evening.
translation.source: Jo, bydlí tam asi většina romské populace Brna, ale jediné co dělají je, že překáží na chodníku a parkuji kde nemají :D rozhodně to není, že bych se tam večer bál vylézt na ulici.

translation.cs: VIDEO: Felix Slováček a Lucie Gelemová: ZASE SPOLU!
translation.en: VIDEO: Felix Slováček and Lucie Gelemová: TOGETHER AGAIN!
translation.source: VIDEO: Felix Slováček a Lucie Gelemová: ZASE SPOLU!
translation.medium: VIDEO: Felix Slováček and Lucie Gelemová: TOGETHER AGAIN!
translation.reference: VIDEO: Felix Slováček and Lucie Gelemová: TOGETHER AGAIN!

translation.cs: Felix Slováček a Lucie Gelemová: ZASE SPOLU!
translation.en: Felix Slováček and Lucie Gelemová: TOGETHER AGAIN!
translation.source: Felix Slováček a Lucie Gelemová: ZASE SPOLU!
translation.medium: Felix Slováček and Lucie Gelemová: TOGETHER AGAIN!
translation.reference: Felix Slováček and Lucie Gelemová: TOGETHER AGAIN!

translation.cs: Ale pořád jsme si něco povídali, takže na Vánoce nedošlo.
translation.en: But we kept talking so Christmas didn't come up.
translation.source: Ale pořád jsme si něco povídali, takže na Vánoce nedošlo.
translation.medium: But we still talked to each other, so there was no Christmas.
translation.reference: But we kept talking so Christmas didn't come up.

translation.cs: Opravdu nevím, kde budu.
translation.en: I really don’t know where I will be.
translation.source: Opravdu nevím, kde budu.
translation.medium: I really don't know where I'll be.
translation.reference: I really don’t know where I will be.

translation.cs: Dárky kupuji průběžně a Dádě i Lucii určitě něco koupím, asi parfém.
translation.en: I buy gifts all the time and I will definitely buy something for Dáda and Lucie, probably perfume.
translation.source: Dárky kupuji průběžně a Dádě i Lucii určitě něco koupím, asi parfém.
translation.medium: I buy presents throughout the year and I will definitely buy something for Dáda and Luci. Perhaps a perfume.
translation.reference: I buy gifts all the time and I will definitely buy something for Dáda and Lucie, probably perfume.

translation.cs: Jsem gentleman, dodal Felix, který sám přišel na křest hudebního videoklipu do klubu Richman.
translation.en: I am a gentleman, added Felix, who came alone to the premiere of the music video at the Richman Club.
translation.source: Jsem gentleman, dodal Felix, který sám přišel na křest hudebního videoklipu do klubu Richman.
translation.medium: I'm a gentleman, added Felix, who himself came to the music video premiere at Richman's club.
translation.reference: I am a gentleman, added Felix, who came alone to the premiere of the music video at the Richman Club.

translation.cs: Jsem tady sám, ale sám se necítím.
translation.en: I'm here alone, but I don't feel alone.
translation.source: Jsem tady sám, ale sám se necítím.
translation.medium: I'm here alone, but I don't feel alone.
translation.reference: I'm here alone, but I don't feel alone.

translation.cs: Vždy si najdu někoho, s kým se rád pobavím, tvrdí Slováček, který byl rád, že potkal manželku Luďka Soboty Adrianu nebo zpěvačku Kamilu Nývltovou.
translation.en: I always find someone I like to have a conversation with, says Slováček, who was happy to meet Luděk Sobota's wife, Adriana, or singer Kamila Nývltová.
translation.source: Vždy si najdu někoho, s kým se rád pobavím, tvrdí Slováček, který byl rád, že potkal manželku Luďka Soboty Adrianu nebo zpěvačku Kamilu Nývltovou.
translation.medium: I always find someone to talk to, says Slováček, who was happy to meet Adrianu, the wife of Ludek Sobota, or the singer Kamila Nývltová.
translation.reference: I always find someone I like to have a conversation with, says Slováček, who was happy to meet Luděk Sobota's wife, Adriana, or singer Kamila Nývltová.

translation.cs: A dával to jasně najevo.
translation.en: And he made it clear.
translation.source: A dával to jasně najevo.
translation.medium: And he made it clear.
translation.reference: And he made it clear.

translation.cs: A my jsme Island, abychom si mohli dovolit nemít vojáky i zbraně?
translation.en: And we’re Iceland, so can we afford not to have soldiers and weapons?
translation.source: A my jsme Island, abychom si mohli dovolit nemít vojáky i zbraně?
translation.medium: And are we Iceland, that we can afford not to have an army and weapons?
translation.reference: And we’re Iceland, so can we afford not to have soldiers and weapons?

translation.cs: Pochybuju, že nás někdo bude bránit za nás a naše lokace je natolik strategická, že by agresor musel být naprostý idiot, aby tohle území neobsadil.
translation.en: I doubt anyone will defend us instead of us, and our location is so strategic that an aggressor would have to be a complete idiot not to occupy this territory.
translation.source: Pochybuju, že nás někdo bude bránit za nás a naše lokace je natolik strategická, že by agresor musel být naprostý idiot, aby tohle území neobsadil.
translation.medium: I doubt that anyone will stand up for us and our location is so strategic that an aggressor would have to be a complete idiot not to occupy this territory.
translation.reference: I doubt anyone will defend us instead of us, and our location is so strategic that an aggressor would have to be a complete idiot not to occupy this territory.

translation.cs: A nechápu, proč by to měl být špatný argument, to mi teda vysvětlete?
translation.en: And I don't see why that would be a bad argument, so can you explain it to me?
translation.source: A nechápu, proč by to měl být špatný argument, to mi teda vysvětlete?
translation.medium: And I don't understand why this should be a bad argument, can you explain that to me?
translation.reference: And I don't see why that would be a bad argument, so can you explain it to me?

translation.cs: Neznám žádnou jinou složku, která by mohla být v krizi nasazena v nemocnicích.
translation.en: I know of no other component that could be deployed in hospitals in a time of crisis.
translation.source: Neznám žádnou jinou složku, která by mohla být v krizi nasazena v nemocnicích.
translation.medium: I do not know of any other component that could be deployed in hospitals during a crisis.
translation.reference: I know of no other component that could be deployed in hospitals in a time of crisis.

translation.cs: Policajtů je málo a nemůžou si to dovolit, tak samo hasiči a nikde jinde tak vysoké procento zdravotně proškolených lidí na takové úrovni není.
translation.en: Police officers are few and can't afford it, neither can firefighters, and nowhere else is there such a high percentage of medically trained people at that level.
translation.source: Policajtů je málo a nemůžou si to dovolit, tak samo hasiči a nikde jinde tak vysoké procento zdravotně proškolených lidí na takové úrovni není.
translation.medium: There are too few police officers and they can't afford it, so the firefighters and nowhere else is there such a high percentage of medically trained people at this level.
translation.reference: Police officers are few and can't afford it, neither can firefighters, and nowhere else is there such a high percentage of medically trained people at that level.

translation.cs: A to, že je naše armáda schopná ubránit tak akorát Ostravu jde na hlavu předchozím vládám, ne armádě, ta prosí o nové hračky už dost dlouho.
translation.en: And the fact that our army is only capable of defending Ostrava goes to the head of previous governments, not the army, which has been begging for new toys for long enough.
translation.source: A to, že je naše armáda schopná ubránit tak akorát Ostravu jde na hlavu předchozím vládám, ne armádě, ta prosí o nové hračky už dost dlouho.
translation.medium: The fact that our army is capable of defending just Ostrava goes against the previous governments, not the army, which has been asking for new toys for a long time.
translation.reference: And the fact that our army is only capable of defending Ostrava goes to the head of previous governments, not the army, which has been begging for new toys for long enough.

translation.cs: Rekordní sucho v ČR.
translation.en: Drought in the Czech Republic hits record level.
translation.source: Rekordní sucho v ČR.
translation.medium: Record drought in the Czech Republic.
translation.reference: Drought in the Czech Republic hits record level.

translation.cs: Je nutné změnit zemědělské dotace, krajina nemá být jen továrna na potraviny, říká novinář.
translation.en: Agricultural subsidies need to be changed and the countryside shouldn’t be just a food factory, says journalist.
translation.source: Je nutné změnit zemědělské dotace, krajina nemá být jen továrna na potraviny, říká novinář.
translation.medium: It is necessary to change agricultural subsidies, the landscape should not be just a food factory, says the journalist.
translation.reference: Agricultural subsidies need to be changed and the countryside shouldn’t be just a food factory, says journalist.

translation.cs: Česko prochází nejhorším obdobím sucha za poslední léta.
translation.en: The Czech Republic has been experiencing its worst drought in years.
translation.source: Česko prochází nejhorším obdobím sucha za poslední léta.
translation.medium: The Czech Republic is going through the worst period of drought in recent years.
translation.reference: The Czech Republic has been experiencing its worst drought in years.

translation.cs: Vody podle vědců ubylo v horských a podhorských oblastech, menší úhrn srážek zaznamenávají i místa, kde dosud nouze o vláhu nebyla.
translation.en: According to scientists, water has become scarcer in mountainous and foothill areas and less precipitation has been recorded in places where there has been no shortage of water.
translation.source: Vody podle vědců ubylo v horských a podhorských oblastech, menší úhrn srážek zaznamenávají i místa, kde dosud nouze o vláhu nebyla.
translation.medium: According to scientists, the water has decreased in mountainous and sub-mountainous areas, and there has also been less rainfall in places where there was no shortage of water.
translation.reference: According to scientists, water has become scarcer in mountainous and foothill areas and less precipitation has been recorded in places where there has been no shortage of water.

translation.cs: Příčinou sucha, které panuje ve velké části střední Evropy, je klimatická změna.
translation.en: Climate change is the cause of the drought that prevails in large parts of Central Europe.
translation.source: Příčinou sucha, které panuje ve velké části střední Evropy, je klimatická změna.
translation.medium: The drought affecting much of central Europe is caused by climate change.
translation.reference: Climate change is the cause of the drought that prevails in large parts of Central Europe.

translation.cs: Dopady ale umocňuje i způsob, jak s půdou hospodaříme.
translation.en: But the impact is also magnified by the way we work the land.
translation.source: Dopady ale umocňuje i způsob, jak s půdou hospodaříme.
translation.medium: However, the effects are exacerbated by the way we manage the soil.
translation.reference: But the impact is also magnified by the way we work the land.

translation.cs: Na co se v souvislosti se suchem připravit?
translation.en: What to be prepared for in connection with the drought?
translation.source: Na co se v souvislosti se suchem připravit?
translation.medium: What to do in case of drought?
translation.reference: What to be prepared for in connection with the drought?

translation.cs: A jak můžeme přírodě v těžkých časech pomoct?
translation.en: And how can we help nature in difficult times?
translation.source: A jak můžeme přírodě v těžkých časech pomoct?
translation.medium: And how can we help nature in difficult times?
translation.reference: And how can we help nature in difficult times?

translation.cs: Jo to bude tak, sotva se udržím v bruslích na ledě, houby vím co je hrát hokej a ta taktika (co jsem si zkusil v Franchise Hockey Manager) je taky celkově haluz.
translation.en: Yeah that's right, I can barely keep my skates on the ice, I don't know what hockey is and the tactics (that I tried in Franchise Hockey Manager) are a total mess too.
translation.source: Jo to bude tak, sotva se udržím v bruslích na ledě, houby vím co je hrát hokej a ta taktika (co jsem si zkusil v Franchise Hockey Manager) je taky celkově haluz.
translation.medium: Yeah, it's going to be like that, I can barely stay on my skates on the ice, I don't know what it's like to play hockey, and the tactics (which I tried in Franchise Hockey Manager) are all over the place.
translation.reference: Yeah that's right, I can barely keep my skates on the ice, I don't know what hockey is and the tactics (that I tried in Franchise Hockey Manager) are a total mess too.

translation.cs: A ať jseš hokejový tým "mědvěd Rusko" nebo "lama Čína" tak prohrávat o dva góly i když nemusíš za každou cenu zápas vyhrát je jiná než když je srovnáno.
translation.en: And whether you are the "Russian bear" hockey team or the "Chinese llamas" losing by two goals even if you don't have to win the game at any cost is different than when it is tied.
translation.source: A ať jseš hokejový tým "mědvěd Rusko" nebo "lama Čína" tak prohrávat o dva góly i když nemusíš za každou cenu zápas vyhrát je jiná než když je srovnáno.
translation.medium: Whether you're the hockey team "Bear Russia" or "Llama China", losing by two goals when you don't have to win the game is different than when it's tied.
translation.reference: And whether you are the "Russian bear" hockey team or the "Chinese llamas" losing by two goals even if you don't have to win the game at any cost is different than when it is tied.

translation.cs: Ale tak jako tak, co poslouchám české komentátory co vypichují, čeho si rozhodčí všímají nevšímají ať už mužského nebo ženského hokeje, je to celý divný, ale to je tak asi se vším sportem, UEFA a "Italští herci" nebo motorsport F1, WRC, atd.
translation.en: But anyway, listening to the Czech commentators, what they point out, what the referees don't notice, whether it's men's or women's hockey, it's all weird, but that's how it is with all sports, UEFA and "Italian actors" or motorsport F1, WRC, etc.
translation.source: Ale tak jako tak, co poslouchám české komentátory co vypichují, čeho si rozhodčí všímají nevšímají ať už mužského nebo ženského hokeje, je to celý divný, ale to je tak asi se vším sportem, UEFA a "Italští herci" nebo motorsport F1, WRC, atd.
translation.medium: But anyway, what I hear from the Czech commentators who point out what the referees notice and don't notice, whether it's men's or women's hockey, it's all weird, but that's probably the case with all sports, UEFA and "Italian actors" or motorsport F1, WRC, etc.
translation.reference: But anyway, listening to the Czech commentators, what they point out, what the referees don't notice, whether it's men's or women's hockey, it's all weird, but that's how it is with all sports, UEFA and "Italian actors" or motorsport F1, WRC, etc.

translation.cs: kontroverze je všude.
translation.en: controversy is everywhere.
translation.source: kontroverze je všude.
translation.medium: controversy is everywhere.
translation.reference: controversy is everywhere.

translation.cs: A imho kdyby to bylo opačně tak je to jako vždy jindy, a že už Česko s Ruskem častěji prohrálo, než vyhrálo, asi by to bylo klasický "voni prohráli" vs "MY jsme vyhráli".
translation.en: And I think if it was the other way around it's like it always is, and the Czech Republic has lost to Russia more often than it has won, I guess it would be the classic "they lost" vs "WE won".
translation.source: A imho kdyby to bylo opačně tak je to jako vždy jindy, a že už Česko s Ruskem častěji prohrálo, než vyhrálo, asi by to bylo klasický "voni prohráli" vs "MY jsme vyhráli".
translation.medium: And in my opinion, if it had been the other way round, it would have been the same as always, and that the Czech Republic has lost against Russia more often than it has won, it would have been the classic "they lost" vs "WE won".
translation.reference: And I think if it was the other way around it's like it always is, and the Czech Republic has lost to Russia more often than it has won, I guess it would be the classic "they lost" vs "WE won".

translation.cs: Koronavirus: Počet nákaz v Rusku překročil 10 milionů
translation.en: Coronavirus: The number of infections in Russia has exceeded 10 million
translation.source: Koronavirus: Počet nákaz v Rusku překročil 10 milionů
translation.medium: Coronavirus: Number of infections in Russia exceeds 10 million
translation.reference: Coronavirus: The number of infections in Russia has exceeded 10 million

translation.cs: V sobotu 11. prosince zaznamenala Česká republika 9080 denních nákaz.
translation.en: On Saturday 11 December, the Czech Republic recorded the number of daily infections at 9,080.
translation.source: V sobotu 11. prosince zaznamenala Česká republika 9080 denních nákaz.
translation.medium: On Saturday, December 11, the Czech Republic recorded 9,080 daily infections.
translation.reference: On Saturday 11 December, the Czech Republic recorded the number of daily infections at 9,080.

translation.cs: Hospitalizováno je 5766 osob.
translation.en: 5,766 people are hospitalized.
translation.source: Hospitalizováno je 5766 osob.
translation.medium: 5,766 people are hospitalised.
translation.reference: 5,766 people are hospitalized.

translation.cs: Celkem zemřelo v ČR 34 451 lidí, dalších 74.
translation.en: A total of 34,451 people have died in the Czech Republic, another 74.
translation.source: Celkem zemřelo v ČR 34 451 lidí, dalších 74.
translation.medium: In total, 34,451 people died in the Czech Republic, and another 74.
translation.reference: A total of 34,451 people have died in the Czech Republic, another 74.

translation.cs: Potvrzených případů za posledních 14 dní je v ČR 1967 na 100 000, 871 na 100 000 za poslední týden.
translation.en: There were 1,967 confirmed cases per 100,000 in the Czech Republic in the last 14 days, 871 per 100,000 in the last week.
translation.source: Potvrzených případů za posledních 14 dní je v ČR 1967 na 100 000, 871 na 100 000 za poslední týden.
translation.medium: In the Czech Republic, the number of confirmed cases in the last 14 days is 1,967 per 100,000, and 871 per 100,000 in the last week.
translation.reference: There were 1,967 confirmed cases per 100,000 in the Czech Republic in the last 14 days, 871 per 100,000 in the last week.

translation.cs: Počet nákaz v Rusku v neděli překročil 10 milionů.
translation.en: The number of infections in Russia has exceeded 10 million on Sunday.
translation.source: Počet nákaz v Rusku v neděli překročil 10 milionů.
translation.medium: The number of infections in Russia exceeded 10 million on Sunday.
translation.reference: The number of infections in Russia has exceeded 10 million on Sunday.

translation.cs: Za posledních 24 hodin bylo registrováno 29 929 nových nákaz.
translation.en: In the last 24 hours, 29,929 new infections have been registered.
translation.source: Za posledních 24 hodin bylo registrováno 29 929 nových nákaz.
translation.medium: In the last 24 hours, 29,929 new infections were registered.
translation.reference: In the last 24 hours, 29,929 new infections have been registered.

translation.cs: Je to nejnižší denní počet od 13. října.
translation.en: It is the lowest daily count since October 13.
translation.source: Je to nejnižší denní počet od 13. října.
translation.medium: It is the lowest daily figure since October 13.
translation.reference: It is the lowest daily count since October 13.

translation.cs: Celkový počet registrovaných nákaz v Rusku je 10 016 896.
translation.en: The total number of registered infections in Russia is 10,016,896.
translation.source: Celkový počet registrovaných nákaz v Rusku je 10 016 896.
translation.medium: The total number of registered cases in Russia is 10,016,896.
translation.reference: The total number of registered infections in Russia is 10,016,896.

translation.cs: Počet denních úmrtí je 1132, je to nejnižší denní počet mrtvých od konce října.
translation.en: The death toll is 1,132 daily, which is the lowest death toll per day since the end of October.
translation.source: Počet denních úmrtí je 1132, je to nejnižší denní počet mrtvých od konce října.
translation.medium: The daily death toll is 1,132, the lowest since the end of October.
translation.reference: The death toll is 1,132 daily, which is the lowest death toll per day since the end of October.

translation.cs: Británie čelí "nevyhnutelné" velké vlně nákaz, způsobené Omikronem, řekla v neděli v televizi dr. Susan Hopkinsová, hlavní lékařská poradkuyně pro Britský úřad zdravotní bezpečnosti.
translation.en: Britain is facing an "inevitable" major wave of infections caused by Omicron, Dr Susan Hopkins, Chief Medical Advisor for the UK Health Security Agency, said on television on Sunday.
translation.source: Británie čelí "nevyhnutelné" velké vlně nákaz, způsobené Omikronem, řekla v neděli v televizi dr. Susan Hopkinsová, hlavní lékařská poradkuyně pro Britský úřad zdravotní bezpečnosti.
translation.medium: The UK is facing an "inevitable" wave of infections caused by the Omicron variant, Dr Susan Hopkins, chief medical adviser to the UK Health Security Agency, said on Sunday.
translation.reference: Britain is facing an "inevitable" major wave of infections caused by Omicron, Dr Susan Hopkins, Chief Medical Advisor for the UK Health Security Agency, said on television on Sunday.

translation.cs: Bude zapotřebí nových karanténních opatření.
translation.en: New quarantine measures will be required.
translation.source: Bude zapotřebí nových karanténních opatření.
translation.medium: New quarantine measures will be needed.
translation.reference: New quarantine measures will be required.

translation.cs: Osoby nakažené omikronem jsou už v Británii hospitalizovány a Hopkinsová očekává, že jejich počet poroste.
translation.en: People infected with Omicron have already been hospitalised in Britain and Hopkins expects the number to rise.
translation.source: Osoby nakažené omikronem jsou už v Británii hospitalizovány a Hopkinsová očekává, že jejich počet poroste.
translation.medium: Omicron-infected people are already being hospitalised in Britain and Hopkins expects the number to rise.
translation.reference: People infected with Omicron have already been hospitalised in Britain and Hopkins expects the number to rise.

translation.cs: Zatím na omikron nikdo nezemřel, avšak k hospitalizacím dochází asi čtrnáct dní po nákaze a k úmrtím asi tři týdny po nákaze.
translation.en: So far, no one has died from Omicron, but hospitalisations occur about fourteen days after infection and deaths about three weeks after infection.
translation.source: Zatím na omikron nikdo nezemřel, avšak k hospitalizacím dochází asi čtrnáct dní po nákaze a k úmrtím asi tři týdny po nákaze.
translation.medium: So far, no one has died from omicron, but hospitalizations occur about 14 days after infection and deaths occur about three weeks after infection.
translation.reference: So far, no one has died from Omicron, but hospitalisations occur about fourteen days after infection and deaths about three weeks after infection.

translation.cs: Šéf britských labouristů Keir Starmer konstatoval v neděli, že Boris Johnson zřejmě porušil zákon tím, že loni v prosinci, kdy byl zaveden lockdown a byly zakázány vánoční večírky, uspořádal v Downing Street vánoční kvíz.
translation.en: British Labour chief Keir Starmer said on Sunday that Boris Johnson appeared to have broken the law by holding a Christmas quiz in Downing Street last December in the time when lockdown was imposed and Christmas parties were banned.
translation.source: Šéf britských labouristů Keir Starmer konstatoval v neděli, že Boris Johnson zřejmě porušil zákon tím, že loni v prosinci, kdy byl zaveden lockdown a byly zakázány vánoční večírky, uspořádal v Downing Street vánoční kvíz.
translation.medium: British Labour leader Keir Starmer said on Sunday that Boris Johnson probably broke the law by holding a Christmas quiz in Downing Street last December, when a lockdown was imposed and Christmas parties were banned.
translation.reference: British Labour chief Keir Starmer said on Sunday that Boris Johnson appeared to have broken the law by holding a Christmas quiz in Downing Street last December in the time when lockdown was imposed and Christmas parties were banned.

translation.cs: Jeden ministr Johnsonovy vlády hájil, že kvíz se uskutečnil „virtuálně“, přes počítač.
translation.en: A minister in Johnson's government defended that the quiz was carried out "virtually", via computer.
translation.source: Jeden ministr Johnsonovy vlády hájil, že kvíz se uskutečnil „virtuálně“, přes počítač.
translation.medium: One of Mr Johnson's ministers defended the quiz as having taken place "virtually" on a computer.
translation.reference: A minister in Johnson's government defended that the quiz was carried out "virtually", via computer.

translation.cs: Ovšem účastnily se ho v Downing Street skupiny zaměstnanců, shromážděných kolem počítačů.
translation.en: Groups of staff attended, however, by gathering around Downing Street computers.
translation.source: Ovšem účastnily se ho v Downing Street skupiny zaměstnanců, shromážděných kolem počítačů.
translation.medium: But it was attended by groups of staff gathered around computers in Downing Street.
translation.reference: Groups of staff attended, however, by gathering around Downing Street computers.

translation.cs: V Británii sílí tlak na odstranění Johnsona z premiérské funkce.
translation.en: Pressure has been growing in Britain to remove Johnson from the premiership.
translation.source: V Británii sílí tlak na odstranění Johnsona z premiérské funkce.
translation.medium: In Britain, pressure is mounting on Johnson to step down as prime minister.
translation.reference: Pressure has been growing in Britain to remove Johnson from the premiership.

translation.cs: Během loňského prosince, kdy byl zaveden v Londýně přísný lockdown a byly zakázány vánoční večírky, uspořádali Johnsonovi ministři navzdory lockdownu četné mejdany.
translation.en: In December last year, when strict lockdown was brought into effect in London and Christmas parties were banned, Johnson's ministers threw several parties contrary to the rules.
translation.source: Během loňského prosince, kdy byl zaveden v Londýně přísný lockdown a byly zakázány vánoční večírky, uspořádali Johnsonovi ministři navzdory lockdownu četné mejdany.
translation.medium: During last December, when a strict lockdown was imposed in London and Christmas parties were banned, Johnson's ministers held numerous raves despite the lockdown.
translation.reference: In December last year, when strict lockdown was brought into effect in London and Christmas parties were banned, Johnson's ministers threw several parties contrary to the rules.

translation.cs: Britská veřejnost i média zuří, že si z nich Johnson a jeho vláda dělaly legraci:
translation.en: The British public and media are furious that Johnson and his government made fun of them:
translation.source: Britská veřejnost i média zuří, že si z nich Johnson a jeho vláda dělaly legraci:
translation.medium: The British public and media are furious that Johnson and his government have made a joke of them:
translation.reference: The British public and media are furious that Johnson and his government made fun of them:

translation.cs: Paul Brand, editor komerční televize ITV pro Británii: Dnes před dvěma lety zvítězil Boris Johnson drtivou většinou ve všeobecných volbách.
translation.en: Paul Brand, ITV's UK commercial editor: On this day, in the general election two years ago, Boris Johnson won by a landslide.
translation.source: Paul Brand, editor komerční televize ITV pro Británii: Dnes před dvěma lety zvítězil Boris Johnson drtivou většinou ve všeobecných volbách.
translation.medium: Paul Brand, editor of commercial broadcaster ITV for Britain: Two years ago today, Boris Johnson won a landslide majority in a general election.
translation.reference: Paul Brand, ITV's UK commercial editor: On this day, in the general election two years ago, Boris Johnson won by a landslide.

translation.cs: Dnes ráno hovoří Konzervativní strana o tom, že je třeba ho odstranit z funkce premiéra.
translation.en: This morning, the Conservative Party has been talking about the need to remove him as Prime Minister.
translation.source: Dnes ráno hovoří Konzervativní strana o tom, že je třeba ho odstranit z funkce premiéra.
translation.medium: This morning the Conservatives are talking about removing him from the post of Prime Minister.
translation.reference: This morning, the Conservative Party has been talking about the need to remove him as Prime Minister.

translation.cs: Pozoruhodné, jak rychle se události vyvinuly.
translation.en: It is remarkable how quickly events have unfolded.
translation.source: Pozoruhodné, jak rychle se události vyvinuly.
translation.medium: Remarkable how quickly events have developed.
translation.reference: It is remarkable how quickly events have unfolded.

translation.cs: Chcete otočit a zachránit si kůži?
translation.en: You want to turn around and save your skin?
translation.source: Chcete otočit a zachránit si kůži?
translation.medium: Want to turn it around and save your skin?
translation.reference: You want to turn around and save your skin?

translation.cs: Maďarsko čekají na jaře volby, které mohou ukončit dvanáctiletou vládu Viktora Orbána.
translation.en: Hungary faces elections in the spring that could end Viktor Orbán's 12-year rule.
translation.source: Maďarsko čekají na jaře volby, které mohou ukončit dvanáctiletou vládu Viktora Orbána.
translation.medium: Hungary is gearing up for spring elections that could end Viktor Orban's 12-year rule.
translation.reference: Hungary faces elections in the spring that could end Viktor Orbán's 12-year rule.

translation.cs: Budou to volby celoevropského významu.
translation.en: This will be an election of pan-European significance.
translation.source: Budou to volby celoevropského významu.
translation.medium: These will be elections of European significance.
translation.reference: This will be an election of pan-European significance.

translation.cs: Jak moc se dá čekat, že budou férové?
translation.en: How fair can they be expected to be?
translation.source: Jak moc se dá čekat, že budou férové?
translation.medium: How much can you expect them to be fair?
translation.reference: How fair can they be expected to be?

translation.cs: Nebudou férové.
translation.en: They won't be fair.
translation.source: Nebudou férové.
translation.medium: They won't be fair.
translation.reference: They won't be fair.

translation.cs: Nebudou nejspíš ani svobodné, protože takové nebyly ani poslední dvoje volby pod Orbánem.
translation.en: They will probably not even be free, because the last two elections under Orbán were not either.
translation.source: Nebudou nejspíš ani svobodné, protože takové nebyly ani poslední dvoje volby pod Orbánem.
translation.medium: They will probably not be free either, as they were not in the last two elections under Orbán.
translation.reference: They will probably not even be free, because the last two elections under Orbán were not either.

translation.cs: Jeho strana Fidesz kontroluje média, mění hranice volebních okrsků, aby z toho profitoval, a dělá další menší či větší triky.
translation.en: His Fidesz party is controlling the media, changing the boundaries of constituencies in order to profit from this, and doing other tricks, bigger and smaller.
translation.source: Jeho strana Fidesz kontroluje média, mění hranice volebních okrsků, aby z toho profitoval, a dělá další menší či větší triky.
translation.medium: His party Fidesz controls the media, changes the boundaries of electoral districts to benefit itself, and does other smaller or larger tricks.
translation.reference: His Fidesz party is controlling the media, changing the boundaries of constituencies in order to profit from this, and doing other tricks, bigger and smaller.

translation.cs: Ten zatím poslední zní tak, že každý může v praxi volit, kde chce.
translation.en: The latest one so far is that anyone can vote wherever they want.
translation.source: Ten zatím poslední zní tak, že každý může v praxi volit, kde chce.
translation.medium: The last one states that everyone can choose where they want to live in practice.
translation.reference: The latest one so far is that anyone can vote wherever they want.

translation.cs: To umožní Fideszu svážet voliče z rozhodnutých okrsků do těch, kde je výsledek nejistý a opozice by mohla uspět.
translation.en: This will allow Fidesz to bring voters from decided constituencies to those where the outcome is uncertain and the opposition could be successful.
translation.source: To umožní Fideszu svážet voliče z rozhodnutých okrsků do těch, kde je výsledek nejistý a opozice by mohla uspět.
translation.medium: This will allow Fidesz to bus voters from decided districts to those where the outcome is uncertain and where the opposition could succeed.
translation.reference: This will allow Fidesz to bring voters from decided constituencies to those where the outcome is uncertain and the opposition could be successful.

translation.cs: Takže jen opakuji, že fér nebudou vůbec.
translation.en: So just to reiterate, they won't be fair at all.
translation.source: Takže jen opakuji, že fér nebudou vůbec.
translation.medium: So I'm just repeating that they won't be fair at all.
translation.reference: So just to reiterate, they won't be fair at all.

translation.cs: Myslíte, že to bude stejně nefér jako v letech 2014 a 2018?
translation.en: Do you think it will be as unfair as it was in 2014 and 2018?
translation.source: Myslíte, že to bude stejně nefér jako v letech 2014 a 2018?
translation.medium: Do you think it will be as unfair as in 2014 and 2018?
translation.reference: Do you think it will be as unfair as it was in 2014 and 2018?

translation.cs: Vždyť situace je výrazně jiná.
translation.en: After all, the situation is significantly different.
translation.source: Vždyť situace je výrazně jiná.
translation.medium: The situation is completely different.
translation.reference: After all, the situation is significantly different.

translation.cs: Dřív šlo o to, ne jestli Fidesz vyhraje, ale jak hodně a jestli bude mít i ústavní většinu.
translation.en: The question used to be not whether Fidesz would win, but how much and whether it would have a constitutional majority.
translation.source: Dřív šlo o to, ne jestli Fidesz vyhraje, ale jak hodně a jestli bude mít i ústavní většinu.
translation.medium: In the past, the question was not whether Fidesz would win, but by how much and whether it would have a constitutional majority.
translation.reference: The question used to be not whether Fidesz would win, but how much and whether it would have a constitutional majority.

translation.cs: Nyní existuje reálná šance, že víc hlasů a mandátů získá sjednocená opozice.
translation.en: Now, there is a real chance that a united opposition will win more votes and seats.
translation.source: Nyní existuje reálná šance, že víc hlasů a mandátů získá sjednocená opozice.
translation.medium: Now there is a real chance that more votes and mandates will go to the united opposition.
translation.reference: Now, there is a real chance that a united opposition will win more votes and seats.

translation.cs: To je pro Viktora Orbána a jeho stranu velký nezvyk.
translation.en: This is very unusual of Viktor Orbán and his party.
translation.source: To je pro Viktora Orbána a jeho stranu velký nezvyk.
translation.medium: This is a big change for Viktor Orbán and his party.
translation.reference: This is very unusual of Viktor Orbán and his party.

translation.cs: Nebudou ve snaze udržet moc hrát ještě tvrději?
translation.en: Won't they play even harder in an effort to retain power?
translation.source: Nebudou ve snaze udržet moc hrát ještě tvrději?
translation.medium: Will they play even harder to keep their power?
translation.reference: Won't they play even harder in an effort to retain power?

translation.cs: Ano, máme nějaké náznaky, že jsou připraveni jít za rámec toho, co dělali doposud.
translation.en: Yes, we have some indication that they are prepared to go beyond what they have done before.
translation.source: Ano, máme nějaké náznaky, že jsou připraveni jít za rámec toho, co dělali doposud.
translation.medium: Yes, we have some hints that they're willing to go beyond what they've done so far.
translation.reference: Yes, we have some indication that they are prepared to go beyond what they have done before.

translation.cs: Nedávno unikla do nezávislých médií nahrávka předsedy parlamentu a jednoho z vůdců Fideszu Lászlóa Kövéra, kde šéfům tajných služeb vykládá, že opozice je ohrožením pro národní bezpečnost.
translation.en: Recently, a recording of László Kövér, speaker of National Assembly and one of the leaders of Fidesz, was leaked to the independent media, where he tells the heads of the secret service that the opposition is a threat to national security.
translation.source: Nedávno unikla do nezávislých médií nahrávka předsedy parlamentu a jednoho z vůdců Fideszu Lászlóa Kövéra, kde šéfům tajných služeb vykládá, že opozice je ohrožením pro národní bezpečnost.
translation.medium: Recently, a recording leaked to the independent media of the Speaker of the Parliament and one of the leaders of Fidesz, László Kövér, where he tells the heads of the secret services that the opposition is a threat to national security.
translation.reference: Recently, a recording of László Kövér, speaker of National Assembly and one of the leaders of Fidesz, was leaked to the independent media, where he tells the heads of the secret service that the opposition is a threat to national security.

translation.cs: To jsou ty náznaky nového přístupu, o kterých hovoříte?
translation.en: Are these the signs of the new approach you are talking about?
translation.source: To jsou ty náznaky nového přístupu, o kterých hovoříte?
translation.medium: Those are the hints of a new approach you're talking about?
translation.reference: Are these the signs of the new approach you are talking about?

translation.cs: Ano, to je jedna z těch novinek.
translation.en: Yes, that's one of the new things.
translation.source: Ano, to je jedna z těch novinek.
translation.medium: Yes, that is one of the novelties.
translation.reference: Yes, that's one of the new things.

translation.cs: Všechno začíná u jazyka.
translation.en: Everything starts with the language.
translation.source: Všechno začíná u jazyka.
translation.medium: It all starts with language.
translation.reference: Everything starts with the language.

translation.cs: Byla jsem bitá docela často, naposled ve 14, rodiče mamka nemá moc trpělivost, já taky ne, taťka jí má dlouho, ale pak bouchne extrémně (jenom v souvislosti se mnou).
translation.en: I was hit quite often, last time when I was 14, my parents - my mum doesn’t have much patience, neither do I, my dad holds out for a long time but then he hits extremely hard (only in relation to me).
translation.source: Byla jsem bitá docela často, naposled ve 14, rodiče mamka nemá moc trpělivost, já taky ne, taťka jí má dlouho, ale pak bouchne extrémně (jenom v souvislosti se mnou).
translation.medium: I was beaten quite often, the last time when I was 14, my mum doesn't have a lot of patience, neither do I, my dad has for a long time, but then he explodes (only in connection with me).
translation.reference: I was hit quite often, last time when I was 14, my parents - my mum doesn’t have much patience, neither do I, my dad holds out for a long time but then he hits extremely hard (only in relation to me).

translation.cs: Zároveň jsem hodně cholerická a vztekala jsem se jako malá strašně, do tý míry, že jsem ležela na zemi v křeči a byla celá modrá, to mi asi 2x vzali pod sprchu, abych se zklidnila.
translation.en: At the same time, I am very choleric and I was very angry as a child, to the point that I was lying on the floor in convulsions and I was all blue, I was taken to the shower maybe two times to calm down.
translation.source: Zároveň jsem hodně cholerická a vztekala jsem se jako malá strašně, do tý míry, že jsem ležela na zemi v křeči a byla celá modrá, to mi asi 2x vzali pod sprchu, abych se zklidnila.
translation.medium: At the same time, I am very choleric and I used to get very angry, to the extent that I would lie on the floor in convulsions and turn blue, and they had to take me under the shower twice to calm me down.
translation.reference: At the same time, I am very choleric and I was very angry as a child, to the point that I was lying on the floor in convulsions and I was all blue, I was taken to the shower maybe two times to calm down.

translation.cs: Občas mi pleskli výchovně, někdy to bylo spíš, že už nevěděli.
translation.en: Sometimes they slapped me just because, sometimes it was more like they didn't know any better anymore.
translation.source: Občas mi pleskli výchovně, někdy to bylo spíš, že už nevěděli.
translation.medium: Sometimes they scolded me, sometimes it was more that they didn't know what to do.
translation.reference: Sometimes they slapped me just because, sometimes it was more like they didn't know any better anymore.

translation.cs: Rozhodně mam teď taky tendence řešit věci násilím, jako malá jsem se docela prala, teď si pro vybití aspoň do něčeho praštim a jako mladší jsem třeba rodiče tak plácla přes ruku třeba (abych nedostala moc přes držku), takže nikdy nic extrémního, ale vždycky to nutkání mam.
translation.en: I definitely have a tendency to use violence to solve things now too, when I was a kid I used to fight quite a bit, now I at least hit something to get it out, and when I was younger I used to smack my parents on the arm (so I wouldn't get smacked too hard), so it's never anything extreme, but I always have that urge.
translation.source: Rozhodně mam teď taky tendence řešit věci násilím, jako malá jsem se docela prala, teď si pro vybití aspoň do něčeho praštim a jako mladší jsem třeba rodiče tak plácla přes ruku třeba (abych nedostala moc přes držku), takže nikdy nic extrémního, ale vždycky to nutkání mam.
translation.medium: Definitely, I also have a tendency to solve things violently, I used to fight a lot when I was little, now I at least hit something, and when I was younger, I used to hit my parents on the hand, for example (so that I didn't get a beating), so nothing extreme, but I always have this urge.
translation.reference: I definitely have a tendency to use violence to solve things now too, when I was a kid I used to fight quite a bit, now I at least hit something to get it out, and when I was younger I used to smack my parents on the arm (so I wouldn't get smacked too hard), so it's never anything extreme, but I always have that urge.

translation.cs: Nejsem schopná určit do jaký míry to je mou výbušností, ale určitě na tom má ta výchova taky svůj podíl.
translation.en: I'm not able to determine how much of it is my explosiveness, but I'm sure my upbringing has something to do with it too.
translation.source: Nejsem schopná určit do jaký míry to je mou výbušností, ale určitě na tom má ta výchova taky svůj podíl.
translation.medium: I'm not sure to what extent this is down to my temperament, but I'm sure my upbringing has played a part.
translation.reference: I'm not able to determine how much of it is my explosiveness, but I'm sure my upbringing has something to do with it too.

translation.cs: Bojím se, že taky budu ztrácet trpělivost se svejma dětma a řešit to stejně.
translation.en: I'm afraid I'm going to lose patience with my kids and deal with it the same way.
translation.source: Bojím se, že taky budu ztrácet trpělivost se svejma dětma a řešit to stejně.
translation.medium: I am afraid that I will also lose my patience with my children and deal with it in the same way.
translation.reference: I'm afraid I'm going to lose patience with my kids and deal with it the same way.

translation.cs: Myslím, že bít děti je prostě špatně a že to moji rodiče dělat neměli, obzvlášť ne v tu chvíli, kdy už to nebylo „výchovný,” ale z frustrace, na druhou stranu, snad každej rodič něco prostě posere, asi není možný svý děti aspoň trošku nezprznit, takže jim to nevyčítam.
translation.en: I think hitting kids is just wrong and that my parents shouldn't have done it, especially not at that moment when it was no longer "corrective", but just out of frustration; on the other hand, maybe every parent just fucks something up, I guess it's impossible not to fuck up your kids at least a little bit, so I don't blame them.
translation.source: Myslím, že bít děti je prostě špatně a že to moji rodiče dělat neměli, obzvlášť ne v tu chvíli, kdy už to nebylo „výchovný,” ale z frustrace, na druhou stranu, snad každej rodič něco prostě posere, asi není možný svý děti aspoň trošku nezprznit, takže jim to nevyčítam.
translation.medium: I think that beating children is just wrong and that my parents shouldn't have done it, especially not at a time when it wasn't "educational" but out of frustration, on the other hand, every parent makes mistakes, so I don't hold it against them.
translation.reference: I think hitting kids is just wrong and that my parents shouldn't have done it, especially not at that moment when it was no longer "corrective", but just out of frustration; on the other hand, maybe every parent just fucks something up, I guess it's impossible not to fuck up your kids at least a little bit, so I don't blame them.

translation.cs: Mě to nijak neuráží, nerozumím proč by se měl OP za něco stydět.
translation.en: It doesn't offend me in any way, I just don't understand what the OP has to be ashamed of.
translation.source: Mě to nijak neuráží, nerozumím proč by se měl OP za něco stydět.
translation.medium: It doesn't bother me, I don't understand why OP should be ashamed of anything.
translation.reference: It doesn't offend me in any way, I just don't understand what the OP has to be ashamed of.

translation.cs: Zákony mají být jasné a jednoznačné.
translation.en: Laws should be clear and unambiguous.
translation.source: Zákony mají být jasné a jednoznačné.
translation.medium: Laws should be clear and unambiguous.
translation.reference: Laws should be clear and unambiguous.

translation.cs: Kundami bych tedy nazval ty, co zákony tvoří v takové kvalitě.
translation.en: So I would call those who make laws of this quality cunts.
translation.source: Kundami bych tedy nazval ty, co zákony tvoří v takové kvalitě.
translation.medium: I would call Kundami those who create laws of such quality.
translation.reference: So I would call those who make laws of this quality cunts.

translation.cs: Jinak by mě zajímalo, zda se nebojíte výpadku příjmu?
translation.en: Otherwise, I wonder if you're worried about loss of income?
translation.source: Jinak by mě zajímalo, zda se nebojíte výpadku příjmu?
translation.medium: Otherwise, I would like to know if you are afraid of losing your income?
translation.reference: Otherwise, I wonder if you're worried about loss of income?

translation.cs: Dá se skutečně počítat s tím, že lidi produkt chtějí a kupují a vy budete mít z čeho hypotéku zaplatit?
translation.en: Can you really count on people wanting and buying the product so you’ve got something to pay the mortgage?
translation.source: Dá se skutečně počítat s tím, že lidi produkt chtějí a kupují a vy budete mít z čeho hypotéku zaplatit?
translation.medium: Can you really count on the fact that people want and buy the product and that you will be able to pay off your mortgage?
translation.reference: Can you really count on people wanting and buying the product so you’ve got something to pay the mortgage?

translation.cs: Kočnerův obludný svět.
translation.en: Kočner's monstrous world.
translation.source: Kočnerův obludný svět.
translation.medium: Kočner's monstrous world.
translation.reference: Kočner's monstrous world.

translation.cs: Kam Slovensko posune proces s vrahy novináře Kuciaka?
translation.en: Where will Slovakia move the trial of the journalist Kuciak’s assassinators?
translation.source: Kam Slovensko posune proces s vrahy novináře Kuciaka?
translation.medium: Where will the trial of the murderers of the journalist Kuciak take Slovakia?
translation.reference: Where will Slovakia move the trial of the journalist Kuciak’s assassinators?

translation.cs: Na Slovensku začíná hlavní líčení v procesu se čtveřicí obžalovanou z vraždy Jána Kuciaka a Martiny Kušnírové.
translation.en: The main trial of the four accused of the murder of Ján Kuciak and Martina Kušnírová begins in Slovakia.
translation.source: Na Slovensku začíná hlavní líčení v procesu se čtveřicí obžalovanou z vraždy Jána Kuciaka a Martiny Kušnírové.
translation.medium: In Slovakia, the main trial in the case of the murder of Ján Kuciak and Martina Kušnírová has begun.
translation.reference: The main trial of the four accused of the murder of Ján Kuciak and Martina Kušnírová begins in Slovakia.

translation.cs: Smrt investigativního reportéra a jeho partnerky změnila Slovensko.
translation.en: The death of an investigative reporter and his partner changed Slovakia.
translation.source: Smrt investigativního reportéra a jeho partnerky změnila Slovensko.
translation.medium: The death of the investigative reporter and his partner has changed Slovakia.
translation.reference: The death of an investigative reporter and his partner changed Slovakia.

translation.cs: Rozpohybovala občanskou společnost, ale odhalila i praktiky obviněného podnikatele Mariána Kočnera a jeho napojení na špičky slovenské politiky a justice.
translation.en: It stirred civil society, but it also exposed the practices of the accused businessman Marian Kočner and his connections to the top levels of Slovak politics and justice.
translation.source: Rozpohybovala občanskou společnost, ale odhalila i praktiky obviněného podnikatele Mariána Kočnera a jeho napojení na špičky slovenské politiky a justice.
translation.medium: It stirred up civil society, but it also revealed the practices of the accused businessman Marian Kočner and his links to the Slovak political and judicial elite.
translation.reference: It stirred civil society, but it also exposed the practices of the accused businessman Marian Kočner and his connections to the top levels of Slovak politics and justice.

translation.cs: Jak zásadní zlom bude proces pro Slovensko znamenat?
translation.en: How crucial a breakthrough will the process be for Slovakia?
translation.source: Jak zásadní zlom bude proces pro Slovensko znamenat?
translation.medium: How significant will the process be for Slovakia?
translation.reference: How crucial a breakthrough will the process be for Slovakia?

translation.cs: Za tohle obrovsky můžou novináři.
translation.en: The journalists are hugely to blame for this.
translation.source: Za tohle obrovsky můžou novináři.
translation.medium: The media are to blame for this.
translation.reference: The journalists are hugely to blame for this.

translation.cs: Jak je možný, že tahle petice měla řádově větší mediální pozornost, než protipetice děkanů všech lékařských fakult, která vyšla o den, dva později?
translation.en: How is it possible that this petition got masses more media attention than the counter-petition of the deans of all the medical faculties that came out a day or two later?
translation.source: Jak je možný, že tahle petice měla řádově větší mediální pozornost, než protipetice děkanů všech lékařských fakult, která vyšla o den, dva později?
translation.medium: How is it possible that this petition had an order of magnitude more media attention than the counter-petition by the deans of all medical faculties, which came out a day or two later?
translation.reference: How is it possible that this petition got masses more media attention than the counter-petition of the deans of all the medical faculties that came out a day or two later?

translation.cs: Kdepak, nechali se zblbnout a společnost to odskákala.
translation.en: Nope, they got fooled and society bounced back.
translation.source: Kdepak, nechali se zblbnout a společnost to odskákala.
translation.medium: No, they were duped and the company got away with it.
translation.reference: Nope, they got fooled and society bounced back.

translation.cs: Na české televizi se umíralo s covidem ještě před půl rokem.
